zipper n.拉链 v.拉上拉链	(1) The zipper is a wonderful invention. (2) No, seriously, your zipper's down.	(1) 拉链是个了不起的发明。 (2) 不，认真的，你的拉链开拉。
zone n.地域；地带；地区	(1) They are pulling their troops out of the battle zone. (2) They have declared their country a, nuclear-free zone. (3) Most of China is in the temperate zone. (4) Some people live in Torrid Zone. (5) The Norwegians live in a comparatively cold zone.	(1) 他们正把部队调离战区。 (2) 他们宣布本国为无核区。 (3) 中国的大部分地区在温带。 (4) 有些人生活在热带。 (5) 挪威人生活在比较寒冷的地区。
zoom v.急速上升；嗡嗡作响；（镜头）拉近（拉远） n.急速上升；嗡嗡声；(摄影)变焦	(1) Overnight trading caused share prices to zoom up. (2) We heard a jet plane zooming overhead. (3) If you zoom out at this point, we shall get a view of the whole square. (4) The airplane' s zoom carried it above the clouds. (5) It has a built-in zoom lens as well.	(1) 一夜的交投使股票价格直线上升。 (2) 我们听见喷射机在头上嗡嗡作响。 (3) 如果你在此地把镜头推远，我们将看到整个广场。 (4) 飞机的陡直上升使它飞到云层之上。 (5) 它也有内置的变焦镜头。
cassette n.盒式磁带；暗盒	(1) Cassette tape recorders are gradually out of date now. (2) He bought a new cassette recorder. (3) There is a little window in the cassette case so that you can see the tape. (4) I rewound the cassette and played her voice back to her.	(1) 现在,盒式磁带录音机渐渐过时了。 (2) 他买了一台新的盒式录音机。 (3) 盒式音像带上有个小窗，能看见里面的磁带。 (4) 我把录音带转回去，把她的声音放给她听。

anchor n.锚；锚状物；依靠；新闻节目主播；压阵队员 v.抛锚；停泊；用锚系住；担任（广播电视新闻节目）的主持人	(1) The ship dragged its anchor during the night. (2) Hope is his only anchor. (3) He was then doing the anchor. (4) The anchor man in a relay team runs last. (5) The ship was anchored off the shore. (6) We anchored our boat close to the shore. (7) He anchors a half-hour news show every day.	(1) 夜里,船把锚拖动了。 (2) 希望是他唯一的依靠。 (3) 他当时正主持新闻广播节目。 (4) 接力队中的主力跑最后一棒。 (5) 船在海岸处抛了锚。 (6) 我们近岸泊船。 (7) 他每天主持半小时的新闻广播。
a art. 一；任一；每一	There is a pen on the table. We have a problem. I can only carry two at a time. Let's go to a Chinese restaurant. A cat is an animal.	桌子上有一支笔。 我们有个问题。 我一次只能带两个。 我们去一家中餐餐馆。 猫是动物。
able adj. 能；[经管] 有能力的；能干的 n. (Able)人名；(伊朗)阿布勒；(英)埃布尔	We shall be able to deal with all sorts of problem. She bet me 20 that I wouldn't be able to give up smoking. Free will makes us able to choose our way of life. By no means was he able to handle it. He is an able man. Difficulties help to forge people into able folk.	我们应该能够应付各种困难。 她和我打20英镑的赌，说我戒不了烟。 自由的意志使我们可以选择自己的生活方式。 这件事他绝对没办法处理。 他是一个能人。 困难有助于把人们锻炼成能干的人。
about prep. 关于；大约 adj. 在附近的；四处走动的；在起作用的 adv. 大约；周围；到处 n. 大致；粗枝大叶；不拘小节的人 n. (About)人名；(法)阿布	Tell me all about it. It is about six o'clock now. It was a long flight and it took about fourteen hours. All about us in the store were piles of goods. Dinner is about ready. He spoke to a few spectators standing about. He's eighty now, and doesn't get about much any more. He glanced quickly about and then stepped aside. He was about to start. A new book is about to be brought out. I was about to go out when he called on me. There is a rumor about that they're getting divorced.	告诉我关于这件事的一切。 现在是六点钟左右。 时间真长,飞了大约十四个小时。 在这家店里,我们周围到处都是成堆的商品。 中饭就要做好了。 他和站在附近的围观者交谈。 他现在80岁了,不能再到处走动了。 他向四周扫了一眼,然后站在一旁。 他即将动身。 一本新书即将出版。 当他来访时，我正要外出。 正传闻说他们要离婚。
above prep. 超过；在……上面；在……之上 adv. 在上面；在上文 adj. 上文的 n. 上文	The glider was soaring above the valley. Applicants must be above the age of 18. The temperature has been above the average recently. The sun rose above the horizon. The bird is flying low above the water. A captain in the navy ranks above a captain in the army. The above bedroom is mine. From the above statement, I think he is right. We are fascinated by the stars twinkling above. Seen from above, the fields looked like a geometrical pattern. The temperature is six above. He wrote a book with 200 pages and above. She married above her. Above all, it is the present that we should cherish. All the details have been listed above.	那架滑翔机在山谷上空滑翔。 申请者的年龄必须超过18岁。 近来的气温一直比平均温度高。 太阳升到地平线上。 那只鸟在水面上低飞。 海军的上校军衔高于陆军的上尉军衔。 上面的房间是我的。 从以上的陈述来看,我认为他是对的。 天空中闪烁的星星让我们陶醉着。 从上面往下看,那些农田像是几何图案。 温度在零上六度。 他写了一本篇幅为200页以上的书。 她嫁给了社会地位比她高的人。 最重要的是,我们要珍惜现在。 在上文中,所有的细节已经罗列出来了。
abroad adv. 在国外；到海外 adj. 往国外的 n. 海外；异国	He is travelling abroad. He lived abroad for many years. The news spread abroad. There's a rumour abroad that she intends to leave the company. Our products have entered the markets abroad. He's currently abroad on business.	他要到国外旅行。 他在国外居住了许多年。 那消息四处传播。 谣言盛传她打算离开公司。 我们的产品已打入国外市场。 目前他正在国外做生意。

I started the hobby almost by accident. By accident of birth he is entitled to British citizenship.	他的左膝在一次交通事故中受伤了。 很幸运，事故得以避免了。 几天前,我碰到一件意外事情。 我有了这个爱好纯属偶然。 因出生的造化
accurate adj. 精确的	Hearsay definitely can't be regarded as accurate information. The manager impressed on his office staff the importance of keeping accurate records.	道听途说的决然不能算作很准确的消息。 经理让办公室职员认识到做精确记录的重要性。
across prep. 穿过；横穿 adv. 横过；在对面	Can you swim across the river? The drunk man staggered across the room. Edgar looked in anger across at Miriam. When my name was called, he looked across at me. The post office is just across from the club. I've finished the crossword apart from 3 across and 10 down. A big tree fell across the ditch. A bridge across the river must be built. I helped a blind man across the street. My house is just across the street. We shall soon be across the Channel. He shouted to me from across the room. She gave him a slap across the face. Her family is scattered across the country. The peasants across the country are on strike.	你能游到河的对岸吗？ 那个醉汉摇摇晃晃地穿过房间。 埃德加气鼓鼓地看着对面的米丽安。 当叫到我名字的时候，他从那边朝我看过来。 邮局就在那俱乐部对面。 这份纵横字谜除横3竖10以外我都填完了。 一棵大树横贯沟渠倒下。 必须造一座跨越这条河的桥。 我扶一个盲人过了街。 我家就在对街上。 我们不久即将渡过英吉利海峡了。 他从房间的另一边向我喊。 她打了他一个耳光。 她家中的人散居全国各地。 这个国家的农民在进行罢工。
active adj. 积极的；活跃的；主动的；有效的；现役的 n. 主动语态；积极分子	Ms. Brown is active in the party. He is an active member of the school's stamp club. She was active as a left-winger in the party. We should take active part in extracurricular activities. Vesuvius is an active volcano. She has an active imagination.	布朗女士在晚会上很活跃。 他是学校集邮俱乐部的一名活跃会员。 她是党内积极的左翼分子。 我们应该积极参加课外活动。 维苏威山是一座活火山。 她有灵活的想象力。
activity n. 活动；行动；活跃	We love outdoor activity. We plan to expand our business activities in East Africa. The volcano is in activity. There was a sudden spurt of activity in the housing market. Busking is a fun activity for the performer. Interactive music-making frequently blurs the conventional distinction between compositional and improvisational activity.	我们热爱户外活动。 我们打算在东非扩展我们的商业活动。 这火山正活跃著。 房产市场突然活跃了一阵子。 街头表演对于街头艺人来说是一项有乐趣的活动。 交互音乐的创作过程经常会模糊传统意义上的作曲与即兴表演这两种行为之间的界限。
ad n. 公元	That's an interesting ad. I got four replies to my ad about the bicycle for sale. The ad was run in the paper for a week. This tradition has been traced back to the sixth century AD. It was first built in 326 AD and restored several times through the centuries.	那是有趣的广告。 已经收到了四份对我出售自行车广告的回信。 这则广告在报上连续刊登了一个星期。 这一传统已被追溯到公元16世纪。 它始建于公元326年。几个世纪以来，人们对它进行了几次重建。
address vt. 演说；从事；忙于；写姓名地址；向…致辞；与…说话；提出；处理 n. 地址；演讲；致辞；说话的技巧；称呼	Please write your home address on the registration form. I'll log in to the internet to know about you. I know your address. Can you tell me your E-mail address? What form of address should one use when writing to a bishop? Mr. Youshida will give an address during today's morning assembly. May I start my work on the telefax machine after that? The mayor gave a television address yesterday evening. The president gave an address over the radio. Luke's homely, unpretending style, and his pleasing address catch the ear of the people. Most people call me Bob. How do I address you? He is going to address the meeting. He addressed the audience in an eloquent speech. Please address all enquiries to this office. Could you help me address these envelopes? There is a letter addressed to you. The next meeting will address the problem of truancy.	请在这张登记表上写下你的家庭住址。 我还是上因特网去看吧，我知道你们的网址。 能告诉我你的电子邮箱地址吗? 给主教写信应该怎样称呼? 今天早会吉田先生要致词，会后我可以开始我的电传工作吗? 市长昨晚作了电视演讲。 总统发表广播演讲。 卢克朴实而不矜持的作风以及讨人喜欢的谈吐使得人们都很愉快。 大家叫我鲍勃,我怎么称呼你? 他将向大会作演说。 他向听众发表了雄辩的演说。 一切查询请向本办公室提出。 帮我给这些信封写地址好吗？ 有封写给你收的信。 下次会议将着手解决学生的逃课问题。
afford vt. 给予，提供；买得起 n. (Afford)人名；(英)阿福德	Only the well-to-do can afford these houses. I can't afford a holiday this summer. We can afford to overlook minor offences. We can't afford to pay such a price. They could ill afford to lose any more staff. We cannot afford to ignore this warning. These trees afford a pleasant shade.	只有富人能买得起这些房子。 今年夏天我无法度假。 我们可以不计较小过。 我们付不起这个价钱。 他们再也不能损失员工了。 我们对这个警告绝不能等闲视之。 这些树提供了荫凉。
afraid adj. 害怕的；恐怕；担心的	I'm afraid we can't come. I'm afraid I didn't quie catch what you said. I didn't mention it because I was afraid of upsetting him/afraid (that) I might upset him. Are you afraid of snakes? Children feel afraid when they are at home alone.	很抱歉，我们不能来。 对不起,我没听清你刚才所说的话。 我没有提起那件事，因为我怕他心烦意乱。 你怕蛇吗? 孩子独自自己在家,感到害怕。
Africa n. 非洲	Africa is full of adventurers. Peoples in Africa are living in penury. Africa is exporting beef to Europe. Africa is a mysterious land to him. He took many photos of the wide tracts of desert in North Africa. He told a very lively story about his life in Africa.	在非洲有很多冒险家。 非洲的人民过着贫穷的生活。 非洲向欧洲出口牛肉。 对他来说，非洲是一片神秘的土地。 他拍了许多关于北非的广大沙漠的照片。 他非常生动地讲述了他在非洲的生活。
after adv. 后来，以后 prep. 在……之后 conj. 在……之后 adj. 以后的	They met in June and became lovers soon after. The day after, he apologized. They lived happily ever after. After dinner we paired off and went to dance. After travelling for three days I slept for twenty hours at a stretch. C comes after B in the alphabet. They inquired after you. We ran after the thief. We've named the baby after you.	他们在六月相遇, 不久就成了情侣。 次日，他道歉了。 他们後来一直生活得很幸福。 饭后我们成双成对地跳舞去了。 连续3天旅行之后，我一连睡了20个小时。 在字母表中C接在B后面。 他们问候你。 我们追赶窃贼。 我们是依照你的名字给这婴儿取名的。
afternoon n. 午后，下午	Good afternoon! She could knit up a baby's coatee in an afternoon. I met him in a hot and breathless afternoon.	下午好！ 她一个下午就能编结好一件婴孩的紧身短上衣。 我是在一个又闷又热的下午遇到他的。
afterwards adv. 后来；然后	She died in an accident shortly afterwards. Soon afterwards he made his first public statement about the affair. They lived happily ever afterwards. Three days afterward they met at the airport. When it came to cleaning up afterwards, the boys were conspicuous by their absence. His illness was a blessing in disguise, because he afterwards married his nurse. We saw the play separately and compared notes afterwards.	不久以后，她就在一次事故中丧生。 不久以后，他第一次就这一事件发表了公开声明。 以后他们一直幸福地生活着。 三天以后他们在机场碰头。 后来轮到做卫生时,这些男孩却不在场,引起了大家的注意。 他生病倒是因祸得福，因为后来他和他的护士结了婚。 我们各自看了那出戏,后来交换了意见。
again adv. 又，此外；再一次；再说；增加 n. （英、保）阿盖恩	Try again. Say that again, please. I am longing to see my friend Jack again. I am sorry-she's out. Can you ring again later? You'll never get the money back again. He has spoken down again after slightly pausing. After ten years in prison, he was a free man again. He sucked in air, then went under the water again.	再试试。 请再说一遍。 我渴望再见到我的朋友杰克。 对不起－她出去了。你过些时候再打电话来好吗？ 那笔钱你再也弄不回来了。 他在略作停顿后又讲了下去。 他坐了十年监狱，又成了自由人。 他深深吸了一口气又潜到水里。
against prep. 反对，违反；靠；倚；防备 adj. 不利的；对立的	There are 26 votes for him and 8 against him. We sailed against the wind. It's against your promise to go on smoking. They forced me to do things against my will. He propped himself against the wall. The huge trees were profiled against the night sky. We have saved some money against our old age. Our defences must be reinforced against attack. His eloquence did not avail against the facts. You must weigh the benefits against the cost.	有26票赞成他，8票反对他。 我们逆风航行。 继续抽烟,这违背了你的诺言。 他们强迫我做违背我心意的事。 他倚靠着墙。 在夜空的映衬下显出大树的轮廓。 我们存了一些钱，以备老年之用。 我们必须加强防御设施以抵御进攻。 他的雄辩在事实面前不起什么作用。 你一定要权衡利益与成本二者的得失。
age n. 年龄；时代；寿命，使用年限；阶段 vi. 成熟；变老 vt. 使成熟；使变老，使上年纪 n. (Age)人名；(瑞典)阿格；(日)扬 (姓)；(西、荷)阿赫	What is your age? The child is at an impressionable age. We are living in the age of technology. Rome was in its prime in the age of Augustus. Each civilization has its golden age. I haven't seen you for ages. Anxiety ages us. The death of his wife caused him to age fast. The wine is put into oak casks to age. The cheese is left to age for at least a year.	你多大年纪？ 这孩子正处于易受影响的年龄。 我们生活在工业技术时代。 罗马帝国的全盛期是在奥古斯都时代。 每个文明都有它的鼎盛时期。 我好久没见到你了。 忧虑催人老。 他妻子的死使他变老了许多。 酒被放进橡木桶中变陈。 这种奶酪至少要搁一年才成熟。
ago adv. 以前，以往 adj. 以前的；过去的 n. (Ago)人名；(英、西、意、塞、瑞典)阿戈	The dinosaurs disappeared long ago. A hundred years ago, Britain had a large empire.	恐龙很久以前就绝种了。 一百年以前，英国有一个很大的帝国。
agree vt. 同意，赞成；承认；约定，商定 vi. vi. 同意，意见一致；约定，商定	We agreed to leave at once. I, for my part, totally agree with you. I didn't agree from the very beginning. We must agree to differ on this. Spicy food does not agree with me. The witnesses' statements just don't agree with each other.	我们同意立即离开。 至於我,我完全同意你的看法。 我从一开始就不赞成。 我们得承认在这一问题上有分歧。 辛辣食物不合我的胃口。 几个证人的陈述并不一致。
air n. 空气，大气；天空；样子；曲调 vt. 使通风，晾干；夸耀 vi. 通风	The fresh air in the morning made him feel glad. There is a bird flying through the air. The archers sent their shafts through the air. There was an air of excitement at the meeting. There is an air of abstraction in her face. He played a delightful air on his flute. You will lose friends if you put on airs. You should air the clothes to get the damp out. The doctor recommended him to air the room. We need to air out the smoke-filled rooms.	早晨的新鲜空气使他觉得愉快。 一只小鸟从天空飞过。 弓箭手向空中射出利箭。 开会时气氛显得有些兴奋。 她脸上带着一种心不在焉的神态。 他用笛子吹奏了一支欢快的曲调。 你如果装腔作势,就会失去朋友。 你应该把衣服晾一下去去潮气。 医生建议他打扫房间。 我们得把满是烟味的房间通通风。
airport n. 机场；航空站	The plane circled the airport before landing. There was a great outcry about the construction of the new airport. You must arrive at the airport two hours early.	飞机在着陆之前在机场上空盘旋。 公众强烈反对修建该机场。 你必须提前两小时到达机场。
alike adj. 相似的；相同的 adv. 以同样的方式；类似于	We are much alike in character. The two brothers are very much alike. The sisters are as alike as two peas. These kittens look exactly alike how can you tell which is which? No two people think alike. The government taxed the rich and the poor alike. She treats all her students alike.	我们的性格很相似。 这两兄弟非常相像。 两姐妹长得一模一样。 这些小猫看上去一模一样--你怎么能分出哪个是哪个? 没有两个人的想法是一样的。 政府对富人和穷人同样征税。 她对她所有的学生都同样看待。
alive adj. 活着的；活泼的；有生气的	She clung to the hope that her son was still alive. Are your grandparents still alive? Although he is eighty, he is still very much alive. He is fully alive to the possible dangers. The city was all alive when he arrived.	她始终抱着儿子还活着的希望。 你的祖父母还在世吗？ 他虽有八十岁了，但仍然充满了活力。 他充分注意到会有危险。 当他到达时，城里非常热闹。
all adj. 全部的 adv. 全然地；越发 n. 全部 pron. 全部 n. (All)人名；(瑞典)阿尔；(英)奥尔	All wood tends to shrink. All my plants have died. He spent all his time reading. His temperature seems to be all right. Her children are all very brainy. She was all excited. We are grateful to you for all you have done. All enjoyed themselves. All of the toys are broken.	所有木头都会缩一些. 我的花草全死光了。 他把全部时间都花在阅读上。 他的体温好像完全正常。 她的孩子个个都很聪明。 她非常兴奋. 我们对你所做的一切表示感谢。 每个人都玩得很尽兴。 所有的玩具都坏了。
allow vt. 允许；给予；认可 vi. 容许；考虑	You are not allowed to smoke here. How much holiday are you allowed? I should allow an hour to get to London. The judge assented to allow the prisoner to speak. If you'll allow me,I will send you back. It will take you half an hour to get to the station, allowing for traffic delays. The patient was allowed up (ie permitted to get out of bed) after 10 days.	这里不许吸烟。 你有多少天假? 到伦敦去我得留出一小时来。 法官同意允许犯人申辩。 如果你能同意，我可以送你回家。 把路上的耽搁算进去，你要用半小时才能到车站。 病人十天以后才允许起来(准予离床下地).
almost adv. 差不多，几乎	He slipped and almost fell. She was almost mad with grief when her son died. This event was almost simultaneous with that one. It's almost time to go. The bridge is almost 2 kilometres long. The girl was annoyed by his almost impudence.	他脚下一滑，险些跌倒。 她的儿子死去时，她悲伤得几乎疯了。 这件事几乎是与那件事同时发生的。 差不多是该走的时候了。 这座桥差不多有两公里长。 他几近厚颜无耻的态度把那个女孩给惹恼了。
alone adj. 独自的；单独的；孤独的 adv. 独自地；单独地	Tom is not alone in finding Rick hard to work with. I was alone in the classroom. To tell you the truth, I don't feel like being alone tonight. After tea I wandered alone about the town. You can't live on bread alone.	并不只是汤姆一人认为和里克难以共事。 我独自在教室里。 说实话,我今晚不想孤单一人。 吃过下午茶,我独自在城里漫步。 你不能仅靠面包维生。
along adv. 一起；向前；来到 prep. 沿着；顺着	We walked along the road. The procession passed along the street. You can go straight along this street to the traffic light. He walked along the mountain ridge. A small boat was drifting along. He sang loudly as he walked along. You can take the letters along with the newspapers. John brought his friends along.	我们沿着路走。 游行队伍沿着街道前进。 你可以顺着这条街一直走到红绿灯处。 他顺着山脊走。 一条小船正向前漂流着。 他边向前走边大声唱著歌。 秘书把信和报纸一起拿走。 约翰带他的朋友一起去。
already adv. 已经，早已；先前	I've already paid my membership dues. The new rules have already come into play. You had already gone when I arrived there. I've been there already and don't want to go again.	我已经交了我的会员费。 新规则已经开始生效。 当我到达时，你已经走了。 我曾到过那，不想再去了。
also adv. 也；而且；同样 conj. 并且；另外 n. (Also)人名；(罗)阿尔索	We should also take account of difficulties. London was also called the modern Babylon. This book is not only interesting but also good. Tom has been to Japan, I have also been there.	我们也应该考虑到困难。 伦敦也被称为现代巴比伦。 这本书不仅有趣,而且内容也非常好。 汤姆曾去过日本，我也曾去过。
although conj. 尽管；虽然；但是；然而	Although my uncle is old, he looks very strong and healthy. Although they can swim, the polar bears are terrestrial animals. Although she was poor, she was living in genteel poverty. No, this is not what we mean by framing, although the principle is the same. I did not know that then, although I learned it later.	我的叔叔虽然老了，但他看上去还是很健壮。 北极熊虽然会游泳，但也是陆栖动物。 尽管她贫穷，但她总想装出上流社会阶层的样子。 不,这不是我们所讲的框架的含义,尽管法则是一样的。 当时我不知道那件事，然而我后来知道了。
always adv. 永远，一直；总是；常常	I'm always at home in the evenings. A live band is always a good draw at a party. We should always help each other. They will always be friends. You can always resign if you feel unhappy. You could always use a dictionary.	晚上我总是在家里。 现场演奏的乐队在聚会上总是很吸引人的。 我们应始终互相帮助。 他们将永远是朋友。 如果你不满意,随时可以辞职。 你无论如何还可以使用词典嘛。
am abbr. 调频，调谐，调幅（ amplitude modulation） vi. （用于第一人称单数现在时） aux. （与v-ing连用构成现在进行时，与v-ed连用构成被动语态） n. （柬）安（人名）	I am a doctor. I am filled with the desire to go back home. I think I am quite a patient person.	我是个医生。 我心中充满了回家的渴望。 我认为我是一个相当有耐心的人。
amazing adj. 令人惊异的 v. 使吃惊（amaze的ing形式）	Just look at it. Isn't it amazing! We listened to her amazing story with rapt attention. It was amazing that he knew nothing about the event. He had a series of amazing adventures after he was flushed down the toilet. In the Olympic Games, Liu Xiang ran with amazing speed and won the first place.	你看看。真叫人惊叹！ 我们全神贯注地倾听她讲的惊人故事。 他对这个事件毫不知情，真让人感到诧异。 被冲进马桶后,他经历了一连串的奇妙冒险。 在奥运会上,刘翔跑得飞快,以惊人的速度赢得了第一。
America n. 美洲（包括北美和南美洲）；美国	Are you going to America by boat or by plane? It's time for us to say "No" to America. One of his forefathers was an early settler in America. There were lots of buffaloes in the North America 100 years ago. Maize is widely planted in the America.	你到美国是坐船还是坐飞机？ 是我们对美国说不的时候了。 他的祖先之一是美洲的早期移民。 100年前，北美有大量的野牛。 玉米在美洲广泛种植。
among prep. 在…中间；在…之中	I live among the mountains. He climbed up the tree and hid among the branches. New York is among the largest cities in the world. This book counts among the best of his works.	我住在群山之中。 他爬上树去,藏在树枝里。 纽约是世界上最大的几座城市之一。 这本书被认为是他的最佳作品之一。
analyse vt. 分析；分解；细察	He analysed the food and found that it contained poison. Let's analyse the problem and see what went wrong. The coach tried to analyse the cause of our defeat. We must try to analyse the causes of the strike.	他对这种食物做了化验，发现有毒。 让我们分析一下这道题，看什么地方出错了。 教练努力设法分析我们失败的原因。 我们得研究一下罢工的原因。
and conj. 和，与；就；而且；但是；然后 n. (And)人名；(土、瑞典)安德	My father and mother went for a walk. She majored in maths and physics (at university). She demonstrated that 2 and 2 are four. I drove up in front of the house and honked. Work hard and you will be successful.	爸爸妈妈去散步了。 她(在大学)主修数学和物理。 她证明2加2等于四。 我将车开到屋子前面然后按喇叭。 努力工作，你就会成功。
angry adj. 生气的；愤怒的；狂暴的；（伤口等）发炎的	His imperious look makes us angry. Don't be angry over such trivial matters. He shouts when he gets angry, as is often the case. There was an angry squall from the bedroom. The players were jostled by an angry crowd as they left the field.	他那飞扬跋扈的样子令我们生气。 别为这些琐事生气。 他生气时就大叫，这是常有的情形。 卧室里传出一声愤怒的喊叫。 运动员们离开赛场时，被愤怒的人群推搡着。
animal n. 动物 动物的	The jackal is a wild animal in Africa and Asia. This small animal has a pair of brown eyes. A pig is a domestic animal. The animal is dangerous when cornered. Try to cut down on the amount of animal fats you eat. Animal husbandry is important in this area. People are people because the human mind can contain the animal instinct.	豺狼是产于亚非的一种野生动物。 这只小动物有一双棕色的眼睛。 猪是一种家畜。 野兽一旦陷于绝境就会变得很危险。 尽量减少你食用的动物脂肪的量。 畜牧业在这一带很重要。 人之所以为人,是因为能用头脑里的人性遏制本能的兽性。
another adj. 又一，另一；另外的；不同的 pron. 另一个；又一个 prep. 另一个；另一个人	It is just as well that you took another road. She has been transferred to another department. Will you like another cup of tea? The agreement has been renewed for another year. I don't like this one. Please show me another Shakespeare is the greatest English writer. Will there ever be such another? He hates being sticked in the sour job but can not find another.	还好你们走了另一条路。 她已被调往另一个部门。 你要再来一杯茶吗？ 该协定的期限已经再延长一年。 我不喜欢这个，请给我另一个。 莎士比亚是最伟大的英国文豪--还能有这样的人物吗? 他讨厌老是做这份枯燥乏味的工作,可是又找不到别的差事。
answer vt. 回答；符合 vi. 回答；符合 n. 回答；答案；答辩	The question is simple enough to answer. she fell into a rage and refused to answer. He answered that he knew nothing about it. He has a large amount of mail to answer every day. I have to type letters and answer the phone. Do you know the answer to this question? If you think carefully, you will find the answer. He knocked at the door but there was no answer. You'd better talk it over with your wife and give me your answer tomorrow.	这个问题很简单,容易回答。 他勃然大怒,拒不回答。 他答复说关于此事他一无所知。 他每天有大量的信件要回复。 我又得用打字机打信 你知道这道题的答案吗？ 仔细考虑一下,你就会找到答案。 他敲了门,但是没有人回答。 你最好和你的妻子商量一下,明天给我一个答复吧。
any adj. 任何的；所有的；丝毫 pron. 任何；任何一个；若干 adv. 稍微；少许 n. (Any)人名；(法、罗)阿尼	I can't stay any longer. I can't see things getting any better	我一刻也不能再呆下去了。 我看不出事情有丝毫好转
anybody pron. 任何人 n. 重要人物	He didn't want to team up with anybody. By anybody's standards that work of art is A-1.	他不想与任何人合作。 那件艺术品按任何人的标准都是第一流的。
anyone pron. 任何人；任何一个	We dislike to have anyone patronize us. She never heeded anyone's warning.	我们不喜欢任何人对我们以恩人自居。 她从不理会任何人的警告。
anything pron. 任何事	If you remember anything at all, please let us know. The hotel was anything but satisfactory. Is there anything for me? Anything will do to keep the door open. You had to be something to start with, and Jeremy never was anything. He isn't anything like my first boss.	你要是想起什么来，就告诉我们。 这家旅馆太不让人满意了。 有东西给我吗？ 只要能使门敞开着，什么东西都行。 你必须得开始象个样子，杰里米从来就一事无成。 他一点也不像我第一个老板。
anywhere adv. 在任何地方；无论何处 n. 任何地方	The city welcomes visitors from anywhere. One day they may be able to go anywhere in space.	这座城市欢迎来自任何地方的来访客人。 会有那么一天，它们也许能够进入太空的任何地方。
appear vi. 出现；显得；似乎；出庭；登场	A ship appeared on the horizon. His book appears on the market. An article about him appeared in the paper. She appeared very confident. You appear unhappy.	船出现在水平线上。 他的书出版了。 一篇有关他的文章在报上发表。 她显得很自信。 你看起来好像不高兴。
apple n. 苹果，苹果树，苹果似的东西；[美俚]炸弹，手榴弹，（棒球的）球；[美俚]人，家伙。	My uncle has an apple orchard. The apple trees are blossoming. He regard his new bike as the apple of his eye. He's a rotten apple.	我叔叔拥有一个苹果园。 苹果树正在开花。 他把他的新自行车视为珍宝。 他是一个讨厌的家伙。
approval n. 批准；认可；赞成	The proposal was accepted with unanimous approval. We should submit our plans to the council for approval. Your approval gives me much gratification. He showed his approval by shaking my hands.	全体一致通过了那项建议。 我们应该向理事会提交计划以求批准。 承蒙认可，我非常高兴。 他和我握手，表示赞成。
April n. 四月	April is the time to plant trees. The manuscript bears the date 10 April 1937. He moved into this house in April.	四月是种树的时候。 手稿上注著1937年4月10日。 他是四月份搬进这所房子的。
arm n. 手臂；武器；袖子；装备；部门 vi. 武装起来 vt. 武装；备战	You should wind a cloth round the wounded arm. The archer holds the bow in his bow arm. His left arm was hurt in an accident. He draped his legs over the arm of the chair. There's a tear in the arm of my jacket. They were not allowed to use arms. We must arm ourselves against the enemy. The new battleship shall be armed with 16-inch guns. The nation must arm its soldiers for battle.	你应该把一块布缠在受伤的和臂上。 运动员用执弓臂握住弓。 他的左胳膊在一次事故中受伤了。 他懒洋洋地把双腿搭在椅子的扶手上。 我上衣袖子上有个破囗。 不许他们使用武器。 我们必须武装自己,防范敌人。 新战舰将以16英寸口径的大炮武装起来。 国家必须装备士兵，以防打仗。
around adv. 大约；到处；在附近 prep. 四处；在…周围	He runs around the playground. I saw him around the place this morning. The earth moves around the sun. There're around 1000 employees in this company. I can't arrange everything around your timetable. We have travelled around in Europe for six weeks. You have 15 minutes to look around. There was more money around in those days. There were several young people sitting around looking bored. He turned around as he heard a noise behind him. He is the most intelligent artist around today. There are many new cars around.	他在运动场上到处跑。 今天早上我看见他就在那儿附近。 地球围绕太阳运动。 这个公司大约有1000名员工。 我不可能事事都按照你的时刻表安排。 我们在欧洲各地旅行了六个星期。 你有15分钟的时间到周围看看。 那年头比现在富裕。 有几个年青人闲坐着，一副无聊的样子。 他听到身后有响声，便转过身来。 他是如今在世的最有才华的艺术家。 有大量新车上市。
arrive vi. 到达；成功；达成；出生 n. (Arrive)人名；(法)阿里夫	We shall arrive soon after. You must arrive at the airport two hours early. The great day has arrived. The baby finally arrived just after midnight. You know you've arrived when you're asked to appear on TV.	我们将很快就到达。 你必须提前两小时到达机场。 伟大的日子已经到来。 婴儿终於在刚过午夜时候降生了. 邀请你在电视上亮相的时候，你就知道你已经名声在外了。
art n. （包括雕塑、绘画、音乐等的） 艺术，美术；美术（作）品；艺品（作）品；（表演）艺术；技术，技巧； adj. 艺术的；艺术品的；具有艺术性的 v. be的现在式单数第二人称形式，过时用法	She displayed great ardor for art. She joined the university art society. She has an appreciation of art and music. The art of painting is not easy to learn. She is capable of judging works of art. Are you a Bachelor of Arts? She teaches art history in university. She studied sculpture at art school.	她对艺术表现出极大的热心。 她加入了大学里的艺术协会。 她对于美术和音乐有了解。 画画的技巧是不容易学的。 她有鉴赏艺术品的能力。 你是文学学士吗？ 她在大学里教艺术史。 她在美术学校学习雕刻。
artist n. 艺术家；美术家（尤指画家）；大师	She is a consummate artist. He is a notable artist. His dream of becoming an artist has been fulfilled. The vital spark in him makes him an artist. The artist painted her strolling her garden. Finally she realized her intention of becoming an artist. The artist must have spent hours etching the image on the glass. She also got the title of the best new artist. Madonna is highly rated as a performing artist but not as a person.	她是个技艺高超的艺术家。 他是一位著名的艺术家。 他成为一个艺术家的梦想实现了。 他生气勃勃的活力使他成为一个艺术家。 美术家画了一张她在花园里漫步的画。 最后她实现了当美术家的愿望。 这位美术家一定花了好几小时把这画像蚀刻在玻璃上。 她还获得了最佳新艺人的头衔。 作为一位艺人,人们对麦当娜的评价很高,但对其为人则不然。
as conj. 因为；随着；虽然；依照；当…时 prep. 如同；当作；以…的身份 adv. 同样地；和…一样的	The ground was as white as snow with petals that had drifted down from the apple trees. Many things pollute water, such as tires, trash, and plastic bags. This cathedral was regarded as a miracle in architectural history. As a cub reporter he would learn the facts of life in the newspaper world. Just as writing a fiction,programming is a process of creating art. As the wage of the job was low, there were few applicants for it. Despite the threat of war, people go about their work as usual. A sudden chill of horror sweep over her as she feel the drip of saliva upon her hand. Gambling is not the same as investment in the stock market. It's a horse of a different colour. He did not follow our advice so as to be arrested by the police. As difficult as it seems to be,the problem is by no means a new one.	满地是苹果树上飘落下来的花瓣，地上一片雪白。 很多东西使水污染，例如轮胎、垃圾和塑胶袋。 这座大教堂被认为是建筑史上的奇迹。 作为一名初出茅庐的记者，他要了解报界生涯的内幕。 如同写小说一样，程序设计也是一个艺术创造的过程。 因为工资低,没有什么人申请这份工作。 尽管战争一触即发，人们仍像平时一样工作。 当她感觉到滴到她双手上的唾液时，恐怖的寒栗突然遍布了她全身。 赌博与把资金投入股市并不一样,它完全是另外一码事。 他不听我们的劝告,结果被逮捕。 尽管看起来很难,这个问题却并非新问题。
ask vt. 问，询问；要求；需要；邀请；讨价 vi. 问，询问；要求 n. (Ask)人名；(芬、瑞典)阿斯克	May I ask a question? I'm calling to ask you about the delivery. He'll lend you the money if you ask him. It was such a big job that he had to ask for help . I have asked some friends for tea. I have the right to ask for an explanation. My father ask me to account for my conduct. The man asked ten dollars for the book. As parents, we should not ask too much of our children.	我可以问一个问题吗？ 我打电话给你,是询问发货的事。 如果你请求他的话，他就会把钱借给你。 这项工作量太大，他得请求帮助。 我请了一些朋友来喝茶。 我有权要求一个解释。 我父亲要求我为自己的行为负责。 那个人竟然给这本书开价十美元。 作为父母,我们不应该过分要求孩子。
asleep adj. 睡着的；麻木的；长眠的 adv. 熟睡地；进入睡眠状态	The lion lay asleep in its den. He soon fell asleep with weariness. Some people grind their teeth while they are asleep. My grandfather was asleep forever. Her mind was asleep. When I woke my left arm was asleep. The fat guy dropped asleep shortly after the film began. Their anxieties were put asleep.	狮子躺在洞里睡觉。 他疲倦地很快就睡着了。 有些人睡觉时磨牙齿。 我的祖父过世了。 她的头脑停顿了。 我醒来时我的左臂麻木了。 电影开始不久,那个胖子就睡着了。 他们的焦虑平息了。
assistant n. 助手，助理，助教 adj. 辅助的，助理的；有帮助的	The Prime Minister came to visit our country in the company of his assistant. Wang wore two hats as chief of marketing research and assistant head of sales. She is an assistant teacher in our school.	首相在其助手陪同下访问我国。 王先生身兼两职,是市场调查部主任,也是营销部副主任。 她是我们学校的助理教员。
at prep. 在（表示存在或出现的地点、场所、位置、空间）；以（某种价格、速度等）；向；达；因为；朝；忙于 n. 阿特（老挝货币基本单位att）；[化]砹（极不稳定放射性元素） abbr. 密封的（airtight）；气温（air temperature）	I'm sorry to obtrude on you at such a time. She had her hair styled at the beauty parlor. Snipers shot at the invaders from the roof tops. She makes eyes at the handsome young man. The airplane flies at 900 kilometers an hour.	我很抱歉在这个时候打扰你。 她的头发是在美容院做的。 狙击手从房顶上向侵略者射击。 她向那位英俊的小伙子送秋波。 飞机以每小时900公里的速度飞行。
attack n. 攻击；抨击；疾病发作 vt. 攻击；抨击；动手干 vi. 攻击；腐蚀 n. (Attack)人名；(瑞典)阿塔克	The police are launching a major attack on drug dealers. His attack on the government was pure vitriol. The enemy attacked us at night. There is a newspaper article attacking the Prime Minister. Once you show any sign of fear, he will attack you. It is reported that this disease attacks the central nervous system.	警方对毒品贩子发动了大规模的攻击。 他纯粹出于恶意抨击政府。 敌人在夜里向我们进攻。 报纸上有一篇抨击首相的文章. 你一旦露出任何恐惧的迹象,他就会攻击你。 据报道说这种疾病破坏中枢神经系统。
attract vt. 吸引；引起 vi. 吸引；有吸引力	The flower show attracted large crowds this year. She gave a quiet cough to attract my attention. His comments were bound to attract criticism.	今年的花展吸引了大批观众。 她轻轻地咳了一声好引起我注意。 他的评论必然会招致批评。
audience n. 观众；听众；读者；接见；正式会见；拜会	The audience was no less than five thousand. Someone in the audience began to laugh. The concert drew a large audience. The article was put out in a national magazine to reach a larger audience. The audience lapped up his monologue. His enrapt audience seemed to hang on every word he said. Each style or form has its own audience.	听众有五千人之多。 观众中有人开始笑起来。 音乐会吸引了大量的观众。 为了能影响更多的读者,文章被登发在一份国家级杂志上。 听众倾听他的独白。 那如醉如痴的听众似乎对他所说的每一个字都凝神倾听。 每一种格调或形式各有其拥护者。
August adj. 威严的；令人敬畏的 n. 八月（简写为Aug） n. (August)人名；(法、葡、西、俄、罗、英、德、瑞典、挪)奥古斯特	There's an august group of statesmen in the auditorium. The august presence of the queen impressed me. Aunt n. 阿姨；姑妈；伯母；舅妈	She has no relations besides an aged aunt. My aunt gave me one of her brooches as a keepsake. I'm duty bound to visit my old aunt. He was being terribly friendly to Aunt Liu. I'm trying to track down my old Aunt Maud. My elder sister had a baby last month, so I am an aunt now. My aunt generally come to see me on Sunday.	她除了有一个年老的伯母以外，再没有亲戚了。 我姑母把她的一支胸针送给我作记念。 我有义务去探望年老的姑妈。 这天他对刘大婶婶态度特别友好。 我正试图寻找到我那年迈的婶婶莫德。 我姐姐上个月生了孩子，所以我现在是阿姨了。 我姨一般是在星期天来看我。

away adv. 离去，离开；在远处	He lives 3 miles away from here. I hope to get away early in the morning. He lives in retirement, away from everyone. I tried to keep the child away from the pool. Far away in the distance, a train whistled. We stand on the top of the dam, casting our eyes far away. The baby is sleeping away quietly. I found him working away in his office. She looked away as peach flooded her cheeks. The radiance of the sunset died away. The sound fainted away in the distance. The neighbors are away. The city is miles away. The count is three and two with two away in the seventh. They lost all their away matches.	他住在距离这里三英里的地方。 我希望一早就动身离开。 他远离大家隐居着。 我设法使孩子远离水池。 远处有一列火车鸣笛。 我们站在大坝的顶上往远处看。 那婴儿一直安静地睡着。 我发现他一直不停地在办公室里工作。 她双颊泛出红晕,视线转向别处。 夕阳的余辉渐渐地消失了。 声音在远处渐渐消失了。 邻居不在家。 这个城市在几英里之外。 现在是第七局，两好球三坏球，两人出局。 他们输了所有的客场比赛。
baby n. 婴儿，婴孩；孩子气的人 vt. 纵容，娇纵；把……当婴儿般对待 adj. 婴儿的；幼小的 n. (Baby)人名；(法、葡)巴比；(英)巴比，芭比(女名)；(俄)巴贝	She gave birth to a fine healthy baby. The mother rocked the baby to sleep in its cradle. back n. 后面；背部；靠背；足球等的后卫；书报等的末尾 vt. 支持；后退；背书；下赌注 vi. 后退；背靠；倒退 adv. 以前；向后地；来回地；上溯；回来；回原处 adj. 后面的；过去的；拖欠的 n. (Back)人名；(西、英、德、法、瑞典、捷)巴克	Three people can sit in the back of this car. Slacken your legs and slowly lie back. Stand back! You're stepping on my toes. The kangaroo uses its back legs to jump. I bought some back issues of science magazines yesterday.	这车的后座可坐3个人。 他靠说话来鼓劲,因为他的背脊在夜里变得僵直,眼下真痛得厉害。 如果你背那些沉重的桶，你的背会痛的。 约翰在这个队打后卫。 不论发生什么事,我都会支持你。 我找不到证据来支持你的解释。 你得倒车，开进车库。 他拒绝放弃自己的立场。 放松双腿, 慢慢向后躺下。 向后站！你踩在我的脚趾头上了。 袋鼠是用牠的后脚在跳。 昨天我买了几本过期的科学杂志。
bad adj. 坏的；严重的；劣质的 n. 坏事；坏人 adv. 很，非常；坏地；邪恶地 n. (Bad)人名；(罗)巴德	Smoking is bad for health. In the recession, our firm went through a bad time. He's gone to bad since he made friends with those people. Their travel plan was cancelled because of the bad weather. His shabby appearance creates a bad impression. It's a very bad thing to leave things around. Bad eyesight is less common in this part. A bad workman quarrels with his tool. I felt bad all day. She's got a bad headache. Leaving his name off the list was a bad slip-up. She has been racked with a bad cough. It's bad to you to read in the sun. Stagflation is bad for stock market valuations. Pogroms, crusades, bad Popes, and crooked preachers on the Old Time Gospel hour have left a bad taste in many people's mouths. I thought it was a very bad article. They protested about the bad food. The decadence of morals is bad for a nation. Your bad skin will tell against you if you want to be an actress. Alison sings bad.	吸烟对身体有害。 我们公司在经济衰退时期历尽艰辛。 他结交那些人后就开始堕落了。 因为天气不好，他们的旅行计划取消了。 他那寒酸的样子给人留下不好的印象。 把东西到处乱扔是很不好的习惯。 这地区很少有视力差的人。 手艺差的工人总是抱怨工具不好使。 我整天觉得不舒服。 她头痛得厉害。 名单上没有他的名字是个严重的疏忽。 她一直为严重的咳嗽所苦。 在阳光下读书是有害的。 滞涨对股票价值是有害的。 在几页文字中，奥巴马强调，管理不善的政府，特别是腐败的或是镇压性的政府是不可能获得他的帮助的。 大屠杀，十字军东征，腐败的天主教皇，和一些歪曲事实的布道者在旧时期给人们留下了太多的负面影响。 我以为那是一篇很低劣的文章。 他们对低劣的伙食提出了抗议。 道德的堕落对国家是不利的。 如果你想当演员的话，你粗糙的皮肤对你是不利的。 口气不清新或让人不舒服会被对方视为身体不健康的标志。 他赞成将坏人关进监狱。 坏人将会受到永远的惩罚。 人必须学会好坏都能承受。 这就是我想要的，而且是迫不及待要得到的。 艾莉森唱得很糟。

The line spacing is the vertical distance between the base lines of two consecutive lines of text. I got two on the first base foul line. He didn't make it past first base. baseball n. 棒球；棒球运动	Rain interrupted our baseball game. Baseball is the national game of the USA. We're rooting for the college baseball team. Baseball is more popular than any other sport in Japan. The baseball game on Tuesday is the most important game this year.	下雨中断了我们的捧球比赛。 棒球是美国全民喜爱的运动。 我们在给学院的棒球队加油。 在日本，棒球比其他任何运动都受人欢迎。 星期二的棒球赛是今年最重要的棒球赛。
basket n. 篮子；（篮球比赛的）得分；一篮之量；篮筐 vt. 装入篮	Several baskets of fruit were eaten at the party. The little girl stared at the little cats tumbling over each other in their basket. Put the scraps of paper in the wastepaper basket. There are just a few apples in the basket. He had put up a basket on a pole in the back yard. He made 48 baskets in the game last night.	宴会上，大家吃掉了好几篮水果。 小女孩凝视着在篮子里互相翻来滚去的小猫。 把纸屑丢进废纸篓。 筐里只剩下有数几个苹果了。 他在后院一根柱子上安一个球篮。 他在昨晚的比赛中独得了48分。
basketball n. 篮球；篮球运动	We will play basketball tomorrow. The basketball players are working out at the gym. We are going to play neither basketball nor volleyball.	我们明天打篮球。 篮球运动员们正在体育馆进行训练。 我们既不将打篮球也不将打排球。
be vt. 是； 有，存在； 做，成为； 发生 n. (Be)人名；(缅)拜；(日)部(姓)；(朝)培；(中非)贝	It is necessary that he be sent there at once. There will be rain in all parts of the country. A successful businessman must be aggressive. She has been in her room for hours. The concert will be in the school hall. They are college students. It promised to be a difficult job. It will be a large church wedding. I'll be on my way very soon. They were supposed to be here an hour ago. He has been there at least twice.	有必要马上派他到那里去。 全国各地将有雨。 一个成功的商人必须有进取心。 她在自己的房间里待了几个小时。 音乐会将在学校的礼堂内举行。 他们是大学生。 看来这是一项困难的任务。 那将是一次大型的教堂式婚礼。 我很快就要上路. 他们应该在一小时以前到达这里。 他至少去过那儿两次。
beach n. 海滩；湖滨 vt. 将…拖上岸 vi. 搁浅；定居 n. (Beach)人名；(英)比奇	We are basking on the beach. They walked along the beach talking and laughing. They are vacationing at the beach. I prefer a sandy beach to a shingle one. He beached the rowboat in front of the cabin. I mean to get into North Inlet, and beach her quietly there.'	我们在海滩上晒太阳。 他们说说笑笑，沿着海滩散步。 他们正在海滨度假。 我喜欢沙滩，不喜欢遍布小石子的海滩。 他将滑艇拖到小屋前面的岸边。 我要将船驶进北汊，让它在那里平稳地登上岸滩。”
bean curd 豆腐	I'd like to add some pepper to the bean curd. Ma Po's bean curd is a specialty in our restaurant.	我想在豆腐里加一点辣椒粉。 本店的当家菜是麻婆豆腐。
bear vt. 结果实，开花（正式） vt. 忍受；承受；具有；支撑 n. 熊 n. (Bear)人名；(英)贝尔	The hunter slashed at the bear with his knife. The bear has lived up to his reputation for stupidity. I can't bear young people casting away their youth. Girls whom can get easily may be hard to bear. The shelf, too weak to bear all the books, collapsed. They will bud and blossom and bear fruit. "A-bomb, H-bomb and nuclear-powered submarine" He was born to an affluent family. It is said that wisdom is born with a man.	猎人挥刀向熊猛烈砍去。 这只熊果然名不虚传，笨得出奇。 我无法忍受年轻人虚掷青春。 容易追求的女子,也许很难忍受。 架子太不结实了，无法负荷所有的书，就被压塌了。 它们将萌芽,开花和结果。 两弹一艇 他生在富裕人家。 有人说智慧是与生俱来的。
beat vt. 打；打败 vi. 打；打败；拍打；有节奏地舒张与收缩 n. 拍子；敲击；有规律的一连串敲打 adj. 筋疲力尽的；疲惫不堪的 n. (Beat)人名；(德)贝亚特	His father beat the disobedient boy. If we don't prepare for the speech contest, they will beat us. He's alive；his heart is still beating. They beat drums to cheer up the players. Had it not been for the PLA, we wouldn't have been able to beat the flood. Every member of the band must follow the beat. We heard the beat of a drum. When you're close to me, I can feel your heart beat. I am completely beat.	他的父亲打那个不听话的男孩。 如果这场演讲比赛我们不做好准备的话,他们就会打败我们。 他还活著－－心脏还在跳。 他们擂鼓给运动员加油。 要不是人民解放军,我们是无法战胜洪水的。 乐队的每个成员都必须跟着拍子演奏。 我们听见敲鼓的声音。 当你走近我的身旁,我能感觉你的心跳。 我累极了。
beautiful adj. 美丽的 出色地 出色的 迷人的 迷人地	She is, as it were, the most beautiful girl I've ever seen. Looking at a beautiful painting always gives one satisfaction. Many beautiful fish are fast disappearing because of the severe pollution. The weather has been beautiful this week. The next section will be devoted to the beautiful result. He produced his beautiful treatment of irrational numbers. You need to get into your artwork to make it look beautiful.	她可说是我见过的最漂亮的姑娘。 观赏一幅美丽的图画使人心满意足。 因为污染严重，许多美丽的鱼类正在面临绝种。 这星期天气一直很好。 在下一节中，我们将给出一个非常好的结果。 他对无理数作了出色的处理。 你需要认真投入你的艺术作品好让它看来出色。
because conj. 因为	I bought the house simply because it was large. An argument was inevitable because they disliked each other so much. I knew she was joking because she had a big grin on her face. Many beautiful fish are fast disappearing because of the severe pollution. The player defaulted in the tournament because of her injury.	我购买了这房子，只是因为它面积大。 争论是不可避免的，因为他们彼此非常厌恶。 我知道她是在开玩笑，因为她脸上堆满笑容。 因为污染严重，许多美丽的鱼类正在面临绝种。 在这次循环赛中,这位运动员由于受伤而弃权。
become vi. 成为；变得；变成 vt. 适合；相称	Vast areas of land have become desert. You may also find that reading has become more fun than work! The entrepreneur has become a news figure. Every one cannot become businessman. This place has become a famous summer resort. This priest wants to become a bishop. The meeting began to become clamorous. I was pleased to see how peaceable the horse had become. The weather became warmer. Class distinctions have become less important during the last 50 years. Such behavior did not become her. Short hair really becomes you.	广大的地区均已变成沙漠。 你或许也会发现阅读已经变成是有趣的事，而不是工作。 这位企业家变成了新闻人物。 不是所有的人都能成为商人。 这个地方已成为一个避暑胜地。 这位牧师想成为主教。 会议开始变得喧哗了。 我很高兴地看到这匹马变得这么温顺。 天气变暖和了。 在过去五十年间，社会等级差别已经变得不那么重要了。 这种举止与她的身份不相称。 你理短发的确很帅。
bed n. 床；基础；河底， 海底 vt. 使睡觉；安置，嵌入；栽种 vi. 上床；分层	Life isn't a bed of roses. Can you give me a bed for the night? The machine rests on a bed of concrete. The water is infiltrating the gravel bed. The brook warbled over its rocky bed. A river rolls the stones along its bed. There sits a flower bed in the middle of the garden. The gardener raked over the bed and removed the weeds . Can Mary bed down with her sister? The inn keeper could bed all the new arrivals. He has bedded more girls than he can remember.	人生并非事事称心如意。 你能给我安置一个床铺过夜吗？ 机器安装在混凝土基座上。 水正渗透进碎石底层。 小溪潺潺流过多石的河床。 河水把河床里的石头冲得翻滚而下。 园子中央有一座花坛。 园林工人翻耙苗圃，除掉杂草。 玛丽可不可以跟她姐妹同睡一床？ 旅店老板能为所有新来的旅客提供住宿。 他睡过的姑娘多得连自己也记不清了。
bedroom n. 卧室 adj. 两性关系的；城郊住宅区的	There was an angry squall from the bedroom. My bedroom is smaller than yours.	卧室里传出一声愤怒的喊叫。 我的卧室比你的小。
beef n. 牛肉；肌肉；食用牛；牢骚 vi. 抱怨，告发；发牢骚 vt. 养；加强	Do you like stewed beef? Africa is exporting beef to Europe. He's got plenty of beef. My beef is that it took too much time. He is forever beefing about that. I 've never quite understood why people beef about the price of dinner. We need new young players to beef up the team.	你喜欢吃炖牛肉吗？ 非洲向欧洲出口牛肉。 他肌肉发达。 我的抱怨是太花时间了。 他没完没了地为那事抱怨。 我一直不太明白人们为什么要抱怨餐费。 我们需要新的队员来加强球队的实力。
beer n. 啤酒 vi. 喝啤酒 n. (Beer)人名；(法、德、俄、罗、捷、瑞典)贝尔；(英、西、南非)[纺] 比尔	He bought a barrel of beer. I like drinking beer.	他买了一桶啤酒。 我喜欢喝啤酒。
before prep. 在…之前，先于 adv. 以前；在前 conj. 在…以前；在…之前	B comes before C in the alphabet. He made a statement before the House of Commons. He always put the interests of others before his own. I'd met him once before. I have seen that film before. I was inspired to work harder than ever before. He used to get some shut-eye before the game. He overlooked the contract before he signed it. I'll try to rush the book through before Saturday.	B在字母表里排在C之前。 他在下议院当众发表了一个声明。 他总把他人的利益放在第一位。 我曾经见过他。 那部电影我以前看过。 我受激励比以往任何时候都更加努力地工作。 他以往常常在比赛前睡一会儿。 他在签字之前仔细阅读了合同。 我会设法在星期六之前把这本书赶紧看完。
beg vt. 乞讨；恳求；回避正题 vi. 乞讨；请求 n. (Beg)人名；(德、塞、巴基)贝格	She begs them not to punish her son severely. The boys hailed passing cars to beg a ride. He knew he had hurt her and begged her to forgive him. He lives by begging. He was too lazy to work and too proud to beg.	她恳求他们不要给他儿子太重的处罚。 这些男孩向过往的汽车呼叫恳求乘车。 他自知伤了她的心而央求她原谅。 他以行乞为生。 他懒于工作,又不屑乞讨。
begin vt. 开始 vi. 开始；首先 n. (Begin)人名；(以、德)贝京；(英)贝让	The meeting will begin at nine. I have to begin with an apology. When did you begin learning English? The leaves begin to fall when autumn comes. She's begun on a new novel.	会议将在九点开始。 我得首先表示歉意。 你何时开始学习英语的？ 秋天来临时, 树叶开始落下。 她已开始着手写一本新小说。
beginning n. 开始；起点 v. 开始；创建（begin的ing形式）	The trees are just beginning to leaf. He was biased against the plan from the beginning. The knowledge of sin is the beginning of salvation. We have already made a good beginning. English democracy had its beginning in the Magna Charta. He presented a new concept of the beginning of the universe. Fr.Sergio Ticozzi has recently finished his manuscript on the biographies of PIME fathers in Hong Kong from the very beginning of the mission. Stylistically, this image has undergone constant changes in China, beginning with a formative phase mainly relying on the stylistic influence from India. That’s why, in this beginning stage of my new habit, I've been focusing on pleasure. I have some problem about efficiency in my beginning term.	树刚刚开始长叶子。 他从一开始就对这个计划有偏见。 认罪是得救的开端。 我们已经有了一个良好的开端。 英国的民主起源於大宪章。 他提出了一种宇宙起源的新概念。 在香港工作的会士传记，包括最早期在香港开展传教工作的传教士之生平及工作实录。 半跏思惟像在中国发展的进程，从早期样式化的生硬造型，一方面接受外来形式的影响，一方面又融入民族的传统理念，开始佛像民族化的进程。 这就是为什么在我刚开始锻炼的时候，我总是把焦点放在锻炼的乐趣上。 最近时间安排上有些问题，导致了效率低下。
behind prep. 落后于；支持；晚于 adv. 在后地；在原处 n. 屁股	Who is the girl standing behind Richard? The train was 10 minutes behind time. Britain is behind Japan in developing modern technologies. Behind your every action is self-interest. The police were hard behind the escapees. He caught up with the parade and walked behind. The lights of the city were left behind us soon as we drove along the street. You'll lag behind if you don't study harder. He didn't want to fall behind in his lessons. I fell behind in my payments. She was never behind in offering advice. Little Tom gave him a kick in the behind.	站在理查德后面的那个姑娘是谁？ 火车晚到了十分钟。 在发展现代技术方面英国落后于日本。 你的每一行动都出于个人私利。 警察正在紧追逃犯。 他赶上了游行队伍，跟在后面走。 我们驾车沿着街道一路疾驶,都市的灯光不久就被抛在我们后面。 你要是不努力学习,就会落后的。 他不想在功课方面落后。 我付款逾期了。 她在出谏言献策方面从不落于人后。 小汤姆在他屁股上踢了一脚。
believe vi. 信任；料想；笃信宗教 vt. 相信；认为；信任	We believe in his ability. Some people believe in God and others don't. Some people believe poverty engenders crime. They believe it is essential to defy convention.	我们相信他的才干。 有人相信上帝; 有人则不相信。 有人认为贫困生罪恶。 他们认为反抗流俗是绝对必要的。
below adv. 在下面，在较低处；在本页下面 prep. 在…下面 n. (Below)人名；(英、德、芬、瑞典)贝洛	His income is well below the average. The class has dropped below ten students this year. Please do not write below this line. The information below was compiled by our correspondent. The captain told the sailors to go below.	他的收入大大低于平均水平。 今年这个班的学生降到了10人以下。 请不要写到这条线下面。 以下资料是我们的记者收集整理的。 船长叫水手们下到舱里去。
beside prep. 在旁边；与…相比；和…无关	I set a chair beside him and sat down. The little girl is sitting beside her mother. Our achievements seem small beside his. Money seems unimportant when setting beside the joys of family life. The discussion is beside the matter at hand. What you said may be right, but it is beside the question.	我在他旁边放了一把椅子然后坐下了。 小女孩正坐在她妈妈旁边。 与他的成就相比我们的就显得微不足道了。 与天伦之乐相比,金钱显得微不足道。 这种讨论与本题无关。 你所说的也许是对的，但是与本题无关。
best n. 最好的人，最好的事物；最佳状态 adj. 最好的 adv. 最好地 vt. 打败，胜过 n. (Best)人名；(英、西、德、葡、法)贝斯特	The facilities were not ideal but we managed as best we could. He's difficult at the best of times usually he's impossible. You had best not accept the offer. Take whatsoever measures you consider best. He would try to best his previous time. Any stigma will do to best a dogma.	设备不理想，但我们已经尽了最大的努力。 他即使在情绪最好的时候，都很难相处－－平常就更令人受不了了。 你最好是不要接纳这要求。 采取任何你认为最好的措施。 他竭尽全力去打破自己以前的纪录。 一点漏洞，足可打破教条。
best-seller n. 畅销书；畅销唱片	He is writing a sequel to his latest best seller. Not all on the best?seller list are good.	他正在写他的最新畅销书的续集。 不是所有的畅销书都是好书。
better n. 长辈；较好者；打赌的人（等于bettor） adv. 更好的；更多的；较大程度地 adj. 较好的 vt. 改善；胜过 vi. 变得较好 n. (Better)人名；(西、瑞典、德)贝特尔	Her father transferred her to a better school. The union struck for better work conditions. You must pay extra for a better seat. You would write better if you had a good pen. You'll like it better when you understand it more. His solution of his debt enabled him to better his daily life. He had tried hard to better his status, but failed. We had hoped for better.	她父亲把她转到了一所更好的学校。 工会为争取更好的工作条件而罢工。 如要较好的座位必须另加钱。 要是有枝好笔，就能写得更好。 当你对它更了解时，你就会更喜欢它。 他还清了债，可以过好点儿的日子了。 他努力设法改善自己的地位,但未能成功。 我们曾希望情况好转。
between prep. 在…之间 adv. 在中间	Children must attend school between 5 and 16. There is a generation gap between my parents and I. She tried to intervene between her husband and son. One town ends where the next begins and there's a road that runs between.	5至16岁的孩子必须上学。 我父母和我之间有代沟。 她想调解丈夫和儿子之间的争吵。 一个城镇连接着另一个城镇,两者之间有一条路。
big adj. 大的；重要的；量大的 adv. 大量地；顺利；夸大地 n. (Big)人名；(土)比格	New York is a big commercial city. His business yields big profits. Don't cry, you are a big boy now. The big moment has come at last! The big thing is that you know what you want. He's got a lot of big ideas about how to change the system. That rock and roll band is very big in Chicago. You need to think big(= aim to achieve a lot). As for us, we mustn't talk big in our external propaganda. The band comes over big with pop fans. With that new promotion he's now one of the bigs in the company.	纽约是一座大的商业城市。 他的生意带来巨大的利润。 别哭，你现在已经是大男孩了。 重要的时刻终于到来了！ 重要的是你必须知道自己想要什么。 就如何改变体制，他有一些远大的想法。 那个摇滚乐团在芝加哥很受欢迎。 你要敢想。 在我们自己方面，对外宣传不要夸大。 该乐队受流行音乐歌迷欢迎大为成功。 通过那次得晋升，他现在是公司的杰出员工之一。
bike n. 自行车；脚踏车 vi. 骑自行车（或摩托车） n. (Bike)人名；(土、土库、塞)比克	I've decided to buy that bike. The lost bike was discovered at the bus stop. John's parents vetoed his plan to buy a motor bike. This morning on my way to school, I saw a motorbike hit a man on a bike. Our boss loves to bike for an excursion. She did not dare to bike down the abrupt slope.	我已决定购买那辆自行车。 丢了的脚踏车在公车站找到了。 约翰的父母不同意他买摩托车。 今天上班路上看到摩托车撞了一个骑车人。 我们老板喜欢骑自行车去郊游。 她不敢骑著自行车冲下陡峭的斜坡。
bill n. [法] 法案；广告；账单；[金融] 票据；钞票；清单 vt. 宣布；开账单；用海报宣传	A 10% service charge is added on to the bill. I have a 5-dollar bill. A bill came along with the package. After a long debate the bill was passed. A bill of fare is very helpful to TV viewers. he used a bill to prune branches off of the tree. We'll bill you next week for your purchases. I can't pay for the books now. Will you bill me (for them) later? Please bill goods in the store. She is billed to appear as Jane. Bill Gates is an American citizen.	帐单上包括了百分之十的服务费。 我有一张5美元的钞票。 清单与包裹一并到达。 经长时间的辩论，议案获得通过。 节目单对电视观众来说非常有用。 他用钩镰从树上剪除枝条。 下周我们将把你购买的物品开账单给你。 这些书我现在不能付款，事後给我寄帐单来好吗? 请写出商店的商品目录。 据海报说，她扮演简爱。 比尔·盖茨是美国公民。
billion n. 十亿；大量 num. 十亿 adj. 十亿的 n. (Billion)人名；(法)比利翁	It took them more than one billion dollars to complete the project. Some computers can perform over a billion computation a second. The human brain contains several billion nerve cells, which are connected with one another by fine nerves.	完成这个工程花费了他们十亿多美元。 有些计算机一秒钟能完成超过十亿次运算。 人类的大脑含有几十亿个神经细胞，这些细胞由纤细的神经将彼此连接起来。
biology n. （一个地区全部的）生物；生物学	He specializes biology. We have a biology lesson tomorrow. He is an environmentalist with a passion of the biology and geography of the region. He is knowledgeable about the biology of the honeybee.	他主修生物学。 明天我们有堂生物学课。 他是一个环保人士，对这个地区的生物和地理很有热情。 他对蜜蜂的生活规律知之甚多。

I was eighteen on my last birthday.	生日那天，我收到一套园艺工具。 他送给她一件昂贵的毛皮衣服作为生日礼物。 汤姆的生日就在这个星期。 下星期一是我二十一岁的生日。 我已经过了18周岁了。

That young boy of hers is quite a handful. The bell boy will take you to your room.	那个男孩大约有十岁。 那块石头差点儿砸到那个男孩。 别哭，你现在已经是大男孩了。 她偏爱她的小儿子。 她的小儿子是一个很难管教的孩子。 这位青年服务员会引您去您的房间。
bread n. 面包；生计 vt. 在…上洒面包屑	They had nothing to eat but stale bread. I had a frugal meal of bread and cheese last night. Bread the pork chops before frying them.	除了陈面包外，他们没有别的东西可吃。 我昨晚吃了只有面包和奶酪的便餐。 炸猪排前先在上面撒一点面包碎屑。
break vi. 打破；折断；弄坏；削弱 vt. （使）破；打破（纪录）；（常指好天气）突变；开始 vi. （嗓音）突变；突破；破晓；（价格）突然下跌 n. 破裂；间断；（持续一段时间的状况的）改变；间歇	If you discover a fire, break the glass to sound the fire alarm. To frighten the dog, he broke a twig from the tree. What shocked the workers was that the boss had broken his promise. The spy had finally broken the code. One hates to break with an old friend. When she went to break the news to Harriet, however, Emma found her quite unperturbed by it. Their good cheer broke after repeated setbacks. Stock prices broke when the firm suddenly announced layoffs. The cold spell broke yesterday. A break in the pipe was found out. There is a break during the performance for the audience to take a rest. The audience certainly want the television programming without commercial breaks. The dog made a break toward the open field. He finally got the big break in life.	如果你发现了火灾,打碎玻璃去弄响火警铃报警。 为了吓唬那只狗,他从树上折了一根小树枝。 工人们感到震惊的是,老板竟然违背了诺言。 那个间谍最终破译了密码。 人都不喜欢跟老朋友绝交。 可是,当爱玛委婉地把这个消息透露给哈里特时,却发现哈里特并没有因此感到不安。 他们的热诚在接二连三的挫折之后消失殆尽 当公司突然宣布裁员时，股票价格便大跌 寒流昨天就结束了 管道上有一处裂缝。 演出中有一次中场休息，让听众们稍事休息。 观众们当然想看没有插商业广告的电视节目。 狗向田野冲去 他一生中最后走了好运。
breakfast n. 早餐；早饭 vi. 吃早餐 vt. 为…供应早餐	We were having breakfast. He seldom eats breakfast. She juiced an orange for her breakfast. Mr. Smith left for London after breakfast. We breakfasted early. We will breakfast on cereal and toast. I am going to breakfast with them tomorrow.	我们正在吃早餐。 他很少吃早餐。 她用一只橙子榨汁作早餐饮料。 史密斯先生吃过早餐后就动身去伦敦了。 我们很早吃早餐。 我们早餐吃谷物和吐司面包。 明天我将与他们共进早餐。
breathe vi. 呼吸；低语；松口气；（风）轻拂 vt. 呼吸；使喘息；流露；低声说	Fish cannot breathe out of water. It is difficult to breathe at these altitudes. We breathe through the nasal passage. Promise me you won't breathe a word of this to anyone. His poems breathe sentimentality. His enthusiasm breathed new life into the company.	鱼离开水就不能呼吸。 在这些高的地方很难呼吸。 我们通过鼻腔呼吸。 答应我别将此事泄漏给任何人。 他的诗歌流露多愁善感的情调。 他的热情给公司注入了新的生命。
bridge n. 桥；桥牌；桥接器；船桥 vt. 架桥；渡过 n. (Bridge)人名；(英)布里奇	The bridge is not strong enough to allow the passage of vehicles. I think I'm lost; I can't find the bridge. They are a link to the past and a bridge to the future. The new bridge will link the Olympic Village with the rest of the Olympic Park. I have not the least idea about how to play bridge. Sometimes they played bridge together. She has bright eyes and high nose bridge. She wore spectacles over the bridge of her nose. They will bridge it over with planks. This helped to bridge over our difficulties. He did a lot to bridge over his difficulties . The decision is an attempt to bridge the distance between the rich and poor. The price gap is too wide to bridge.	这座桥不够牢固，车辆不能通行。 我想我是迷路了，我找不到那座桥了。 它们是联系过去的纽带，又是通向未来的桥梁。 这座新桥将会成为连接奥运村和余下奥林匹克公园的纽带。 我一点儿不知道怎样打桥牌。 有时他们在一起打桥牌。 她有一双明亮的眼睛和高高的鼻梁。 她在鼻梁上架了副眼镜。 他们将用木板在其上方架桥。 这帮助我们渡过了困难。 为渡难关他做了许多。 这个决定旨在缩短贫富间的差距。 价格差距太大，无法弥合。
bright adj. 明亮的，鲜明的；聪明的；愉快的 adv. 明亮地；光明地；欢快地 n. 车头灯光 n. (Bright)人名；(英)布赖特	The bright moonlight showed the Taj Mahal in all its glory. He grew up in the country, but then found he preferred the bright lights. He is not bright, but he always works hard. The class are, in general, very bright. What a nice bright day! The guard blew his whistle,waved his bright green flag. Foresight tells us that China has a bright future. We must leave bright and early in the morning. You look better in bright colors like orange and red. I wore my caot,with golden lining,bright colours shining,worderful and new.	泰姬陵在明亮的月光下显得光彩夺目。 他在乡村长大，但後来觉得很喜欢繁华的都市生活。 他并不聪明，但工作总是勤勤恳恳。 总的说来, 这个班级的学生都很聪明。 今天天气多晴朗！ 卫兵吹起哨,舞动起鲜艳的绿旗。 远瞻未来, 中国有着光明的前途。 我们必须一大清早就离开。 你穿亮色的衣服感觉更好看，比如橙色和红色就不错。 穿上彩衣，镶金色毛带，神奇而鲜艳亮色有光彩。
bring vt. 拿来；带来；促使；引起；使某人处于某种情况或境地 n. (Bring)人名；(英、瑞典)布林	She brought her boyfriend to the party. Rot it! I forgot to bring my book with me. Floods brought destruction to the vally. Smoke and flames brought the neighbors. He wondered what brought her to see him. Indigestion may bring about this disease.	她带着男朋友来参加聚会。 糟了!忘记带书来了。 洪水给山谷造了大灾害。 浓烟和火焰引起了邻居们的注意 他想知道是什么事使她想和他见面。 消化不良可能引起这种病。
Britain n. 英国；不列颠	Britain has always had a large navy, called the Royal Navy. In politics Britain has preferred evolution to revolution. The Chancellor of the Exchequer is the minister in charge of finance in Britain. Mr. Heath is the former Prime Minister of Britain. Britain was colonized by the Romans. Britain is a brief name of The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland. The class are doing a project on the Roman occupation of Britain. The United Kingdom consists of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.	英国一直有一支强大的海军，称为皇家海军。 在政治上，英国喜欢渐进而不喜欢革命。 英国财政大臣是负责财政的大臣。 希思先生是英国前任首相。 不列颠曾沦为罗马人的殖民地。 不列颠是大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国的简称。 这个班在进行一项关于古罗马人占领不列颠的研究。 联合王国由大不列颠和北爱尔兰组成。
British adj. 英国的；英国人的；大不列颠的 n. 英国人	British manufacturing industry has been running down for years. The American Congress corresponds to the British Parliament. The British Isles lie in northwest Europe. The king laid British tribes under tribute. The British character is often said to be phlegmatic. I, dare say you are British but you still need a passport to prove it. The Americans spell some words differently from the British. He speaks British English.	英国的制造业多年来一直在走下坡路。 美国的国会相当于英国的议会。 不列颠群岛位于欧洲北部。 国王强迫不列颠各部族向他进贡。 英国人的性格常说成是冷漠的。 我相信你是英国人，但仍需有护照加以证明。 美国人拼写某些单词不同于英国人。 他说英国英语。

brush n. 刷子；画笔；毛笔；争吵；与某人有效冲突；灌木丛地带；矮树丛；狐狸尾巴 vt. 刷；画； vi. 刷；擦过；掠过；（经过时）轻触	He painted the wall with a brush. The painter swept a brush over his canvas. I'll give my coat a good brush. The light wind gently brushed her cheek. She is scouring the floor with a brush. I'll have to give my shoes a brush. He brushed the dust off his clothes. A cat brushed against her leg in the darkness.	他用刷子涂墙。 画家的画笔在画布上飞掠。 我要把我的衣服好好刷一下。 让我们把剩下的灌木丛清除掉。 他和邻居发生了一点摩擦。 今天早晨她跟老板大吵了一顿。 我们每天应该至少刷两次牙。 微风轻拂着她的脸颊。 她正在用刷子擦地板。 我必须把我的鞋擦一下。 他掸掉衣服上的灰尘。 不必麻烦动了,我想我能擦身挤过去。 黑暗中,一只猫蹭着了她的腿。

As the final examinations draw near, students begin to busy themselves with reviewing.	他正忙于处理一些重要的事情。 他正忙于准备旅行。 这商店濒临近一条繁忙的街道。 在繁忙的交叉路口，车辆来往正处于高峰。 我想给库柏先生打个电话，但一直占线。 为了把烦恼忘却，他让自己忙于花园的工作。 当期末考试即将来临时，同学们开始忙于复习。

buy vt. 购买；获得；贿赂 vi. 买，采购 n. 购买，买卖；所购的物品 n. (Buy)人名；(法)比伊	Money can't buy happiness. I bought him a drink in return for his help. I'd like to buy a strong household bleach. That shirt was a really great buy.	金钱买不来幸福。 我请他喝酒以酬谢他的帮助。 我想买强力家用漂白剂。 别从那无赖手里买旧车。 他们牺牲自由换取和平。 她企图以滔滔不绝的谈话来拖延时间。 值得高兴的是有些人并不接受贿赂。 有很多人进店但却不购物。 这是一笔价钱合算的买卖。 这个衬衫真是便宜货。

bye int. 再见 n. 轮空；次要的东西 adj. 次要的 n. (Bye)人名；(挪)比埃；(中)拜(广东话·威妥玛)；(英)拜伊；(瑞典)比耶	Good bye, and take care! Look after yourself, Bye! Bye for now!	再见，多保重！ 自己当心点。再见！ 那就再见了！
cabbage n. 卷心菜，甘蓝菜，洋白菜；（俚)脑袋；（非正式、侮辱）植物人（常用于英式英语）；（俚）钱，尤指纸币（常用于美式俚语）	He is busy pricking out some cabbage seedlings. Cabbage could be eaten raw in salads. I like to cook dishes with cabbage. The cabbage germinated within a week. Best buy of the week are carrot and cabbage, which are plentiful and cheap.	他正忙于移植一些卷心菜秧。 卷心菜可以做成沙拉生吃。 我喜欢用洋白菜做菜。 白菜一星期内就发芽了。 本星期买胡萝卜和洋白菜最合算，因货源充足，价格低廉。
cage n. 笼，兽笼；牢房，监狱 vt. 把…关进笼子；把…囚禁起来 n. (Cage)人名；(法)卡热；(英)凯奇	The old man wants to buy a cage for birds. Is it cruel to confine a bird in a cage? The hamster had got through the wire at the front of its cage. The canary was trilling away in its cage. The lion paced the floor of his cage restlessly. Criminals are kept in the cages on this island. They placed a protective cage over the sapling. You can cage a bird, but you cannot make him sing.	老人想买一个鸟笼。 把鸟关在笼子里残忍不残忍? 仓鼠从其笼子前部的栅栏处钻出去了。 那只金丝雀在笼中鸣啾。 狮子烦躁地在兽笼里走来走去。 刑事犯被关在岛上的牢房里。 他们在树苗上罩上一个保护栏。 你可以关住一只鸟，但你不能使它唱歌。
cake n. 蛋糕；块状物；利益总额 vt. 使结块 vi. 结成块状 n. (Cake)人名；(英)凯克；(塞)察凯	He passed me one fifth of the cake. I often bake chocolate cake by myself.	他递给我五分之一个蛋糕。 我喜欢自己培巧克力蛋糕。
call vi. 呼叫；拜访；叫牌 vt. 呼叫；称呼；召集 n. 电话；呼叫；要求；访问 n. (Call)人名；(瑞典、罗)卡尔；(英)考尔	The shouting boy did not hear his mother call him. I'll call you if you give me a name card. Most people call me Bob. How do I address you? Shortly after we arrived at that hotel, we made a call back home. Tomorrow I'll pay a call on him. The President made a call for national unity. The call of this bird is very loud. Welcome every call as an opportunity, not an interruption. But God has shown me that I should not call any man impure or unclean. She called to her father for help. I'll certainly call on you if I come again.	大声叫嚷的孩子听不到妈妈的叫唤。 给我一张名片吧,我会打电话给你。 大家叫我鲍勃,我怎么称呼你? 我们到达旅馆不久,就马上打电话回家。 明天我将要去拜访他。 总统号召全国人民团结起来。 这只鸟的叫声很响亮。 把每次来电看作一次机会，而非打扰。 但神已经指示我，无论什么人，都不可看作俗而不洁净的。 她向她父亲喊叫求救。 再来的话,一定去拜访你。

can vt. 将…装入密封罐中保存 aux. 能； 能够； 可以； 可能 n. 罐头； （用金属或塑料制作的）容器； （马口铁或其他金属制作的）食品罐头	You can count on me. How can you say that? I don't have a pen. Can yon lend me one? As long as he comes,the problem can be solved.	你可以指望我。 你怎么可以这样说？ 我没有笔,你能借我一支吗? 只要他来,问题就能解决。
can not 不能；不可以	He is an interested party and can not serve on the jury. One can not learn a language well unless one works hard. I cannot comprehend this phrase. You cannot enter a military base without a permit. Every one cannot become businessman. I can not but be gay in such a jocund company.	他是与案件有关的当事人，不能做陪审团的成员。 学好一种语言非下苦功不可。 我无法理解这个片语。 无通行证者不得擅入军事基地。 不是所有的人都能成为商人。 我和如此快乐的同伴在一起岂能不乐。

People from many countries immigrated to the United States and Canada.	我那时候在加拿大。 枫叶是加拿大的象征。 这座城市位于加拿大的西北部。 她将从加拿大动身去拉丁美洲。 许多国家的人移居到美国和加拿大。

We accepted their challenge to a baseball game. He ignored the sentry's challenge to halt. Their legal challenge was unsuccessful. Nowadays no one will challenge the fact that the earth is round. New competitors are emerging to challenge the old economic arrangements. The sentry challenged the stranger at the gates. I did not think he was right, so I challenged him.	对我们大多数人来说,横渡这条充满危险的大河确实是个挑战。 他接受朋友提出的挑战，游过这条河。 我们接受了他们棒球邀请的挑战。 他不理睬哨兵喝令止步的盘问。 他们的法律质疑未获成功。 现在没有人会对地球是圆的这一事实提出异议。 新的竞争对手正在崛起，向旧的经济布局挑战。 哨兵查问在门口的陌生人。 我认为他是不对的，因此向他提出质询。
chance n. 机会，际遇；运气，侥幸；可能性 vt. 偶然发生；冒……的险 vi. 碰巧；偶然被发现 n. (Chance)人名；(英)钱斯	That would be a daunting task with little chance of success. Is there any chance of getting tickets for tonight's performance? Please give me a chance to explain. I never miss a chance of playing football. We may lose a lot of support, but that's a chance we'll have to take. I met her quite by chance. A chance meeting brought the two old friends together again. If it should chance to rain we'll take a taxi home. Perhaps you might chance on the dictionary at some old bookstall. We were very lucky to chance on him in the reading room. It may be risky but we will chance it anyhow. We'll have to chance meeting an enemy patrol.	那样做的话任务过于艰巨,且成功的可能性微乎其微。 有可能得到今晚演出的票吗? 请给我个机会让我解释一下。 我从不错过踢足球的机会。 我们或许会失去很多支持，但这个风险我们必须冒一冒。 我遇见她完全是偶然的。 偶然的相遇使两位老朋友重新聚首。 万一要下雨的话，我们就乘出租车回家。 或许你会碰巧在旧书摊上买到这本辞典。 我们非常幸运地在阅览室里遇到了他。 这可能有危险, 但我们无论如何要冒一冒险。 我们不得不冒著可能遇上敌人巡逻兵的危险。

This is a tremendous change unparalleled in the history of China and of the world. The little boy reached in his pocket and pulled out some change. Can you break this one hundred dollar bill and give me some change? Please telephone me if you are to change the day of our meeting. She had to change her way of life when her baby came on the scene. It is very serious and important, Why do you change horses in midstream. All our previous ideas are now in the melting-pot; our jobs are bound to change radically. If she has once set her face against a thing, nothing will persuade her to change her mind.	他在一瞬间察觉到了这一变化。 天气的变化打乱了我们运动比赛的日程。 这是一个绝大的变化，这是自有世界历史和中国历史以来无可比拟的大变化。 小男孩把手伸进口袋，掏出了一些零钱。 你可以帮我把一百块换成零钱吗? 如果你不得不改变我们会晤的日期，请给我打个电话。 她的孩子出世之后，她不得不改变生活方式。 这是十分严肃而又重要的事。你为什么中途改变计划了？ 我们从前的一切观念都正在改变，我们的工作肯定要有很大变动。 她要是一旦不赞同某事,那就怎么也没法劝她改变主意了。

The value of imports has climbed sharply in the last year. Do you think you can climb that steep cliff? Climb up the tree and chuck the apples down to me. There was a steep climb on the road out of town.	我的花园里长着一些攀缘植物。 每个星期天我们都去爬山。 这条路有几英里向上倾斜得很陡。 去年进口货物的价值急剧上升。 你以为你能爬上那座悬崖峭壁吗？ 爬到树上去把苹果给我扔下来。 市外公路上有一处很陡的上坡路。
clock n. 时钟；计时器 vt. 记录；记时 vi. 打卡；记录时间 n. (Clock)人名；(英)克洛克	The clock shows half past two. This clock has outlasted several owners. The silence was succeeded by the striking of a clock. There must be something wrong with my clock. Workers usually clock off at 5.30. I usually clock in at 8 o'clock. He clocked 9.8 seconds for the 100 metres.	时钟的针指著两点半。 这座时钟的寿命比它的几个主人的寿命都长。 时钟鸣响声打破了寂静。 我的钟一定是坏了。 工人们通常在5时30分下班。 我通常8点钟签到。 他100米跑了9.
close adj. 紧密的；亲密的；亲近的 vt. 关；结束；使靠近 vi. 关；结束；关闭 adv. 紧密地 n. 结束 n. (Close)人名；(西)克洛塞；(英、法)克洛斯	If you close your eyes, you can't see anything. The road was closed to traffic for two days. The hospital closed at the end of last year. He closed his speech with a funny joke. Shares leapt in value from 476p to close at 536p. These measures are aimed at closing the gap between the rich and the poor. She closed her hand over his. Management closed ranks and ostracized the troublemaker. Tim seemed to make up his mind to close with this proposal. I believe you and he were very close friends. The church is close to the school. They felt something close to despair. There is nothing for it but to keep her under close watch. This close italic print is very hard on the eyes. She kept close about the information and none found out. She's always been very close with her money. It was a close match. But you deserved to win, and you did. They live quite close. He came close but she drew back. The girl pressed close to her mother. He soon brought the meeting to a close.	如果你闭上眼睛，就什么也看不见了。 这条路已经封路两天了。 这所医院去年年底关闭。 他用一则有趣的笑话结束了演讲。 股价从476便士猛涨到收盘536便士。 这些措施旨在缩小贫富差距。 她牢牢抓住他的手不放。 管理员使队伍靠拢，将捣乱者清除出去 提姆看上去已经下定决心同意这项提议。 我相信你和他是亲密无间的朋友。 教堂在学校附近。 他们几乎有一种绝望的感觉。 没有任何别的办法,只好把她置于严密的监视之下。 看这种排得很紧的斜体字，很伤人的眼睛。 她对这个信息守口如瓶，没有人发现。 她用钱总是很吝啬。 这是一场势均力敌的比赛，不过你应该赢，而你确实也赢了。 他们住得很近. 他一步步靠近，而她却一步步向后退。 小女孩紧紧地挤在母亲身边。 他很快就结束了会见。
clothes n. 衣服	She has good taste in clothes. It might be appropriate to wear traditional clothes on special occasions. I washed many clothes with my washer last night. Plain, simple clothes are appropriate for school wear.	她对服装有很好的审美眼光。 在某些特定的场合,我们适合穿传统服装。 我昨晚用洗衣机洗了很多衣服。 简单朴素的衣服适合在学校里穿。
cloud n. 云；阴云；云状物；一大群；黑斑 vt. 使混乱；以云遮敝；使忧郁；玷污 vi. 阴沉；乌云密布 n. (Cloud)人名；(法)克卢；(英)克劳德	A cloud is a mass of vapor in the sky. When there are black clouds you can tell it's going to rain. His sudden departure cast a cloud upon our scheme. The sad news of her father's death was the only cloud on an otherwise happy year.	云是天空中的水汽团。 有乌云的时候，就知道快下雨了。 他的突然离去给我们的计划投下一层阴影。 她父亲的死讯是她愉快的一年中唯一伤心的事。
cloudy adj. 多云的；阴天的；愁容满面的	Tonight will be cloudy. In that cloudy sky only one lone star can be seen. It's cloudy today. A drop of milk diffused in the water, and it became cloudy. His judgment can sometimes be a little cloudy.	今天夜间多云。 在那多云的天上，只能看到孤零零的一颗星星。 今天阴天。 一滴奶在水中扩散开来，使水变得混浊不清了。 他的判断可能有时会有些模糊不清。
club n. 俱乐部，社团；夜总会；棍棒；（扑克牌中的）梅花 vt. 用棍棒打；募集 vi. 集资；组成俱乐部 adj. 俱乐部的 n. (Club)人名；(英)克拉布	The tennis club has organized a dance. He is an active member of the school's stamp club. We clubbed together to buy our teacher a present.	网球俱乐部组织了一次舞会。 他是学校集邮俱乐部的一名活跃会员。 在他们的棍棒和拳脚下，我就是一个奴隶。 你可以看出来打梅花K是赢牌的一招。 他是被人用枪托殴打致死的。 我们凑钱给老师买了件礼物。
coat n. 外套 vt. 覆盖…的表面 n. (Coat)人名；(法)科阿	You may hang your coat on the hook. She was wearing a woolen coat, with a cotton blouse underneath. Jane bought a fur coat yesterday. One of the buttons has come off my coat. The wall needs a second coat of paint. Mountain goats have long shaggy coats. The bookshelves were coated with red paint. The table was coated in dust.	你可以把外套挂在钩子上。 她外面穿了一件毛外套，里面穿一件棉布衬衫。 简昨天买了一件裘皮大衣。 我上衣上的一颗扣子掉了。 那面墙需要再刷一层油漆。 山羊的皮毛长且粗糙。 书架上涂了一层红色的油漆。 桌子上覆盖了一层灰尘。

She appeared at the door dressed in a coffee colored silk dressing gown.	他往咖啡里加了些糖。 在你的咖啡里加点奶油吧。 我们吃了甜饼和咖啡。 我更喜欢茶，而不是咖啡。 巴西出口大量咖啡。 她穿了一件咖啡色的绸缎睡衣出现在门口。

This is a coin washing machine.	他往投币孔投入一枚硬币。 他付给我的都是硬币。 父亲在花园里掘出一枚古钱币。 他们获得铸造钱币的授权。 政府决定再多铸造一些一元的硬币。 谁创造的“quiz”这个词呀？ 我们最好不要生造谁也不懂的词语。 硬币的反面压印的是一只鹰。 认识到了硬币的两个面。 这是一台投币式洗衣机。
coke n. 焦炭；可卡因；可口可乐（Coca-Cola） vi. 焦化 vt. 变成焦炭；用麻药使…麻醉	Coke consists mainly of carbon. Without coke iron cannot be smelted.	焦炭的主要成分是碳。 没有焦炭就不能炼铁。
cold adj. 寒冷的；冷淡的，不热情的；失去知觉的 n. 寒冷；感冒 adv. 完全地	We lunched out on cold meat and salad. It was bitterly cold that night. His cold manner holds people off. Our enthusiasm for the plan faded in the cold light of day and we realized how impractical it really was. The dampness is unpleasant,not to mention the cold. Put on your coat, or you may catch a cold. A good sweat often cures a cold. Get out of those wet clothes before you catch cold. John knew the business cold. The actor had his lines down cold.	我们午饭在外面吃的是凉肉和色拉。 那个夜晚,天气十分寒冷。 他的冷淡态度使人们不敢接近他。 经过客观冷静的分析，我们对这个计划的热情消失了，因为我们认识到它实在不实际了。 潮湿就令人不快,更不必说寒冷了。 穿上你的外套,否则你会感冒的。 好好发一次汗往往可以治愈伤风。 把湿衣服脱掉，不然要伤风的。 约翰对此事了如指掌。 这演员把台词背得滚瓜烂熟了。

The natives were intrigued with the colour of our skin. The wind of the autumn colour the maples carmine . He hashed a phrase in order to colour the sentence. News is often coloured. Don't allow personal loyalty to colour your judgement. A judge can't let personal feelings colour his decisions. The leaves start to colour in autumn. She coloured with embarrassment at his remarks.	她把窗台漆上鲜艳的颜色。 他衣服的颜色和我衣服的很相似。 那颜色不适合你的肤色。 颜料经常是各种食物中的添加物。 不论是染料还是颜料都是用来染布的。 这台打印机将输出彩色图表。 儿童喜欢看彩色电视。 当地人对我们的肤色感到好奇。 秋风给枫林涂抹胭红。 他反复推敲一个习语以使该句增色。 新闻报道常常被夸张。 不要因讲义气而影响了你的判断。 法官不能让个人感情影响他的裁决。 树叶在秋天开始变色。 她听到他的话因受窘而脸红了。
come vi. 来；开始；出现；发生；变成；到达 vt. 做；假装；将满（…岁） int. 嗨！ n. (Come)人名；(英)科姆；(阿尔巴)乔梅	The train slowly came to the station. He will come on time even though it rains. They came to a river. The union successfully negotiated increased employer contributions to the health benefits package.	不要低估了吉姆在研究工作中的贡献。 他对公司的成功作出了重要的贡献。 所有捐款，无论数目多么少，我们都深表感谢。 工会成功地让雇主增加对医疗福利的捐赠。

The professor invited his students to his home for conversation.	我倾听他们的谈话。 你和他谈过话了吗？ 乐队的演奏声把我们谈话的声音淹没了。 他自从参加了会话班，法语取得了很大进步。 在日常会话中，你是请求别人做事，而不是"命令"他们。 教授邀请学生们到自己家里会晤。

He was sent to prison for cooking the books.	炊事员去照看炉子里的蛋糕了。 那个夏天他们雇了一个厨子。 他复员以前是一名炊事员。 她今晚要做晚饭吗？ 我发现自己煮是一件很苦恼的事。 你要把蔬菜煮熟还是生吃？ 他们正在努力编造一个理由好实行他们的计划。 他因窜改帐目而入狱。
cookie n. 饼干；小甜点	This cookie is neither sweet nor soft. The child reached for another cookie. We had cookies and coffee.	这块饼干既不甜也不软。 小孩伸手拿取另一片饼干。 我们吃了甜饼和咖啡。
cool adj. 凉爽的；冷静的；出色的 vt. 使…冷却；使…平静下来 vi. 变凉；平息 n. 凉爽；凉爽的空气 adv. 冷静地 n. (Cool)人名；(法)科尔；(英)库尔	A brisk walk in cool weather is invigorating. A cool breeze blew from the lake. Trees cool the air as well as clean it. Mother put the pie at the window to cool it. I tried to cool her down, but she was too angry. I'm going into the woods to cool off. She has a long cry when her favorite doll is broken. He heard a cry for help, and he rushed out of the office. A feeble cry came from the next room.	听到朋友死亡的消息，她难过地哭了。 面对失败，她开始哭了起来。 他大声地叫喊找到了钥匙。 掉进河里的女孩正喊救命呢。 公众对税赋增加表示了强烈抗议。 很快他就听见了外面乌鸦的叫声。 她大哭一场，发泄她的感情。 她心爱的洋娃娃坏了,为此她哭了好长一阵子。 他听到有人喊救命,就冲出了办公室。 从隔壁房间里传来低弱的叫喊声。

When we want to hear something more clearly we cup our hands behind our ears. He would cup his chin in the hollow of his hand when he had something on his mind.	这只杯子是不锈钢做的。 请把这个杯子装满水。 你想喝杯茶吗？ 将有八匹马参赛争夺奖杯。 我们想听得更清晰一些时，就把双手弯成杯状放在耳后。 他有心事时总是把手掌心托住自己的下巴。

cut n. 伤口；切口；削减；（服装等的）式样；削球；切入 vt. [机] 切割；削减；缩短；刺痛 vi. [机] 切割；相交；切牌；停拍；不出席 adj. 割下的；雕过的；缩减的	This knife is not sharp enough to cut the steak. Don't cut your finger on the broken glass. Face round, please, so that I can cut your hair at the back. Please cut out the expense in order to save the money. His cruel remarks cut me deeply. He insisted that we give him the last cut before every deal. The fate of the game will be decided in the final cut of the cards. His cheek was badly scarred by a knife cut. He had a finger cut off by a machine while working. I don't like the cut of his new suit. Before this play is broadcast several cuts must be made.	这把刀子不够利,无法切牛排。 别让碎玻璃割伤你的手。 转一下头, 好让我可以剪你后面的头发。 为了节省钱,请削减开支。 他那无情的话太伤我的心了。 他坚持让我们在每次发牌前都让他来最后切牌。 这局牌的命运将由最后的切牌决定。 他的面颊上留有严重的刀疤。 他在工作时被机器切掉了一个手指。 我不喜欢他那套新衣服的式样。 这个剧目播出前必须经过数次剪辑。

dead adj. 无生命的；呆板的；废弃了的 adv. 完全地 n. 死者	It lay there with its eyes closed, dead as a doornail. He has been dead for two years. The phone went dead. The battery is dead. What a dead place this is! She finished speaking, and there was dead silence in the room. His love for you is dead. The debate is now dead. Latin has become a dead language. Many people say that detente is now a dead letter. He fell with a dead thud. He was dead asleep. You can be dead sure of my innocence. The wind was dead against us. She stopped dead on the stairway.	它躺在那里眼睛闭著，确实死了。 他已死了两年。 电话打不通了。 电瓶没电了。 这地方多没意思! 表演十分乏味. 没有孩子的嬉戏,街道上死气沉沉的。 你看起来累得半死不活的。 我的手指麻木了，解不开结。 我的腿完全没知觉了。 她发言之后,屋内变得鸦雀无声。 他对你的爱情已不复存在。 辩论现已过时。 拉丁语已成为一种死语言。 很多人说缓和国际紧张局势的论调已是明日黄花。 他砰的一声倒了下来。 他酣然大睡。 你绝对可以相信我是无辜的。 风正对着我们吹。 她突然在楼梯上停住了

The falling star described a long curve in the sky.	警察让我描述一下这事是怎样发生的。 语言难以描述那景色之美丽。 他自称是医生。 谁也无法形容她那股鄙夷万分的表情。 我的快乐难以用语言来形容。 流星在空中画出了一道长长的弧线。

He is very good at the description about the characters of different figures in his book. There are boats of every description on the lake. desert vt. 遗弃；放弃；逃跑 vi. 遗弃；开小差；逃掉 n. 沙漠；荒原；应得的赏罚 adj. 沙漠的；荒凉的；不毛的	Two thirds of the country is dry or desert. Some of them died of thirst in the desert. Water can transform a desert into a garden. The baby's mother deserted him soon after giving birth. The villages had been deserted. The price rise caused many readers to desert the magazine. A soldier who deserts in time of war is punished severely.	这个国家有三分之二的地方气候干燥,或者是沙漠。 他们中有些人在沙漠中渴死了。 水能把一片不毛之地变成一座花园。 那个母亲生下他后不久就把他遗弃了。 这些村庄已经荒无人烟了。 价格上涨让使这本杂志丧失了很多读者。 战争期间开小差的士兵要受到严惩。
