You will have to answer for your crimes one day. He has a lot to answer for. We cannot answer for his actions.	我同意，但是我不能代表我的同事们。 我不能保证他诚实。 我愿意担保他能完成这个任务。 你总有一天要因为你的罪行而得到报应的。 他要负责很多事情。 我们不对他的行为负责。
apart from 除…之外；且不说；并且	She lives in seclusion apart from her friend. Apart from the injuries to his face and hands, he broke both legs. Apart from English, we study Russian and Spanish. Whether or not vegetarianism should be advocated for adults, it is definitely unsatisfactory for growing children, who need more protein than they can get from vegetable sources.	她远离朋友，过隐居生活。 他除了脸部和双手受伤以外，两条腿也断了。 除了英语以外，我们还学俄语及西班牙语。 且不说素食主义对成年人合适与否，它对正在成长发育的孩子是绝对不足取的，素食根本不能满足孩子对蛋白质的需求。
as a matter of fact 事实上	As a matter of fact, I've never been there before. As a matter of fact, I didn't know him at all.	事实上我从未到过那儿。 事实上，我根本不认识他。
as a result 结果	As a result, daily output has doubled. He was late as a result of the snow. As a result, we have to water the vegetable garden. It was raining and on that account I wore a hat.	结果日产量翻了一番。 由于大雪他迟到了。 因此我们不得不给菜地浇水。 天正在下雨，因此我戴了一顶帽子。
as soon as 一…就…	I'll write you as soon as I get there. Let us start as soon as he comes. I gave the alarm as soon as I saw the smoke. As soon as his father went out, the boy ran to the cinema. I arranged the flowers in the vase as soon as I came back home. They will post the tickets to me as soon as they receive my cheque.	我一到那儿，就给你写信。 等他一来我们就动身。 我一看见冒烟，就发出了警报。 爸爸刚出门，那男孩就跑向电影院。 一回到家里，我就把花在花瓶里插好。 他们收到我的支票后就立刻把票寄给我。
as far as adv. 至于，直到，远到；就…而言	As far as I know, he is kind. As far as I could remember, I did return him the money. We walked as far as the railroad station. You'll be accompanied as far as the border, thereafter you must find your own way. This is a book, which I dare say, is unequaled as far as translation practice is concerned.	就我所知，他人不错。 就我所能记得的，我确实把钱还给他了。 我们走到火车站那样远的地方。 有人送你到边境，然后你必须自己走了。 就翻译训练而言我认为这是一本无出其右的好书。
as if 犹如，好似	She ran as if the Old Boy were after her. After the rain the corn shot up as if by magic.	她跑得飞快好像魔鬼在追她似的。 雨后玉米苗像变魔术一般的长起来了。
as long as 只要；和…一样长	I don't mind as long as it doesn't rain. As long as live, I will help you. The river is as long as that one. This line is four times as long as that one.	只要不下雨就行了。 只要我活着，我都会帮助你。 这条河和那条河一样长。 这条线是那条线的四倍长。
as though 好像；仿佛	My head feels as though it will split. My neck felt as if someone had put a clamp on it. It seems as though there will be an election soon. He speaks English as though he were an American.	我的头疼得仿佛要裂开似的。 我的脖子痛得仿佛有人在上面夹了一把铁钳子。 看起来好像很快就要选举了。 他讲起英语来好像他是个美国人。
as usual 像往常一样；照例	Mary's out on the racket as usual. I hope that you will back me up as usual. We shook hands as a matter of form. As usual, Doerr's judgement was sound.	玛丽像往常一样外出寻乐去了。 我希望你能像往常一样支持我。 我们照例握握手。 杜尔的判断照例是正确的。
as well 也；同样地；还不如；此外	I write my own songs and I play the guitar as well. The foreman took on ten more men as bricklayers.	我唱自己谱曲的歌，也弹吉他。 工头又雇佣了十多个人作泥瓦匠。
as well as 也；和…一样；不但…而且	He is a friend in word as well as in deed. He shared in my sorrows as well as in my joys.	他是个言行如一的朋友。 他分担我的快乐也分享我的悲伤。
belong to 属于	The Chinese belong to the yellow race. I have every reason to be confident of our victory.	中国人属于黄种人。 我有充分的理由坚信胜利是属于我们的。
be proud of 自豪，高兴；以……而骄傲	I confess to being proud of my son's success. He was proud of what he had done.	我自认以儿子的成功为荣。 他因自己所作的事感到自豪。
be strict with 对…严格	One should be strict with oneself. The coach must be strict with the players.	一个人应对自己要求严格。 教练一定要对球员严格要求。
break away from vt. 放弃；脱离……	Can't you break away from old habits? He's broken away from his family. Jim broke away from his friends, saying "I have got to hit the books." He broke away from that lawless group years ago.	你不能戒除旧习惯吗? 他与家庭断绝了关系。 吉姆离开他的朋友时，说道：“我得回去做功课了。” 他在几年前脱离了那个非法团体。
break down 分解；发生故障；失败；毁掉；制服	The machine must break down at this busy hour. He finally break down under the four-hour's strain.	正忙的时候，机器偏偏又坏了。 在四小时的压力下他终于支持不了。
break in 打断；闯入；训练；使逐渐习惯	The nosy couple broke in on our conversation. Please don't break in on our conversation.	那对好管闲事的夫妇闯入我们的交谈。 请不要打断我们的谈话。
break off 折断；突然停止，暂停	He broke off in the middle of a sentence. The door handle has broken off. She broke off a piece of chocolate and gave it to me. He broke off relations with his family. Let's break off work for a few minutes. Let's break off for half an hour and have some tea.	他一句话只说了一半就停住了。 门的把手断了。 她掰下一块巧克力给我。 他与家庭断绝了一切联系。 我们把工作暂停几分钟。 让我们小憩半小时喝点茶。
break out v. 爆发；突发	A quarrel broke out between them. He predicted that war would break out in the next few years.	他们间爆发了一场争吵。 他预言战争将在下几年中爆发。
break up 打碎，破碎；结束；解散；衰落	The stricken tanker began to break up on the rocks. They decided to break up the partnership.	油轮被击中后撞上礁石,毁了。 他们决定终止合作关系。
bring in 引进；生产；增加	He intends to bring in some reforms. Local residents were angry at not being brought in on (ie not being consulted about) the new housing scheme. Two suspicious characters were brought in. He does odd jobs that bring him in about 30 a week. His freelance work brings (him) in 5000 a year. Experts were brought in to advise the Government. The jury brought in a verdict of guilty.	他打算提出些改革措施。 新的房屋计划未徵询当地居民的意见，他们感到非常气愤。 逮捕了两名嫌疑犯。 他做零工每周可赚约30英镑。 他从事自由职业每年可获5000英镑。 请来了专家担当政府顾问。 陪审团作出有罪的裁决。
bring on 导致；引起；使…发展	His illness followed on the death of his wife. Reading in a poor light may bring on a headache. He will bring a suit against his boss. He challenged my view on that matter.	他的病是因他妻子去世而引起的。 在昏暗的灯光下看书会引起头疼。 他要对老板提出控告。 他就我对那件事的看法提出异议。
bring up 提出；教育；养育；呕出；（船等）停下	These are matters that you can bring up in committee. The couple contrived to bring up their children on a small income.	这些问题你可在委员会中提出。 这对夫妻设法以菲薄的收入把孩子扶养成人。
build up 增进，加强	You should build your arguments on facts. We are planning to set up a publishing house. He tried to build up his strength. The publicity was intended to stoke up interest in her music. We first have to build up our reserves of manpower. The pressure on the enemy is building up quickly. The company has built up a large fund for ages. She could feel the tension building up in his body.	你的论点应建立在事实的基础上。 我们正打算建立一家出版社。 他试图增进体质。 宣传活动旨在增进人们对她的音乐的兴趣。 我们首先得加强人力储备。 对敌人的压力正在迅速加强。 多年来这个公司已积累了大量资金。 她能够感觉到在他身体中逐渐积累起来的张力。
by accident 偶然；意外地	The traffic accident was born almost accidentally. I met him by chance at Canterbury Cathedral.	这个交通事故的发生几乎纯属偶然。 我是在坎特伯雷大教堂偶然地碰到过他。
by air 乘飞机；通过航空途径	I shall travel to New York by air this weekend. The great virtue of air travel is speed.	这个周末我将要乘飞机去纽约旅行。 乘飞机旅行的最大优点是速度快。
by and by 不久以后	It's very likely to clear up by and by. We'll meet again by and by. By and by, the moon began to appear. By and by, however, he began to gain courage. At first he felt it awkward, but by and by he got used to it.	很可能不久要放晴了。 我们不久又会再见。 不久，月亮开始出现。 不过，后来他逐渐胆大了。 起先他感到棘手，后来就习惯了。
by day 在白天；日间	They lay by during the heat of the day.	他们在白天最热的时候停下来休息。
by the way 顺便说说，顺便问一下；在途中	By the way, I love your hair that way. By the way,here is a little token of my affection.	顺便说一句，我喜欢你的发式。 顺便说一下，这是我的一点儿小意思。
call for 要求；需要；提倡；邀请；为…叫喊	The situation calls for prompt action. The negotiations will call for considerable dexterity. They called for a radical reform of our tax system. We will call for her early tomorrow morning. The forecast calls for snow flurries later tonight. The regulations call for working in three shifts. The bricklayer on the roof was calling for more tiles.	形势所迫，必须立即采取行动。 进行这些谈判需要相当圆滑的手腕。 他们要求对税收制度进行根本改革。 我们明天一早就去接她。 天气预报报道今天后半夜将有阵雪。 章程规定按三班制工作。 房顶上的瓦工招呼再送些瓦上去。
call in 召集；召来	Summon the pupils together in the school hall. Call up reserves and as many recruits as possible. How many friends did you call in? We are all invited to take part in the pageant. I found him working in his library when I called. Our neighbor popped in for a short call. I was paging through a magazine when he came in. A dog scratched at the door to be let in. We pay a flat rate for every telephone call. I need to call my jobber to sell some shares. The library is calling in all outstanding books. They have not been as umbrageous in demanding their territory back. Certain bank notes were called in. I don't think he will call back his promise.	把学生召集到学校的礼堂里。 意思就是召集后备部队和尽可能多的新兵。 你邀请了多少朋友？ 我们全都被邀请参加这次盛典。 我去拜访他时看到他在书房里工作。 我们的邻居突然来做短暂的拜访。 他进来时我在翻阅一本杂志。 狗嚓嚓地抓门要想进来。 我们打电话每次付相同的费用。 我需要给我的股票经纪人打电话卖些股票。 图书馆要求归还所有逾期的图书。 他们从未以如此好战的态度要求归还领土。 通告收回某种钞票。 我认为他不会收回他的诺言。
call on 访问，拜访；号召，请求	He called on the workers to fight for their rights. I'd like to call on you this Sunday. I'm going to call on one of my former classmates. You'd better call on your friends to help you.	他号召工人为争取自己的权利而斗争。 我想这个星期天来找你。 我要去看望我的一位老同学。 你最好请朋友来帮你。
call up 打电话给；召集；使想起；提出	Forgive me so early to call up you please. She can still call up scenes of childhood. Round up a few friends to help you. Call up reserves and as many recruits as possible. He was called up at the beginning of the war. The government is calling up men for the army.	请原谅我这么早给你打电话。 她仍能想起儿时的情景。 召集一些朋友来帮你忙。 意思就是召集后备部队和尽可能多的新兵。 战争开始时他就被征召入伍了。 政府正在征召入伍。
care for 关心，照顾；喜欢	The sick child was well cared for night and day. It seemed to be her mission to care for her brother's children. I'm fond of her but I don't care for her husband. He likes pop; he doesn't care for classic music.	那个生病的孩子日夜受到很好的看护。 照顾她兄弟的孩子似乎成了她一生的使命。 我喜欢她，但不喜欢她丈夫。 他喜欢流行歌曲，不喜欢古典音乐。
carry off 夺去；获得；使丧命；成功地处理	A man came into the house and yanked him off. He carried off the treasure from the island. John carried off all the prizes in the contest. The chairman tried to carry his point.	一个人走进屋子把他带走了。 他从岛上带走了财富。 约翰获得了比赛的全部奖品。 主席企图使他的观点获得赞成。
carry on 继续 参与	We'll carry on our conversation tomorrow. After a short break, the match went on.	我们明天将继续进行会谈。 经过短暂的休息，比赛继续进行。
carry out vt. 执行，实行；贯彻；实现；完成	He will carry out his plan. He hasn't the funds to carry out his design. He made no attempt to carry out his undertaking. Officers must carry out the wishes of members.	他要执行他的计划。 他没有资金来施行他的设计。 他无意实现他的诺言。 官员们必须实现委员们的愿望。
catch up with 赶上，追上；逮捕；处罚	She walked too slowly to catch up with us. I have to work hard to catch up with the other students. Old age and infirmity had begun to catch up with him.	她走得太慢，跟不上我们。 要想赶上其他同学，我得特别努力才行。 他开始显出年老体衰的样子了。
change into 变成；把…变成；兑换	She came from nowhere into national fame. A tadpole is transformed into a frog.	她从无名之辈变成全国闻名。 蝌蚪变成青蛙。
check in 报到，记录；到达并登记	Where can I check in? Passengers should check in for flight BA 125 to Berlin. Passengers should check in one hour before their flight time at the latest. You can check in at the reception desk. Is there a place we can check in our coats? I'm just going to check in these books at the library.	在哪儿办理登记手续？ 去柏林的英航125航班旅客请办理登机手续。 乘客至迟应在班机起飞前一小时办理登机手续。 你可到接待处登记报到。 有暂存大衣的地方吗? 我要去图书馆还这些书。
check out 检验；结账离开；通过考核；盖章	Mrs. Hyde has checked out this morning. The hotel insists that guests check out of their rooms before 11 o'clock in the morning. Mr Cass checked out before they reached the hospital.	海德夫人今天上午已经结帐走了。 这家旅馆一定要客人在上午11点钟前结帐后离开房间。 他们到医院之前卡斯先生就死了。
clear up 清理；放晴；整理；打扫	It's very likely to clear up by and by. Let me clear up the broken glass before someone walks on it. We should clean up the past-due bills. I must spend a few days to clear off all my work. It cleared up soon after the rain. I believe it will be cold and clear. I'd like to clear up two or three points. The water of the lake is green and clear.	很可能不久要放晴了。 在有人踩上碎玻璃之前让我把它清扫一下。 我们应该清理逾期票据。 我必须用几天功夫来清理我所有的工作。 雨後天气迅速放晴。 看来明天要转冷放晴了。 有两三个问题我想澄清一下。 湖水碧绿澄清。
come about v. 发生；产生；改变方向	How did it come about that he knew where we were? Expected or required but not yet having come about. How did this come about?	他是怎么知道我们在什麽地方的呢？ 期待发生的被期望或要求但仍未发生的 这是怎么发生的?
come across v. 偶遇；无意中发现；讲得清楚明白；给人…印象	We've just come across an old friend. Perhaps I shall come across him in France. I came across this book in an old bookstore in London. He spoke for a long time but his meaning did not really come across.	我们刚碰到了一位老朋友。 也许我会在法国遇见他。 我在伦敦一家旧书店里发现了这本书。 他讲了很长时间，但他的意思没有人真正理解。
come back 回来；记起；恢复原状，重新流行	There is no telling when she will come back. He came back in the late afternoon. I came back from my holiday with renewed strength. The holiday gave him back his good spirits. Vera cast her mind back to her wedding day. It brought back to me -ies of my schooldays. Sometime you might want to come back in some way. That they've hung on and come back is amazing. Though Ford does well with some models such as the Mustang sports car, it is weak in minivans and the smaller saloons that are coming back into fashion. He hit back at his opponents in the debate. Every time I express an opinion, she argues back.	说不准她什么时候回来。 他在傍晚回来。 我度假回来，体力得到恢复。 假期使他恢复了愉快的情绪。 维拉回想起她婚礼日的情景。 它使我回想起我的学生时代。 有朝一日你会以某种方式卷土重来。 他们能够坚持下去并卷土重来这个事实是令人惊异的。 尽管，福特在运动汽车野马运作良好，而在如今重新流行起来的迷你型和小型轿车方面却是其软肋。 在辩论中他积极反驳对手。 每当我发表意见时，她总是反驳。
come down 下来，降落；流传下来；倒塌；落魄，失势	The grain crop has gone down this year. Sale is down a bit due to the revaluation. He landed on his feet after being down and out. Since he lost the job, he has really come down in the world. The tals have come down from the old times. Few of his works will go down to posterity.	今年的粮食作物产量下降了。 由于货币升值销售额有下降。 经过贫困潦倒以后，他重新站了起来。 自从他失业以后，他的确过着穷困潦倒的生活。 这些传说是从古老的年代流传下来的。 他的作品没有几件会流传到后世。
come from 来自；出生于	Most of these children come from broken families. They love paintings from the Orient. These English words derive from Greek. This chopstick dance comes from Mongolia.	这些孩子中的多数人来自婚姻破裂的家庭。 他们喜欢来自东方的绘画。 这些英文字起源于希腊文。 筷子舞起源于蒙古的舞蹈。
come in 进来；到达；流行起来	He often asked Philip to come in for a chat. His wife dashed in breathlessly. The searchlights were ineffectual in the fog. The new traffic regulations have come into play.	他经常邀菲利浦进来闲谈。 他的妻子上气不接下气地冲了进来。 探照灯在雾中不起作用。 新的交通规则起作用了。
come off 举行，成功；表现；脱离	These stains won't come off, I'm afraid. The tennis finals will come off tomorrow. Did your proposed trip to Rome ever come off? Her attempt to break the world record nearly came off. He always comes off badly in fights. A button has come off my coat.	我看，这些污点去不掉。 网球决赛将于明天举行。 你提出的到罗马旅行，后来去了吗？ 她想要打破世界纪录，已接近成功。 他在拳击比赛中总是很糟糕。 我的大衣掉了一颗扣子。
come on v. 快点；开始；要求；上演；跟着来；突然产生	Suddenly it came on me where I had lost my keys. My parents have never come on us for anything. It's getting colder: winter is coming on. I think I have a cold coming on. His French has come on a lot since he joined the conversation class.	我突然记起把钥匙丢在哪里了。 我的父母从来没向我们要求过任何东西。 天渐冷了，冬天来了。 我看我要感冒了。 他自从参加了会话班，法语取得了很大进步。
come out 出现；出版；结果是	Bats come out only at night. Hot weather makes her come out in a rash. Her best qualities come out in a crisis. That magazine comes out once a month. Please tell me how the voting came out. She's been much happier since she came out. The governor came out in favor of tax breaks.	蝙蝠只在晚上出来活动。 因天气炎热，她起了皮疹。 在危急关头显露出了她的优秀品质。 那个杂志每月出一期。 请告诉我选举结果如何。 她公开了自己是同性恋者以后就快活多了。 这位政府官员公开宣布赞成停止征税
come to v. 想起；共计	The bill came to five pounds fifty pence. He will come to soon after the operation. The farm came to him on his father's death. We came to an amicable agreement.	这个帐单总计5镑15便士。 手术后不久他就会醒来。 他父亲死时把农场留给他了。 我们达成了友好的协议。
come true 实现，成真；成为现实	His dream will come true sooner or later. Her wish to become a doctor has come true. All our dreams can come true if we have the courge to pursue them. People think all they need to do is endure one crazy, intense, job-free creative burst and their dreams will come true.	他的理想迟早会实现。 她想当医生的愿望实现了。 只要有勇气去追求，一切梦想皆可成真。 人们认为他们所需要做的事是忍耐一个疯狂，强烈的，无责任的创意突发而他们的梦想将成真。
come up 走近；发生；开始；上升；发芽；被提出	The snowdrops are just beginning to come up. You've come up in the world, haven't you? He came up and introdued himself. He was born poor,and came up the hard way. The question hasn't come up yet. The flowers are just beginning to come up.	雪花莲刚刚开始长出地面。 你的地位已经上升了,是吗? 他走上前来并作了自我介绍。 他出身贫寒，通过坚韧不拔的努力而获成功。 这个问题还没有被提出来。 花刚开始长出地面。
compare to 把...比作，比喻为	He compared the girl to the moon in the poem. They all started to compare him to Lei Feng.	他在诗中把那姑娘比作月亮。 他们都开始把他比作雷锋。
compare with 与…相比较	That ring is beans compared with the crown jewels. I'm afraid my English compares poorly with hers.	与皇冠上的宝石相比那枚戒指根本不值什么钱。 恐怕我的英语同她的英语相比要差得多。
connect to 连接到，相连	These terminals are connected to our mainframe computer. A point considered to be at nominal zero potential and to which all other potentials in the circuit are referred, often, but not always, connected to the actual surface of the earth; as a verb to connect to a ground. Also called earth. Provide information to help you connect to the internet if you have not do so already.	这些终端设备都和我们的计算机主机相连。 电路中的一个参考点，该点电位作为标称的零电位，其它所有电位均相对于该点而定。经常，但并非总是，将该点直接连接到地。作为动词，指连接到地线上的过程，也称作接地。 如果您还没与Internet连接，它会提供您如何与Internet连接的信息。
connect with 连接；与…联系	Railway lines link country towns with the capital. The two rooms connect by a corridor. She had to sever all ties with her parents. She is in direct contact with the general manager.	铁路把各个城镇与首都连接起来。 那两个房间以走廊连接。 她不得不断绝与父母的一切联系。 她与总经理直接联系。
cut down v. 削减；砍倒；杀死；删节；胜过	The workers had to take a cut in pay. They are trying to whittle down our salaries. You'd better cut your report to five pages. Not a single word in the document can be cut. A child was struck down by lightning in the storm. He knocked down his opponent with a powerful left. He is said to have been blasted down by his nephew. The king put down the uprising and killed all the slaves involved.	工人们只得同意削减工资。 他们正著手削减我们的薪水。 你最好把报告删减到五页。 这个文件中的文字，一个也不许删减。 暴风雨中，一个小孩被雷电击倒。 他一记有力的左手拳将对手击倒。 据说他是被他的侄子杀死的。 国王镇压了那次起义，杀死了所有参加起义的奴隶。
cut off 切断；中断；使死亡；剥夺继承权	A storm that cut off power to the whole region. Just when she had reached the most important point we were cut off. The village is cut off by the flood. They were then almost completely cut off from the outside world. He cut off the branches from the trunk. Please help me to cut off the rinds of lemons. The shark's dorsal fin was cut off by the fisherman. A generator may cut off if it is overtaxed.	切断了整个地区电力供应的暴风雨 她刚刚讲到最要紧的地方，我们的电话就被切断了。 村子被洪水隔绝。 这时他们和外界几乎完全隔绝了。 他把树干上的小分枝都剪掉。 请帮我去掉柠檬的皮。 鲨鱼的背鳍被渔夫割了下来。 发电机要是过荷，它可能会停止运转。
cut up vt. 切碎；抨击	Cut up the carrot before you put them into the pot. My mother would always cut up meat for our dog. Give up blaming and berating yourself. Whoever rips up the agreement will be condemned.	把胡萝卜切碎後再放进锅内。 母亲经常为我们的狗把肉切碎。 给自己放弃谴责自己的权利。 不管谁撕毁协议都要受到谴责。
day and night 日以继夜	Our parents are worrying about us day and night. The days and nights were a blur of medical reports.	父母亲日日夜夜地为我们操心受累。 日日夜夜都是治疗报告。
deal with 处理；涉及；做生意	We have no space to deal with such details. I have a huge pile of letters to deal with. Firstly, let us deal with the most important issue.	我们没有篇幅来讨论这种细微末节。 我有一大堆信件要处理。 首先让我们来处理最紧要的问题。
depend on 取决于；依赖；依靠	Children depend on their parents for food and clothing. All living things depend on the sun for their growth. A lot will depend on how she responds to the challenge. It all depends on whether she like the boss or not. But that all depend on the specific circumstances.	小孩依赖他们的父母供给衣食。 万物生长靠太阳。 在很大程度上将取决於她对这一难题的反应。 一切都取决于她喜欢还是不喜欢这个老板。 不过，那要看具体情况而定。
die out 灭绝；消失	The lump had almost flattened out. And so long as men die, liberty will never perish. The wolf died out in Britain hundreds of years ago. Some animals have been wiped out through ignorance.	这肿块差不多消失了。 只要我们不畏牺牲，自由就永远也不会消失！ 狼在英国数百年前就灭绝了。 有些动物由于人们的无知而灭绝了。
different from 与…不同，不同于	Their school is different from ours. Reading and writing are different skills.	他们的学校与我们的不同。 阅读与写作是不同的技能。
divide up 瓜分；分割；分配	They divvied up the winnings between them. They-vied up the profits among themselves. We split up our profit yesterday. We need a method to divide the pie fairly.	他们瓜分了赢得的钱。 他们一伙瓜分赢利。 昨天我们分配了我们得到的利润。 我们需要一种公平地分配馅饼的方法。
dozens of 几十；许多	The young astress has starred in dozens of films. The juggler conjured a rabbit out of the hat.	这个青年女演员主演了几十部电影。 那个耍把戏的人从几十变出一只兔子来。
drop in (使)落进；(使)往里坍塌： 偶然(或顺便)走访(或访问)(on)；逐渐进入： [口语](有选择地)加入；愿意(或决心)参加： 【戏剧】放下(吊幕)，吊装布景：	I dropped in on the Browns on my way home. I dropped in to ask if you would care to play a round of golf this evening.	我在回家的路上顺便走访了布朗夫妇。 我来顺便走访，问你今晚是否想打一场高尔夫球。
due to adv. 由于；应归于	The two countries were on the point of war due to the diplomatic disputes. Great changes are in prospect in this area due to foreign investment. His successes were largely due to luck.	这两个国家因为外交争端即将开战。 因为外资的引进，该地区会发生很大变化。 他的成功主要靠运气。
each other 彼此，互相	They took out their resentments on each other. The teams are all square at one match each. Each side of a case in court has its own counsel.	他们互相发泄怨气。 这些队在各自参加了一场比赛后不分胜负。 法庭上原告和被告双方都有各自的律师。
enjoy oneself 过得快乐，过得快活	This means that you enjoy having a good time. I hope you'll enjoy yourselves.	也就是说，你喜欢玩得快乐。 希望你们玩得高兴。
even if 即使；虽然	They couldn't, even if they would, get out of trouble by themselves. Even if I fail this time, I would try again. We should practice economy even if we are rich. We'll go even if it rains. Even if one graduated from college, he should still continue to learn. Even if he said so, you need not believe him. Even if it will take me six weeks, I am determined to finish the job. He's a real gentleman,even if a little pompous at times. Even if after meeting only once, they felt a kinship. Even if air is invisible, air takes up space.	即使他们想(摆脱), 也无法独立摆脱困难。 即使我这次失败了，我还要再试试。 即使我们富裕了也仍应该厉行节约。 即使下雨我们也要去。 即使大学毕业了他也要继续学习。 即使他这么说，你大可不必相信他。 即使这工作要花掉我六个星期的时间，我仍决心要把它完成。 他可是个正人君子 他们虽然只见了一面,但已是一见如故了。 空气虽然看不见,但它占据了空间。
even though 虽然，即使	We mustn't let up, even though we're winning. The poster wouldn't stick even though I drenched it with glue. He never apologizes, even though he knows that he is in the wrong. Even though he tried, he still lagged behind other runners. I took the liberty of reading the letter, even though it was addressed to you.	我们即使快赢了也决不可松劲。 我涂了大量胶水，可那张海报就是贴不住。 他从不道歉，即使他自知错了。 尽管他努力了，仍落在其他赛跑者之后。 尽管这封信是写给你的，但是我冒昧地看过了。
ever since adv. 从那时到现在	She's been piling up money ever since she got the job. We've been friends ever since we met at school. Fog dispersal research has since followed the line. Since then, Goldman has been on a green jag.	自从得了那份工作以来，她一直在攒钱。 自从我们在学校认识之后，我们就一直是好朋友。 自那时以来消雾研究一直遵循这个方向。 自那时以来，高盛一直在绿色联合咨询组。
face to face 面对面	They are standing there, face to face. His ambition was to meet his favourite pop star face to face.	他们面对面地站在那里。 他心向往之的是要面对面地见见他心目中的流行曲歌星。
fall asleep v. 入睡；睡着	I tossed about all night, unable to fall asleep. It took him a long time to fall asleep last night. He soon fell asleep and began to snore. Because I am tired, I fall asleep quickly.	我彻夜辗转反侧，无法入睡。 昨晚他过了好一会儿才入睡。 他很快睡着并开始打起鼾来。 因为我很疲劳，因此很快就睡着了。
fall ill 生病；病倒	She had to stay home because her son fell ill. She is ill now and turns away from her food.	因为儿子生病所以她得待在家里。 她现在正生病，不想吃什么东西。
far away 遥远的	He descried an island far away on the horizon. He took his journey into a far country.	他看到遥远的地平线上有个岛屿。 他到一个遥远的国家去旅行。
far from adv. 远离；远非；完全不	The scene is laid in a village far from the city. She lives in seclusion apart from her friend. His explanation was far from satisfactory. This way of shifting the blame onto others is far from clever.	故事发生在远离城市的一个小村庄里。 她远离朋友，过隐居生活。 他的解释一点也不令人满意。 这种把错误推给别人的作法是一点也不聪明的。
feel like doing 想要做…	What do you feel like doing? She was so depressed she felt like doing herself in. What do you feel like doing today?	你想做什么? 她心灰意冷想要自杀。 你今天想做什么?
figure out 解决；算出；想出；理解；断定	The boy can't figure out the algebra problems. It didn't take the children long to figure out the correct answer. I can't figure out why he is absent. I can't figure out why he quit his job. He's trying to figure out a way to solve the problem.	这个男孩做不出这道代数题。 孩子们没有花很多时间就算出了正确的答案。 我弄不明白他为什么缺席。 我琢磨不透他为什么要辞掉工作。 他正在努力想办法解决这个问题。
fill with 装满，充满	The royal palace was filled with intrigue. My room is filled with the odor of roses. The hall was filled with choking clouds of smoke. I am filled with desire to go back home.	皇宫中充满了勾心斗角。 我的房间里充满了玫瑰花的香味。 大厅里充满了使人窒息的烟雾。 我心中充满了回家的渴望。
fill in 填写；填充；替代	Please fill in your jurisdictional district. Fill up the order blank now,pencils will do.	请填写你的管辖区。 请迅即填写订货单，用铅笔也可以。
find out v. 找出，查明；发现，揭发	We must find out the truth of this incident.	我们一定要把这件事情的本相找出来。
first of all adv. 首先	Athletes should first have the sense of fair play. I must finish my homework first.	运动员首先要有公平竞争的意识。 我必须首先做完家庭作业。
for ever 永远；总是	It was a cancer for permanency and pain. He has disappeared for ever since then.	那简直是一颗永远折磨人的毒瘤。 从那以后，他就永远地失踪了。
for example 例如	For example, London is the capital of Britain. Editing files with Finder, for example, is OK.	例如，伦敦是英国的首都。 编辑文件的搜索，例如，是，确定。
for good 永久地；一劳永逸地	He had smoked for so many years that his teeth were permanently stained yellow. In the increased vibration, the quickening of movement of the molecular structure allows for the records to be reviewed and then released and erased for good.	他吸了那么多年烟，牙齿都被永久地熏黄了。 在振动的增加中，细胞结构活泼的运作容许记录被检查，而随后被永久地释放与抹除。
from now on 从现在开始	From now on, I will begin to write my book. It's due to arrive an hour from now. Don't play with the Zhangs from now on. Please fill me in on your future plan.	从现在起，我将开始写我的书了。 从现在起一个小时就该到了。 今后不要和张家的孩子玩。 请详细谈谈你今后的打算。
from then on 从那时起	His career blossomed from then on. They have been good friends since then.	从那时起他的事业兴旺起来。 从那时起他们就一直是好朋友。
from time to time 不时，有时	Sometimes it is necessary to trim those policies. The temper gets the best of him from time to time. From time to time, I looked up from my notebook. He is planning to amass a fortune for a rainy day.	有时需要改变原先制定的那些政策。 他有时控制不住自己的脾气。 我的目光不时地离开习字纸向上看。 他正打算积蓄财富以备不时之需。
get along with 与…和睦相处；取得进展	They are on good terms with each other. We soon became friendly with the couple next door. His work is going along tip-top. The work was coming along quite well.	他们友好相处。 我们很快就和隔壁的夫妇友好相处了。 他的工作进展得非常顺利。 工作进展得相当顺利。
get away 离开；逃脱；出发	This gives the lizard time to get away. I don't really believe you can get away with it. I had to get out of that house in disguise. He hasn't been away from home before.	这就给了蜥蜴逃脱的时间。 我不太相信你能逃脱得了。 我不得不化了装离开那屋子。 以前他从没有离开过家。
get back 回来；恢复；取回；报复；重新上台	I never lend books; you never get them back. The democrats hope to get back at the next election.	我的书决不外借，因为总是有去无回。 民主党希望在下次大选中重新执政。
get down 下来；吞下；使沮丧	The medicine is too bitter to get down. Let's strip away the cant and get down to bedrock. He got down to his work after the holidays. He jotted down a note for her and then left. Wash the dry cake down with tea. I hate to have to choke down these pills. Susan was completely weighed down by the stress of examinations. It is likely that she will be crushed down by the bad news. I think you will like to get down to work now. They set out to drive a well to get well water.	药太苦了，吞不下去。 咱们少说漂亮话，多谈实质问题吧。 度假之後他开始专心工作。 他匆匆为她写下了一个条子然后离开了。 用茶把乾蛋糕咽下去。 我讨厌不得不费力地去咽下这些药片。 苏珊被考试的压力压垮了。 很可能她会被这可悲的消息压垮。 我想现在你要认真着手工作。 他们着手凿井取水。
get down to 开始认真考虑；着手处理	He got down to his work after the holidays. The masonry of the old building began to crumble. I think you will like to get down to work now. He knows how to go about repairing the machine.	度假之後他开始专心工作。 旧楼房的砖石结构开始崩落。 我想现在你要认真着手工作。 他知道怎样着手修理这台机器。
get in 进入；到达；陷入；收获	He invited me to get in the car and go for a ride with him. He has been trying for years to get in that club. The plane got in on time. The Conservatives got in by a small majority. He took the entrance exam but didn't get in. We must get the doctor in. The commune members were busy getting in the crops. The government gets the taxes in quite efficiently. The company is trying to get in all its outstanding debts. We must get some wine in for the dinner party. I got in an hour's work while the baby was asleep. She talks so much that it's impossible to get a word in.	他邀请我上车，与他一起兜风。 几年来他一直争取加入那个俱乐部。 飞机准时到达。 保守党人以微弱多数当选。 他参加了入学考试但未被录取。 我们得请医生来。 公社社员们正忙着收割庄稼。 政府收税相当有成效。 公司正设法收回全部积欠的债款。 我们必须为晚宴买一些酒。 我趁孩子睡觉抽空干了一小时的活。 她说个没完，别人休想插话。
get off v. 动身；免于受罚；从…下来；脱下（衣服等）	Jason saw me and got off the horse immediately. A good lawyer might be able to get you off. We will get off after breakfast. What time will you get off tomorrow?	杰逊看到我，立即从马上下来。 请位好律师有可能使你免受追究。 我们将于早餐后出发。 你明天什么时候动身?
get on 上车，上马；进展，使前进	She got on the bus and picked a seat up front. He can always get on well with his colleagues.	她上了公车,找了个最前面的座位。 他总能和同事们和睦相处。
get on with vt. 在…获得成功，与…友好相处；继续干	The research project dragged on for months. John hasn't been able to get anywhere despite his hard work. Let's sum up our experience before going on. Don't dilly-dally, just get on with it!	这个研究是项目几个月来没有取得进展。 约翰尽管工作努力，但仍未取得进展。 在继续做之前我们先来总结一下经验吧。 别磨磨蹭蹭的，继续做吧！
get through 通过；到达；做完；接通电话；度过，熬过(困难时期等)	I think you will get through. The candidates didn't all get through. If more supplies do not get through in time, thousands of refugees will die. It took us only a few minutes to get through the Customs. I cannot think how they will get through the time. We need more rain to get through the summer. He can not get through the day without at least a cup of coffee. I couldn't get through. I find her impossible to get through to. I explained once again, but I still couldn't get through to him.	我想你是能通过的。 报考者没有全部通过。 如果更多的救济品不能及时到达的话，数以千计地难民将要死亡。 我们的海关检查只花了几分钟时间。 我不能想象，这段时间他们将怎样度过。 我们需要更多的雨水去度过夏天。 没有至少一杯咖啡他没法度过这一天。 我打不通电话。 我发觉无法跟她沟通思想。 我又解释了一遍，但他仍然不懂我的意思。
get up 起床，起立；建造；增加；打扮；伪造	She got up at the crack of dawn. He was pleased to get up to the singing of birds. The wind is getting up. We're getting up a party for her birthday. He's been getting up to his old tricks again! She's busy getting up the American constitution for tomorrow's exam. The class got up when the teacher came in. She was got up as an Indian princess. She got herself up in a new dress.	天刚亮她便起床了。 他很高兴起床听到鸟的歌唱。 风越刮越大。 我们要给她开生日庆祝会。 他又要重施故技了。 她忙著温习美国宪法，准备明天的考试。 老师进来时全班起立。 她被打扮成了印度公主。 她穿上了新洋装。
give away 赠送；丧失；泄露	He would rather give away a point than claim an advantage. He wants to give away all his modern possessions and return to nature. He decide to give away everything he possessed and become a monk. He was given away by one of his accomplices. Don't give away to the public when we will start. I wish he wouldn't give the show away.	他宁愿送分数，也不愿要求利益。 他要舍弃一切时髦的东西而归真返璞。 他决定放弃他所有的一切，出家为僧。 他被他的一个同谋者出卖了。 不要向公众泄露我们出发的日期。 但愿他不会泄露内幕。
give back 归还；反射；恢复	Has he given back the tools he borrowed from you? They decided to give it back to its owner. Give the book back to your brother. She was shepherded back home by her boyfriend. Mirrors are used to reflect back the sunlight. Sound waves will reflect back from a solid surface. The holiday gave him back his good spirits. I came back from my holiday with renewed strength.	他向你借的那些工具归还了没有？ 他们决定把它归还原主。 把书送回给你兄弟。 她的男友将她送回了家。 镜子被用来反射阳光。 音波将会从坚固的表面反射回去。 假期使他恢复了愉快的情绪。 我度假回来，体力得到恢复。
give in v. 屈服；让步；交上	Only a coward gives in to his fate. The rebels were forced to give in. He gave in when he was threatened with torture. The employer is obliged to give in to his employees. The authorities showed no signs of giving in to the kidnapper's demands. Please give your examination papers in (to the teacher) when you've finished.	只有懦夫向命运屈服。 叛乱者被迫投降。 他在受到严刑威胁时投降了。 雇主被迫向他的雇员们让步。 当局对绑架者的要求丝毫没有让步的迹象。 考卷答完后请上交(给老师)。
give out 分发，发出；公布，发表；用尽，精疲力竭	The teacher gave out the examination papers. The radiator is giving out a lot of heat. He has refused to give out any information on the matter. The news of the President's death was given out in a radio broadcast. Her patience finally gave out. After a month their food supplies gave out. One of the plane's engines gave out in mid-Atlantic.	教师发了考卷。 散热器释放出很多热量。 他已拒绝发表有关此事的任何消息。 总统逝世的消息已在电台上播出了。 她终于失去了耐性。 过了一个月，他们的食物已消耗殆尽。 飞机在大西洋中部飞行时，其中一个发动机出了故障。
give up 放弃；交出	She doesn't give up easily. The doctors had given her up but she made a remarkable recovery. You might as well advise me to give up my fortune as my argument. You ought to give up smoking; I gave it up last year. He had to give his passport up to the authorities.	她做任何事都不轻易放弃。 医生们已放弃了治愈她的希望，而她却恢复得很好。 你劝我停止辩论，倒不如劝我抛弃一切财产。 你应该戒烟，我去年就戒掉了。 他得把护照交给当局。
go ahead 前进；进行	We feel you should go ahead. Go ahead and do what you like. He's going ahead fast. You go ahead and I am coming. Food and fodder should go ahead of troops and horses.	我们觉得您应该干。 去吧，喜欢干什么就干什么。 他进展很快。 你先走一步,我就来。 兵马未动，粮草先行。
go away 走开	Leave me be! Go away! Mischiefs come by the pound, and go away by the ounce. To go away without telling your father is most irregular. It made me sad to hear you have to go away. Before I go away I will call round to say goodbye to you. Don't go away yet. I wish he'd go away; I can't stand the sight of him.	别打扰我! 走开！ [谚]灾来如山倒，灾去如抽丝。 不跟你父亲打个招呼就走是非常不合适的。 听到你非走不可，我觉得很伤心。 在我离开以前，我要来看你们，向你们告别。 暂时别离开。 我希望他离开，我讨厌这个家伙。
go by 经过；顺便走访；凭…判断；遵循；时间流逝	Farmers used to thrash their wheat by hand. In the past he had to read by candlelight. This task is accomplished by great effort. After a lot of persuasion, she agreed to go. He gave me a cheery wink as I passed by. I saw Xiao Yang walking by, shouldering two hoes. Follow the instructions step by step. By circulation that must be done according to our intent.	农民过去用手打麦脱粒。 过去他只得在烛光下攻读。 这项任务是经过巨大努力才完成的。 经过多次劝说后，她同意去了。 我走过的时候他亲切地朝我眨眨眼睛。 我看到小扬扛着两把锄头从旁走过。 依照指示一步一步地做。 藉著循环一定要被依照我们的意图做。
go fishing 去钓鱼	People use maggots as bait when they go fishing. I used to (=would often) go fishing. Some people use maggots as bait when they go fishing. He asked me if I would go fishing with him tomorrow. He planed to go fishing for salmon on Sunday. The holiday-makers chartered a boat to go fishing. Who made the decision to go fishing? They would rather go fishing than stay at home.	人们钓鱼时用蛆作钓饵。 我以前常去钓鱼。 有些人钓鱼时用蛆作钓饵。 他问我明天是否和他一起去钓鱼。 他计划星期天去钓鲑鱼。 渡假者租了一艘船去钓鱼。 是谁决定去钓鱼的？ 他们宁愿去钓鱼，也不愿待在家里。
go for 去找；被认为；主张；拥护；努力获取	He left his home to look for employment. She rummaged about in the drawer for a pencil. If the sound seems okay, go for dynamics and effects. He is always regarded as good for nothing. For a long time the earth is thought of as flat. He urged that they go to New York. Such opinions pave the way for social change. The newspaper is whooping for leftist candidates. We stand up for the cause of liberty and justice. The speaker went for his opponent. She felt nothing but hatred for her attacker.	他离家去找职业。 她在抽屉里翻来翻去找铅笔。 如果声音好，努力获取动态和效果。 他被认为是个一事无成的人。 过去很长时间地球被认为是扁平的。 他极力主张他们去纽约。 这种主张为社会变革铺路。 这家报纸热烈拥护左派候选人。 我们拥护自由和正义。 演讲者攻击对手。 她对攻击她的人只有恨。
go for a walk v. 散步	Would you like to go for a walk after dinner? I expect I'll take my children for a walk.	你愿意晚饭后去散步吗？ 我想我会带我的孩子去散步。
go in for 参加，从事；追求；赞成	I don't go in for loud popular music. He must have have a magnificient build before his stomach go in for a career of its own. Many people went in for writing, music, dramatics and similar activities. Most girls do not go in for rough games.	我不喜欢喧闹的流行音乐。 当他的肚子还未酷爱其份内的工作放开量大吃大喝）之前，他一定已经有了副强健的体格。 很多人从事绘画、音乐、演剧和其他类似活动。 大多数女孩子不参加粗野的游戏。
go off 离开；进行；变质；睡去；断掉；爆炸	The bomb went off in a crowded street. The bomb was timed to go off at 12 o'clock. Hamlet goes off stage left. The headache went off quite suddenly. The thieves ran away when the burglar alarm went off. The car alarm went off as John Doe was trying to steal the car. Everything went off according to plan. The ceremony went off without a hitch. Fish soon goes off in this hot weather. We haven't a fridge and the milk goes off within a day in hot weather.	炸弹在熙来攘往的街道上爆炸了。 炸弹定在12点钟爆炸。 哈姆雷特从舞台左侧退下。 头疼突然消失了。 防盗警报器一响，盗贼立刻逃走了。 当某人试著偷那台车时，汽车警报器响起了。 一切都按照计划进行。 典礼进行得很顺利。 在这么热的天气里鱼很快会变质。 我们没有电冰箱，牛奶在热天一天就变质了。
go on 继续；过去；继续下去；发生	Let us go on to the next item on the agenda. She hesitated for a moment, and then went on. Go on this street till you see the cinema. Are you alive to what is going on?	让我们继续讨论议程上的下一个项目。 她迟疑了一下,然后接着说。 沿街往前走直到你看见电影院。 你注意到正在发生的事吗?
go on with 继续；进行；暂时使用	Rainy as it be, they go on with their work. I will go on with my work unless I get the order to the contrary.	虽然是雨天，他们仍继续工作。 我将继续工作直到我得到相反的命令。
go out 出去；熄灭；过时	He goes out drinking most evenings. The fire has gone out. Flared trousers went out years ago. Terry has been going out with Sharon for six weeks. That team went out in the third round. Our daughter went out to Australia ten years ago. The Detroit auto workers went out for higher pay.	晚上他差不多都到外边喝酒。 火已熄灭。 喇叭裤多年前就不时兴了。 特里和沙伦相恋有六个星期了。 那个队在第三轮比赛中被淘汰了。 我们的女儿十年前出国到澳大利亚去了。 底特律的汽车工人为争取提高工资而罢工。
go over 复习，重温；仔细检查；转变；润色	Let's just go over these figures again. She went over her lines before the first night of the play. Tom went over the text before the exam. Don't go over that line or your throw won't count. She went over to the Republicans after their election victory. She's gone over to a milder brand of cigarettes. These actors went over very well with the audience.	我们再检查一下这些数字吧。 她在该剧首演前又练习了一次台词。 汤姆考试前复习课文。 别越过那条线，否则你的投掷就会被判无效。 她在共和党取得选举胜利后转向了他们。 她已改吸另一牌子味道较淡的香烟。 这些演员深受观众们的欢迎。
go through 参加；经受；仔细检查；通过	The child is going through a difficult phase. They went through the agonies of war and famine. He thought it his duty to go through the papers. I had a browse through the books on her shelf. I browsed through some magazines while I waited.	那孩子正经历困难的阶段。 他们经历了战争和饥荒的痛苦。 他认为自己有责任检查这些文件。 我浏览了一下她书架上的书。 我边等边浏览几本杂志。
grow up 成长，逐渐形成	My daughter is in such a hurry to grow up. You'll change your mind as you grow older. She will grow up to be a fine woman. Grow with the company and share the achivement.	我女儿恨不得一下子就长大。 你长大些就会改变想法的。 她将成长为一名优秀的妇女。 我希望能与公司共同成长，能和公司分享胜利的果实。
had better 最好	You had better cross out the last name. You had better see about rooms for us. Before reading the book, you had better ask yourself if you have the time. You had better have another think. Perhaps you and I had better change over; you are more experienced. We had better get under the lee of the hedge until the rain stops. Even a worm will turn. You had better give her a way out. We had better learn by heart as many sentence patterns as we can.	你最好把最后一个名字划掉。 你最好替我们去问问有没有房间。 在读这本书之前，你最好问问自己是否有时间。 你最好再想一想。 也许我们的工作还是对换一下好，你比我更有经验。 我们最好在树篱下躲一躲等雨停。 弱者被逼太甚，也会进行抗争，你最好还是给她一条出路。 我们最好尽可能多背句型。
hand in 交上；提交；呈送	He made few friends during his stay in the village. Hand in up your examination paper. He has decided to hand in his resignation. She handed in a brief report of the incident.	他在这个村子逗留的期间，没有交上几个朋友。 把你们的卷子交上来。 他已经决定递交辞呈。 她递交了一份关于那个事件的简要报告。
hand out 分发；施舍；把…拿出来	The teacher had the monitor hand out the papers. I have to make some copy to hand out. At the beginning he would always hand out an outline of the lecture. I rustled up a few helpers to hand out leaflets.	老师让班长分发试卷。 我需要复印一些文件以便分发。 在演讲开始时，他总是先分发一份提纲。 我找到几个助手散发传单。
have a cold 感冒，受凉；患感冒	I stayed in bed and nursed my cold. It's easy to catch a cold in the winter.	我患感冒后卧床养病。 冬天容易患感冒。
hang on 坚持下去；不挂断；握住不放	I caution you to hang on to that dog or tie it up. He did not expect them to hang on much longer. If you'll just hang on a moment, I'll get it for you.	我劝你把这条狗抓紧或者拴起来。 他估计他们坚持不了多久了。 如果你暂时不挂断，我取来给你。
hang up 挂断电话；搁置，拖延	I've got to hang up now. Carols mother told her she had talked long enough on the phone and made her hang up. She took her coat off and hung it up. The project was hung up for lack of fund. The ship was hung up on a sandbar three hours.	我现在得挂断了。 卡罗尔的母亲对她说她已谈得时间够长了,叫她挂断电话。 她脱掉大衣，挂了起来。 工程因资金短缺而被搁置下来。 那艘轮船在沙洲搁浅了3个小时。
have a gift for 对…有天赋	She has a natural aptitude for music. Did you know I have a talent for juggling balls?	她在音乐方面极有天赋。 过去你知道我玩球挺有天赋吗？
have classes 上课	We have classes from Monday to Friday. Classes can be beguiled with interesting stories.	我们从星期一到星期五上课。 有趣的故事使上课时间过得很快。
have fun with 玩得高兴，玩得开心	Do not focus on these little things and have fun with your kids.	别计较这些琐碎的事情，好好享受和孩子一起玩的时光。
have got to 必须；不得不	You have to rewrite the article. She had to sever all ties with her parents. You have to take stock of your position. It's a formality that we have to go through.	你不得不重新改写这篇文章。 她不得不断绝与父母的一切联系。 你必须估计一下你的处境。 这是我们必须办理的手续。
have to 必须；不得不；只好	You have to take stock of your position. It's a formality that we have to go through. You have to rewrite the article. She had to sever all ties with her parents.	你必须估计一下你的处境。 这是我们必须办理的手续。 你不得不重新改写这篇文章。 她不得不断绝与父母的一切联系。
hear of 听说，听说过	I rejoice to hear of your promotion. We have just heard of his marriage to an heiress.	听说你高升我非常高兴。 我们刚刚听说他与一位女继承人结了婚。
hear from 收到…的信；受…的批评	When they did not hear from her, they feared the worst. I hear from my cousin every two months. I hear from my cousin every two weeks. It was a pleasure to hear from you. Have you hear from him by last week? Months have elapsed before I hear from my friend again. How often do you hear from your sister?	他们那时听不到她的消息，唯恐发生了最糟的事。 我每两个月就会收到我表哥的来信。 我每两星期就会收到我表哥的来信。 很高兴收到你的信。 到上星期为止你们接到过他的信吗？ 好几个月过去後我才再次收到我朋友的信。 你多长时间接到你姐姐一次信?
help oneself to 自用	For the registration of ownership of a ship built by oneself for one's own use, a document evidencing the procurement of ownership shall be submitted. Here you are.And help yourself to a pie, please.	就自造自用船舶申请船舶所有权登记的，应当提供足以证明其所有权取得的文件。 给你，请随意吃馅饼。
hold on 不挂断电话，等一下；继续	He held on to the rock to stop himself slipping. These nuts and bolts hold the wheels on. You should hold on to your oil shares. They managed to hold on until help arrived. He swallowed the insults and kept on working. He gritted his teeth and resolved to hold out. Hold on,please. I'll see if he's in his office.	他紧紧抓住岩石以免自己往下滑。 这些螺帽和螺栓把轮子固定住了。 你应该继续保留着石油股份。 他们设法坚持住直到有救援到来。 他忍受侮辱继续努力。 他咬紧牙关忍受。 请别挂断，我去看看他是否在办公室。
hold out 坚持；伸出；提供；维持；抵制；主张；扣留	The balcony juts out over the swimming pool. They were ready to hold out a friendly hand. The strikers are holding out for a 5% pay increase. He was determined to face it out.	阳台伸出在游泳池上方。 他们准备伸出友谊之手。 罢工者坚持要求增加工资百分之五。 他决心把这事坚持到底。
hold up 举起；阻挡；拦截	He held up his hand in amazement. The pillars hold up the masonry. I decided to hold up on the news until he was sure of it. The train was held up by heavy fog. She was always holding up her children as paragons of good behaviour. Robbers held up a bank at gunpoint.	他惊骇地举起了手。 柱子支持着石头房屋。 我决定暂缓发布消息，直到我确信准确无误。 火车因大雾而受阻。 她总是标榜自己的孩子是品行端正的典范。 强盗持枪抢劫了一家银行。
hundreds of 好几百；许许多多	She has coached hundreds of young singers. Among the hundreds of guppy varieties, the best known feature of the male fish is its gorgeous dorsal and caudal fins.	她培养了许许多多的青年歌手。 在成千上百的孔雀鱼品种中，雄鱼最著名的特色就是它们华丽的背鳍和尾鳍。
hurry up （使）赶快	Please hurry up the dispatch of these telegrams. Let's try to rig up some sort of shelter.	请赶快将这些电报发出去。 让我们赶快搭个遮风挡雨的棚吧。
in a hurry 立即，匆忙	In her hurry she forgot to leave her phone number. There is no hurry to make a decision.	匆忙间她忘了留下电话号码。 没有必要匆忙作出决定。
in all 总共，合计	That's 5.40 in all. We numbered 20 (ie There were 20 of us) in all. He visited, in all, ten hospitals in China.	总共5. 我们共计20人。 他在中国共参观了10家医院。
in a word 总之；简言之	In a word, we must just leave now. In one word,we must try our best to do the job. In few words, mysteries are due to secrecy. He may be briefly characterized as a man of arts.	总而言之，我们必须现在就走。 总而言之，我们必须尽力去做这项工作。 简言之，隐密直似有接受秘事之权也。 简言之，他的特点是多才多艺。
in common 共同的；共有的	The two sisters have nothing in common. Jane and I have nothing in common. They have something in common in this connection. In common with many others, she applied for a training place.	两姐妹没有什么共同之处。 简和我毫无共同之处。 在这点上，他们有些共同之处。 她已和许多人一起申请参加训练。
in debt 负债；欠情	Wasteful people usually end up in debt. A large number of factories operate in the red.	挥霍浪费者最后往往负债。 许多工厂都是负债经营。
in danger 在危险中	The eagle is eager to anger the tiger in danger. He can not shrink back from danger.	鹰渴望激怒处在危险中的老虎。 他不会从危险中退缩出来。
in fact 事实上，实际上	That is actually a cavity in the earth. As a matter of fact, light is a form of energy. As a matter of fact, I've never been there before. In fact the first voyage went without a hitch.	那其实是一个地下洞穴。 其实，光是能的一种形式。 事实上我从未到过那儿。 事实上，第一次航行十分顺利。
in front of 在…前面	I drove up in front of the house and honked. A still better tomorrow lies ahead of you.	我将车开到屋子前面然后按喇叭。 展现在你们前面的是更加美好的未来。
in need of 需要…时	We need more people of his mold. I need a piece of string to tie this parcel up.	我们需要更多他那种类型的人。 我需要一根细绳把这包裹扎起来。
in order 整齐，秩序井然；按顺序；状况良好	He was as busy as a bee trying to put the house in order. Trying to keep this garden in order is the despair of my life. Please tabulate the numbers in order. The items are listed in order of importance.	他为了要把家里弄得整整齐齐，忙了好一阵子。 把这个花园管理好是我力不能及的事。 请把那些数字按顺序制成表。 这些项目是根据其重要性排列的。
in order that 为了；以便	In order not to be late, she cut across the fields. That party hack is just in politics for the money. He raised his hand in order that the taxi may stop. I'll change my timetable to fay in with yours.	为了不迟到，她抄近路穿过田野。 那位政客从政的目的只是为了钱。 他举起手以便使出租车停下来。 我将改变时间表以便和你们的吻合起来。
in order to 为了	He lit a cigarette in order to calm his mind. We started early in order to arrive before dark. She is sieving the rice in order to sieve out the stones. She stinted herself of food in order to let the children have enough. In the jungle, they were driven to extremes in order to survive.	他点燃一支香烟，镇定一下情绪。 为了在天黑前到达，我们很早就动身了。 她正在把米过筛，好把石头筛出。 她自己省着吃，好让孩子们吃饱。 在丛林中，他们为了生存被迫采取极端行动。
in other words 换句话说	In other words, none of us can go to the movie. To put it in another way, I'm busy. DERRICK So in other words we're moving. In that way, Pluto acts like a comet.	换句话说，我们都不能去看电影。 换句话说，我很忙。 也就是说我们要搬家。 也就是说，冥王星的行为像一个彗星。
in peace 和平地；安静，宁静；安祥地	The old man dropped off peacefully in his sleep. Please let me get on with my work in peace and quiet.	老人在睡眠中平静地死去。 请让我平静地做我的工作吧。
in public adv. 公开地，当众	Spitting in public is considered vulgar. He was arrested for exposing himself in the park. In this country people can criticize their president in public. Dorset had apparently shown marked interest in the girl.	当众吐痰被认为是粗鄙的行为。 他因在公园里当众暴露生殖器而被捕。 在这个国家人们可以公开地批评他们的总统。 多森一向公开地显示他对那姑娘怀有特殊的好感。
in surprise 惊奇地	She looked up in surprise when I shouted. He caught his breath in surprise. The child's mouth formed a big O in surprise. She jerked upright in surprise. He opened his eyes wide in surprise. His eyes nearly jumped from their sockets in surprise. His brows went up in surprise. He goggled at her in surprise.	我叫喊时，她吃惊地抬起头来看。 他惊奇得屏住了呼吸。 那孩子惊奇得张著嘴像个大O字。 她惊讶得跳了起来。 他吃惊地睁大了眼睛。 他惊讶得眼珠子差一点跳出来。 他惊讶地竖起了眉毛。 他惊奇地睁大眼睛看著她。
in the end 终于，最后	In the end they reached a place of safety. Peter and Tom finally made up in the end. He added to his tally in the last minute. Give the plate a final rinse in cold water.	他们终于到达了一个安全的地方。 彼特和汤姆最后和解了。 他在比赛最后一分钟又得了分。 将餐具放在冷水里最后冲洗一次。
in time 及时；适时	Firemen reached the house on fire in time. I intended to catch the early train, but I didn't get up in time. Disregarding all the difficulties, we arrived here in time. I saved my bacon by arriving just in time for the meeting. The car came to a halt just in time to prevent an accident.	消防队员及时赶到那幢失火的房子。 我本来打算赶早班的火车，但是我起晚了。 尽管有那么多困难，我们仍然及时地到达了这儿。 我刚好及时到会，才算没受责备。 汽车及时停下，避免了一场车祸。
instead of 代替；而不是…	I made this cake specially, with brown sugar instead of white. I gave him advice instead of money. The economy is shrinking instead of growing. There is a growing tendency for people to work at home instead of in offices.	我特别地以红糖代替白糖做了这个蛋糕。 我给了他忠告，而不是钱。 经济正在萎缩而不是在增长中。 人们在家里而不是在办公室里工作的趋势日益增长。
join in 加入；参加	They are going to join in the singing. He never joined in the usual sports of the boys. I'll persuade him to join our club. They tried to get a foot in the door.	他们将参加唱歌。 他从不参加孩子们的一般体育活动。 我将劝他加入我们的俱乐部。 他们试图加入进来。
join up 联合起来；连接；参军	The new firm linked up with several big ones. Let us join forces to fight them. He was called up at the beginning of the war. The government is calling up men for the army.	这家新公司和几家大公司联合起来了。 让我们联合起来跟他们斗。 战争开始时他就被征召入伍了。 政府正在征召入伍。
just now 刚才；眼下	He had a drink in the bar just now. Please sum up what you said just now. The boss is being in royal spirits right now. Now he slept quietly with his fathers.	他刚才在酒吧间喝了一杯。 请把你刚才说的总结一下。 此刻，老板情绪极好。 此刻他安静地躺在祖坟中。
keep back 留下；隐瞒；阻止	He tried to keep the matter dark from us. We must not keep back anything we know. Do I have to keep my ticket till after I get off? You can keep this book for your very own. The police had to use force to hold back the crowd. They should try to keep prices from rising. Police horses were used to keep back the crowd. He resolved that nothing should hold him back.	他设法隐瞒这事不让我们知道。 不应该隐瞒我们所知道的事。 车票要保留到下车吗？ 你可以保留这本书，当作是自己的。 警察不得不用武力阻止人群。 他们应该设法阻止价钱上涨。 警马被用来阻挡人群。 他下决心不让任何事情阻挡他。
keep doing 一直做某事	Do not keep do that. Tired as she was, she kept doing it.	不要老是做那个。 她虽然累了，仍继续做下去。
keep off 让开；不接近	Mary tends to hold off from people. The politician fended off the question. He tried to stand off his creditors.	玛丽总是不接近人。 那位政治家避开了这个问题。 他试图避开债主。
keep on 继续；穿着…不脱	After a short break, the match went on. Work is going ahead on the new bridge.	经过短暂的休息，比赛继续进行。 新桥的工作正在继续进行之中。
keep up 保持；继续；不低落；不落后	The house is becoming too expensive for them to keep up. The high cost of raw materials is keeping prices up. The enemy kept up their bombardment day and night.	他们的房子维修费用贵得越来越修不起了。 原料费用昂贵使得产品价格居高不下。 敌军一直日夜不停地狂轰滥炸。
knock at 敲（门、窗等）	He knocked at the door and entered. She is pecking away at the keys of a typewriter.	他敲了敲门便走进去了。 她不停地敲打着打字机的键。
knock into 撞上；与…相撞	I knocked into an old friend of mine in the park. The boy knocked into her.	我昨天在公园里碰见一位老朋友。 那个男孩撞到了她身上。
laugh at 嘲笑；因…而发笑	I've got the laugh on him this time. The disrespectful boy laughed at his father. It's not humorous to laugh at your own jokes. The children laughed at the joke.	这回该我嘲笑他了。 那个无礼的男孩嘲笑自己的父亲。 因你自己的笑话而笑就不幽默了。 孩子们听到那个笑话而笑了。
lead to 导致；通向	The Government's present course will only lead to disaster. Too much work and too little rest often lead to illness. Such an offence will lead to a summary fine. Excessive patriotism can lead to xenophobia. A full-scale nuclear war could lead to the annihilation of the human race. All roads lead to Rome.	政府的现行方针后患无穷。 过量的工作和过少的休息会引起疾病。 这类过错要当场予以罚款。 爱国主义过了头即可导致仇视一切外国人。 全面的核子战争能导致人类的灭绝。 条条大道通罗马。
let in 让…进来；嵌入	The old man is in the twilight of his career. She cracked the window to let in fresh air. A dog scratched at the door to be let in. I was paging through a magazine when he came in.	这老人已经进入了他生涯的晚期。 她稍微打开了一点窗户，让新鲜空气进入室内。 狗嚓嚓地抓门要想进来。 他进来时我在翻阅一本杂志。
let out v. 放出；泄露；出租	The prisoners were let out to work in the garden. They put out their horse to grass every day. He babbled out our plans to them. Don't let the cat out of the bag.	囚犯们被放出到花园里去劳动。 他们每天把马放出去吃草。 他失口把我们的计划泄露给他们了。 不要泄露机密。
live on vi. 以...为食；靠...生活	I had to live on bread and water when I was a student. People have to live on something more nourishing than hope. The Irish used to live on a diet of potatoes. This custom will live on for centuries. He will die, but his fame will live on after him.	我上大学时只能靠粗茶淡饭过活。 人们必须依赖比希望更滋养的东西来过活。 爱尔兰人过去用马铃薯作为主食。 这种习惯还将继续存在很多世纪。 他总是要死的，但是他的声誉将永存下去。
look after 照顾；关心；目送	He has many affairs to look after. I can look after myself. They employed him to look after the baby. He conjured us with his dying breath to look after his son. She charged me to look after her daughter. My mother stood at the gate and looked after us as we walked toward the railway station.	他有许多事务要照料。 我能照料自己。 他们聘请他照料婴儿。 他临终时乞求我们我们照顾他的儿子。 她要我负责看管她的女儿。 我妈妈站在大门口，目送着我们向火车站走去。
look ahead 预测未来，计划未来	Would you have a look at the overpass in front of us.	你看前面的立交桥。
look down upon vt. 看不起	We should not look down on manual labor. The critics looked down their noses at the novel.	我们不应该轻视体力劳动。 这些评论家们都轻视这部小说。
look for 寻找	He turned on the torch to look for his keys. As the tide receded we were able to look for shells. He began to look for another position immediately. Jane craned her neck to look for her mother in the crowd. He has come all the way from Leeds to look for a job. He is looking for a philosophy he can believe in. We shall be looking for an improvement in your work this term.	他打开了手电筒，寻找钥匙。 潮水退去，我们就能寻找贝壳了。 他马上开始寻找另一个职位。 简伸长脖子张望，在人群中找她的母亲。 他从利兹远道而来寻找工作。 他在寻求一种他可以相信的哲学。 我们期待你这学期功课进步。
look forward to 盼望，期待	We look forward to the return of spring. I look forward to coming to work every day. I look forward to being alone in the house. I am familiar with his work and look forward to hearing his views on Literary and artistic creation.	我们期待着春天的到来。 我每天都迫不及待来上班。 我盼望着能自己一人待在这所房子里。 我熟悉他的作品，并期待他能就文艺创作问题发表自己的见解。
look into 调查；观察；窥视；浏览；看	A working party has been set up to look into the problem. A committee was set up to look into the workers' grievances. The government has set up a working party to look into the problem of drug abuse. They stopped to look into the window. I usually look into a book before deciding whether to read it.	已成立工作组调查该问题。 成立了一个委员会来调查工人的不满。 政府已成立工作组调查滥用毒品问题。 他们停下来看看橱窗。 我通常先把书浏览一下才决定是否读它。
look out 注意；面朝；照料；当心	Look out! FBI is on the look out for the agent these days. Police will be looking out for trouble-makers at today's match.	小心！ 这些天联邦调查局正在注意那个特工。 今天的比赛有警察防备著捣乱分子。
look through 浏览，温习；看穿，识破；从…中显露	Women of her mold are easy to see through. Tom can see through the magician's tricks. The auditor looked through all the vouchers. She went through the company's accounts, looking for evidence of fraud. I had a browse through the books on her shelf. I browsed through some magazines while I waited. Man does not reveal himself in his hhistory, he struggles up through it.	她那种性格的女人是很容易看穿的。 汤姆能看穿魔术家的戏法。 查帐员审核了全部凭单。 她仔细审核公司的帐目，查找欺骗作弊的证据。 我浏览了一下她书架上的书。 我边等边浏览几本杂志。 人不能轻易在历史中显露自己，他要在其中挣扎向上。
look up 仰望；查阅；尊敬；拜访	You can look up this word in the vocabulary. I'll look it up in the encyclopaedia. The national economy is beginning to look up. Inflation is coming down; unemployment is coming down; things are definitely looking up! When looking up suddenly , Henry saw a rainbow in the sky . Do look me up next time you are in town.	你可以在词汇表里查这个词。 我将在百科全书中查阅它。 国民经济正在开始好转。 通货膨胀正在缓解，失业情形正在改善，形势确实已好转！ 亨利突然举目仰视时,发现天空有一道彩虹。 下次进城请一定来看我。
lots of 许多；大量	He wrote lots of poems in his life. The boy had a lot of pocket money.	他一生中写了许多诗。 这男孩有许多零用钱。
make a face 做鬼脸	The teacher told him not to make faces in class. Then he made faces and jumped like a monkey.	老师告诉他不要在上课时做鬼脸。 接着他做鬼脸并象猴子一样地跳。
make friends with 与…交友	He's mixing with the wrong people. This boy has a faculty of making friends easily. Make friends with expert bloggers in your niche. She has a knack of making friends. They dwell at unity with the natives. He lives in amity with his neighbours.	他交友不慎。 这个男孩有交友的能力。 在你的领域与专家交朋友。 她有一套交朋友的诀窍。 他们与当地人和睦地住在一起。 他和他的邻居相处得很和睦。
make up 组成；补足；化妆；编造	I tried to make up for my loss. Let's make up. The boy made up a story, it is not true. Leave this notice hanging on your door, asking the servant to make up your room. I don't like to see women making up in public. Farm workers make up only a small section of the population.	我力图补偿我的损失。 让我们言归于好吧。 这个故事不是真的,是那个男孩编造出来的。 留张便条挂在你房门上, 请服务员把你的房间整理一下。 我不喜欢看见女人在公开场合化妆打扮。 农民只占人口的一小部分。
make up of 构成；由……组成	The group was made up of doctors. No matter what substance it may be, it is made up of atom. So Della did. You see, life You see, life is made up of sobs, sniffles, and smiles- but mainly of sniffles. Life is made up of little things.	这个团体是由医生组成的。 不管这是什么物质，都由原子构成。 德拉就这样做了。你知道，人生是由呜咽，抽泣和徽笑组成的，而其中主要的是抽泣。 [谚]人生是由琐碎的事物构成的。
millions of 成千上万的...；无数的...	Millions of people gave freely in response to the famine appeal. During the depression, millions of the unemployed wandered around in the streets. There are millions of living things on the earth. In the Patent Office, we still have millions of ideas that are free for use. There may be millions of worlds in the Milky Way Galaxy. Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years. There were millions of people in the square. Millions of cattle are slaughtered every day.	千百万人响应救灾呼吁而慷慨解囊。 经济萧条时期，有好几百万的失业者在街头游荡。 世界上有数以百万计的生物。 在专利局，我们还有许多的想法没有付诸实施。 银河系中也许有几百万个世界。 恐龙已绝种几百万年了。 广场上有好多好多人。 每天有数百万头牛被屠杀。
more or less 或多或少	We found each cask leak more or less. He more or less thought it was his duty to tell me.	我们发现每桶都有或多或少的流漏现象。 他或多或少认为自己有义务告诉我。
next to 几乎，差不多；紧挨着；居于…之后	A common wall links the house to its neighbour. He saw a magazine on the table next to him. He parked his car close to the curb. She sat in the chair next to mine.	一堵共用的墙将邻近的两所房连接起来。 他看见他邻近桌上有一本杂志。 他将汽车停在紧靠人行道路缘的地方。 她坐在紧靠着我的一张椅子上。
no doubt adv. 无疑地；很可能地	No doubt her death is related to politics. No doubt the chairman will want one last change. No doubt she'll call us when she gets there. She had no renowned ancestors and thought people who had were snobs.	她的死无疑和政治有关。 无疑地主席意志需要一最后的变化。 她到达那儿时必定会给我们打电话。 她没有显赫的祖先，于是以为有的人必定势利。
no longer 不再	This film ticket is no longer available.	这张电影票不再有效。
not any more 不比…多；不再（等于no more）	I will not take any more of your time. Thereafter we heard no more of this suggestion.	我不再占用你的时间了。 此后这个建议不再有人提起了。
not at all 一点也不；别客气	The witness lost all remembrance of the accident. Her so-called friend did not offer any help. Should you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.	这位目击者对这个事故一点也不记得了。 她那位所谓的朋友一点也不帮忙。 如果您有什么问题的话，请不必客气，尽管与我们联系。
not only but also 不仅...而且...	Not only did he turn up late, he also forgot his books. If this project fails it will affect not only our department, but also the whole organization.	他不但来迟了，还忘了把书带来。 要是这个项目失败了，这将不仅影响到我们部门，还会影响到整个单位。
now and then 偶尔；有时	He fluctuated between hope and despair. Her moods kept changing,now happy, now sad. And she litters from time to time. She stumbled and halted in her utterance.	他时而充满希望时而失望。 她的情绪总是变幻不定，时而欢喜，时而忧伤。 还不时随手扔垃圾。 她说话结结巴巴，还不时停顿。
now that 既然；由于	Now that I am free, I can enjoy music for a while. The days are closing in now that it is autumn. Power shortage browned out the city that winter. Seeing that nobody was at home, I had to leave.	既然有空，我可以享受一下音乐。 既然已经是秋天，白昼越来越短了。 那年冬天，由于电力不足，市里采取了部分停电供应措施。 由于没人在家，我也只好走了。
of course 一定，当然	That was 40 years ago, but of course you wouldn't remember it. Of course, if you provide a good pay. Of course, you shall put your best foot forward. I will write to you of course, but not every week.	那是40年以前的事，你自然想不起来了。 如果你提供优厚报酬，那当然可以。 你当然应该尽量给人留下个好印象。 我当然会写信给你，但不是每星期都写。
on average 平均；普通，通常	We received 20 calls a day on average. This is their average yearly output.	我们平均每天接到二十通电话。 这是他们每年的平均产量。
on duty 值班，上班 （学校里）值日	She's alerted me for weekend duty. He reported the murder to the police on duty. Experienced banquet waiters must also be on duty. It is time that you left for the duty.	她已通知我周末值班。 他将凶杀事件告知值班警察。 还必须让有经验的宴会服务员当班。 该你当班了。
on foot 步行；在进行中	We covered seventeen miles on foot. Pat looks better outside of a horse than no foot.	我们步行了十七英里。 帕特骑在马上比步行更加神气。
on show 展览着，在公开展出	Some new types of cars are now on show. It sets the tone for the whole show. There are many exhibits on display in the museum. The fabric was displayed on a wired stand.	一些新型汽车正在展览。 它决定了整个展览的气氛。 博物馆里陈列著许多展览品。 那种织物陈列在金属制的架子上。
on time 按时，准时；按时付款	To our astonishment, they arrived on time. He will come on time even though it rains. You must get to the station on time. The boss ordered that the work should be done on time. The rain kept us from getting there on time. We can depend on his arriving here on time. The child's parents were frantic when she did not return home on time. I couldn't have got to the meeting on time -- unless I had caught an earlier train.	使我们惊讶的是，他们准时到了。 即使下雨，他还是会准时来的。 你必须准时赶到车站。 老板吩咐工作必须按时完成。 那场雨使我们不能准时到达那里。 我们可以相信他会准时到来。 那孩子没有按时回家，她父母都要急疯了。 我不可能及时赶到会场,除非我赶上了较早的一班火车。
once again 再一次	He failed again for all his pains. Facts once again give the lie to the fallacy.	尽管他费尽精力，还是再一次的失败。 事实再一次揭穿了这一谎言。
once more 再一次	Facts once again give the lie to the fallacy. He asked once more if the jar was full. They had once again driven off the enemy's attack. Once more Yongxin shed some tears.	事实再一次揭穿了这一谎言。 是否广口瓶是全部，他然后再一次问了学生。 他们又一次击退了敌人的进攻。 邓勇新又一次落下了眼泪。
once upon a time 从前	Once upon a time there was a princess. Once upon a time, there was an old man living in a small village.	从前有一个公主。 从前，在一个小村庄里住着一位老人。
one after another adv. 接连地；一个接一个地	He rode roughshod over one opponent after another. They all go down like ninepins one after the other.	他把他的对手一个接一个地击败了。 他们一个接一个地倒下去。
open up 打开；开发；开始；展示，揭露	You can open the can by pulling the tab. I opened the window after I got up. They decided to open up the island for cultivation. Is Open Source a Good Career Bet for Developers? The future will open out bright prospects for us. The universe is slowly yielding up its secrets. I believe he has started reading up anthropology. Let's start in and clean up the kitchen. We shall lay open all their secret plans. The newspaper loves to dig up scandals. To reform we need to continue to open up. The plant's first buds will open soon.	你可拉拉环把罐头打开。 我起床后便把窗子打开。 他们决定开发这个岛。 开源是开发人员职业的一个好赌注？ 未来将为我们展现出光明的前景。 宇宙慢慢地展现出它的秘密。 我相信他已开始攻读人类学。 咱们开始打扫厨房吧。 我们将揭露他们所有的秘密计划。 报纸喜欢揭露丑闻。 改革需要继续开放。 这植物的第一批蓓蕾即将开放。
or else 否则；要不然	Do more exercises or you will be out of condition. He can't be ill or he wouldn't have come. Step on it or we'll miss the beginning of the show. Otherwise, turn your jealousy on someone else!	多做锻炼否则你会身体不好的。 他不可能有病，否则他就不来了。 赶快，要不然我们会赶不上演出的。 要不然，就把你的妒忌心转到别人身上去吧！
ought to 应该	You ought to scrap the old bike and buy a new one. You ought to have a haircut. She failed one of the exam papers, but we ought to make allowance for the fact that she was ill. Regularity ought to be observed, as regularity is very conducive to health. China ought to make a greater contribution to humanity. He is a very good tennis player; you ought to see him in action. I think there's a train at 8.20 but you ought to make certain. I think you ought to go to/to go and see (ie consult) the doctor.	你应该扔掉这辆旧自行车，买一辆新的。 你该去剪发了。 她有一门不及格，但我们必须考虑到她当时有病。 生活应遵守规律，因为规律对健康有益。 中国应当对于人类有较大的贡献。 他是个很好的网球运动员，你应当去看看他打球。 我想8点20分有一班火车，不过你应该打听清楚。 我认为你应当去找医生看看病。
out of breath 喘不过气来，上气不接下气	She was out of breath from climbing the stairs.	爬楼梯使她上气不接下气的。
out of order 发生故障；次序颠倒	Let's try to straighten out this confusion. They live in a rough part of town. He'll soon grow out of wetting the bed. This is the batch of watches that all have the same fault. Engineer is trying to pinpoint the cause of the trouble. My boyfriend helped me repair the breakdown of my computer.	咱们努力收拾这个混乱的局面吧。 他们居住在一个社会秩序混乱的城区。 他大些就会很快改掉尿床的毛病的。 这就是那批有同样毛病的手表。 工程师们在设法找出故障的原因。 我男朋友帮我修理了出故障的电脑。
out of work 失业	He has been out of work for a year. The specter of unemployment haunted the land. The air conditioning must be out of order. We should find out an answer to the problem in two days.	他已经失业一年了。 失业的恐怖笼罩全国。 空调肯定是出问题了。 我们要在两天之内找出问题的解决办法。
over and over again adv. 一再地；反复不断地	I've warned you over and over again not to do that. He reworked the first paragraph time and again. We will consider the problem over and over again. I've had to chase the Gas Company up again about the cooker. In this way the Freon could be used over and over again.	我一再地警告你不要去做。 他一再改写第一段。 这个问题我们还需再三斟酌。 我不得不再三要求煤气公司派人来修理煤气炉。 这样，氟里昂可以被反复不断地使用。
pass by 经过；走过；逝去	This task is accomplished by great effort. They cap when they pass the president. He gave me a cheery wink as I passed by. I saw Xiao Yang walking by, shouldering two hoes.	这项任务是经过巨大努力才完成的。 他们经过院长面前时脱帽行礼。 我走过的时候他亲切地朝我眨眨眼睛。 我看到小扬扛着两把锄头从旁走过。
pay attention to 注意；重视	He called my attention to some new evidence. The problem presented itself for their attention. Pay more attention to the voice of youth. Take heed of what he says, if you want to succeed.	他要我注意一些新的证据。 那问题引起了他们的注意。 多留意年轻人的意见。 假如你想成功，就得留意他说的话。
pay back vt. 偿还；报答	He has a huge overdraft to pay off. He paid it back out of his earning. Success is often the pay for hard work. Frank went back to his employer. When he attacked me, naturally I struck back. They fought back in self-defence. I would pay him back for his treacheries. She got back at him by showing me the letter.	他有一大笔透支要偿还。 他用挣的钱把它偿还了。 成功往往是勤奋的回报。 法兰克回报他的东家。 他攻击我时我自然要进行还击。 他们进行了自卫还击。 对他的背信弃义我要报复。 她把那封信拿给我看，以此来报复他。
pay for 赔偿；为…而付钱；为…付出代价	He has a huge overdraft to pay off. You reimburse a person for expenses made for you. She stalled for time to earn enough money to pay. Examine the account well before you pay it.	他有一大笔透支要偿还。 你要偿还他人为你花的钱。 她拖延着，想挣够钱来付款。 在付款以前仔细核对一下帐目。
pay off 付清；取得成功；贿赂；报复	He has a huge overdraft to pay off. It took them three years to pay off the debt. Most of the profits are swallowed up by the mortgage. Once we've got that paid off I'll feel we've turned the corner. We paid off the police to let us go with a warning. Our plan certainly paid off; it was a great idea. His hard working will eventually pay off.	他有一大笔透支要偿还。 他们三年才还清欠债。 房产抵押中耗尽了大部分利润，一旦抵押款偿清，我们就渡过了难关。 我们贿赂警察，让我们只得到一次警告就离开。 我们的计划当然成功了，那是个很好的主意。 他的努力工作终将会得到报偿。
pick out 挑选出	These oxen are marked out for slaughter. It's impossible to pick out only one pair of shoes. It's easy to pick him out in a crowd because he is very tall. The captain said that he could make out a house on the shore.	这些牛是挑出来屠宰的。 要想只挑出一双鞋来根本不可能。 很容易从人群中辨认出他，因为他个子很高。 船长说他能辨认出岸上的一座房子了。
pick up 捡起；获得；收拾；（汽车；飞机）乘载；不费力地学会	He picked up his knife and fork. He picked up the child and put her on his shoulders. He picked up news from all sources. She picked up a valuable first edition at a village book sale. But we have to survive, so I have to pick myself up, and then continue my work. I am able to pick you up on the short wave radio. The dog easily picked up the scent of the murderer. The next morning, my mum came to pick me up. He picked up the girl at a college disco. She's living with some man she picked up on holiday. Pick yourself up and brush yourself down. She soon picked up French when she went to live in France. He is picked up on a charge of killing a man. A cup of coffee might pick you up.	他捡起了刀叉。 他抱起孩子让她骑在自己的肩膀上。 他从各种渠道收集消息。 她在乡村图书展销会上买到一本珍贵的首版书。 但我们必须活下去,所以我必须鞭策自己继续做下去。 我能用短波收音机收听到你的信号。 狗毫不费力地嗅出了谋杀者的气味。 第二天早上,我的妈妈来接我。 他在学校的迪斯科舞会上偶然结识了那姑娘。 她与一个在假日认识的男人同住。 自己站起来，把衣服掸乾净。 她到法国居住后很快就学会了法语。 他因犯有杀人罪而被逮捕。 喝杯咖啡也许能使你的精神振作起来。
point out 指出，指明	I beg to point out that your facts are incorrect. Did he point out where you were wrong? Point out the mistake in this sentence, please.	恕我指出你所讲的情况不真确。 他有没有指出你什么地方错了？ 请指出这句话中的错误。
point to 指向；表明	The finger of the clock points to twelve. Clean your finger before you point at my spot. To have a grievance is to have a purpose in life. Mercy to the enemies means cruelty to the people.	钟的指针指向十二点。 在你指向我的污点之前，先洗净你的指头吧。 有委屈和不满就意味着有生活目标。 对敌人的仁慈就意味着对人民的残忍。
prevent from 阻止，制止；妨碍	Nothing can prevent him from going. These regulations can prevent from the accidents. These rules can prevent from suddenness. You should prevent from the thieves.	什么都不能阻止他前往。 这些规则可以预防发生意外。 这些规则可以预防发生意外。 妳当然应该防备小偷.
put away 放好；抛弃；储存	This vase wasn't wiped out properly before it was put away. Put your toys away in the cupboard, when you've finished playing. She's got a few thousand pounds put away for her retirement. I don't know how he manages to put it all away! He must have put away half a bottle of whisky last night. It's time to put away those foolish ideas. It's time to put away those foolish ideas and become serious.	这个花瓶没擦干净就收起来了。 你把玩具玩儿完了以后放进柜子里去。 她已存了几千镑以备退休之用。 我真不知道他怎么吃得这样多！ 昨晚他大概喝了半瓶威士忌酒。 是该放弃那些愚蠢的想法了。 是打消那些愚蠢想法，认真对待的时候了。
put down 镇压；记下；贬低；制止	The military were called out to put down the riot. He jotted down the conceits of his idle hours. Make sure that you put down every word she says. He was put down for the way he worked. My mother came down on me for coming back late. Helen is always putting him down for nothing. The middle-aged man calmly motioned for the joker to come over to his table, and invited him to sit down. Dennis rebutted them by saying he had put in checks and balances. In the following we will see how the Buddha refutes all the attempts made by Ananda to pin down the locality of the mind. Douglas put away Collins in cold blood. He is said to have been blasted down by his nephew.	军队奉召出动去镇压暴动。 他记下了闲暇时想到的一些看法。 切实要记下她说的每一个字。 他因为工作态度而受到批评。 我回来晚了，母亲严厉地批评了我。 海伦总是无缘无故地奚落他。 中年男子平静地示意这个奚落他的年轻人来到自己的桌前，并请他坐下。 丹尼斯反驳说他会检查和平衡的。 下面我们会看到佛陀是如何反驳阿难的所有试图确定心的位置的尝试。 道格拉斯蓄意杀死了柯林斯。 据说他是被他的侄子杀死的。
put off 推迟；扔掉；阻止	Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today. Many people are put off by his surly behavior. The game was put off because of rain. Don't put off till tomorrow what can be done today. She was put off maths by a bullying and incompetent teacher. Please put off all smoking material. He put off his departure till Saturday.	今日事今日毕。 他举止粗暴使许多人感到气愤。 比赛因雨延期。 今天可做的事不要拖到明天再做。 她对数学失去了兴趣，因为老师仗势欺人又没教学能力。 请熄掉所有冒烟的东西。 她推迟到星期六启程。
put on 穿上；上演；增加；假装；使…上场	The man put on his smock and went out. He put on a coat with a fur lining. The old man put on his spectacles and started reading. She put on dark glasses as a protection against the strong light. They are putting on Macbeth next week. She's just putting on her make-up. He must have put on several kilos.	那人穿上罩衫，然后走了出去。 他穿上一件有毛皮衬里的外衣。 老人戴上眼镜开始看书。 她戴上墨镜以防强光的照射。 他们下周演出《麦克白》。 她正在化妆呢。 他体重一定增加了好几公斤。
put on a performance 演出	She is getting up a performance. Her performance was the highlight of the show.	她正在筹备一场演出。 她的表演是那场演出中最精彩的部分。
put on weight 体重增加	Too many sweet foods may make you put on weight. I'm afraid I am putting on weight.	太多的甜食可能会使你增加体重。 我担心我增加体重啦。
put out 熄灭；伸出；出版；使不方便，打扰	The government put out a warning against flood. Far water does not put out near fire. A gale warning has just been put out. Do not ask me who put out the light. I'll try to put out some feelers to gauge people's reactions to our proposal. Haywood put out a lot of money at 6 percent. I am put out for he is always partial to one while neglecting the other. His action incensed his wife who came out of the house, shouting abuse. The boats will put out to sea on this evening's high tide. She sent him a Dear John letter just as he put out to sea. You must work hard to ride out a storm. He put out the same for seven managers.	政府发出了预防水灾的警告。 [谚]远水救不了近火。 刚才发出了大风警报。 我不知道谁把电灯关掉的。 我想试探一下，看看人们对我们建议的反应。 海伍德放了许多债，收6%25的利息。 我被他厚此薄彼激怒了。 他的行为激怒了他的老婆，她从房子里冲出来，大声辱骂着。 今天晚上涨潮时这些船就要启航。 就在他启航那一刻,她寄给他一封绝交信。 你们必须努力工作以渡过难关。 他同七位管理人员一样做出努力。
put up 提供；建造；举起；提高；推举，提名；供给…住宿；直接行动	Tom put his lunch up in a bag. The farmers put up the apples in barrels. To join the club you have to be put up by an existing member. We can put you up for the night. They are putting up several new buildings in that block. He put up his hand to ask a question. My landlord's threatening to put the rent up by 10 a week. The names of the successful candidates will be put up on the College notice board. I'm afraid he can't put you up. Tom told Peter that he would pass the examination, and Peter told Tom to put up or shut up.	汤姆把午饭放进了一个包里。 农夫们把苹果装入箱内。 要加入俱乐部必须有一位会员做介绍人。 我们可以招待你过夜。 他们正在那一街区建几幢楼房。 他将手举起来发问问题。 我的房东要挟说要把每周租金提高10英镑。 录取名单将公布在学院布告栏里。 恐怕他不能为你提供食宿。 汤姆告诉彼得，他一定能通过这次考试；彼得告诉汤姆说，要么拿出行动来证明，要么就别说。
put up with v. 忍受；容忍	CAN'T PUT UP WITH YOUR UNTIDINESS ANY MORE. That woman has a lot to put up with. I have no mind to put up with any nonsense. He can't stand for those who put on airs.	我再也不能忍受你的杂乱无章了。 那个女人有许多烦恼要忍受。 我不想容忍任何胡言乱语。 他不能容忍摆架子的人。
rather than 而不是；宁可…也不愿	It is better to express your anger, rather than bottle it up. I prefer to walk there rather than take a bus. She is a career woman rather than a housewife. These are political matters rather than social matters. Vector graphics are a complement, rather than an alternative, to bitmap graphics. Total urethrectomy is recommended other than posterior urethrectomy.	生气宁可发泄出来而不要闷在肚内。 与其坐公共汽车去,还不如走路去。 她是职业妇女而不是家庭主妇。 这是政治问题,而不是社会问题。 对于位图来说，矢量图像是一种补充，而不是替代。 尿道全切术有替代后尿道切除术的趋势。
refer to 参考；涉及；指的是；适用于	The rule refers only to special cases. I was not referring to her when I said so. Don't refer to this matter again, please. Our observations may contain a grain of truth for you to refer to. The new law does not refer to land used for farming.	这条规则只涉及一些特殊的情况。 当我那么说时,我并不是指她。 请不要再提这件事了。 我们的意见也许会有千虑一得之处, 供你参考。 这条新的法律不适用于农用土地。
ring back 回电话	Please ring me back in half an hour. Can you please aks her to call me back ASAP?	请半小时内给我回电话。 能不能请她尽快给我回电话？
ring off （英）挂断电话；住嘴；走掉	He can't get the ring off his finger. He can't get his ring off his finger. I'll have to ring off now, I have a train to catch. Her finger was so swollen that she couldn't get her ring off.	他不能把戒指脱下来。 他无法指导戒指从手指上拿下来。 我现在不得不把电话挂上了，我要赶火车去。 她手指肿得褪不下戒指来。
ring up 打电话；把款项记入现金进出记录机	I'll ring you up as soon as they arrive.	他们一到我就打电话给你。
right away 立刻	Madeleine snatched your position right up. You must give up smoking and drinking right away. We will send someone up to look at it right away. My plan now is just to get a massage8 right away.	马德琳立刻抢走了你的地位。 你必须立刻戒烟酒。 我们将马上找人看着。 我现在的计划就是马上去做个按摩。
right now 就是现在，马上	Please stop right now. Do it right now. I can use a cold beer right now! There is a TV show about AIDS on right now.	请立即停下来。 现在马上做。 我真想马上喝一杯冰啤酒。 电视正在播放一个关于爱滋病的节目。
run away 逃跑；失控	Nobody could foresee his running away. He broke the window and ran away. The issue is to figure out what the program would have done if it had been allowed to run wild on an unprotected machine.	没人预见到他的逃跑。 他打破窗子逃跑了。 问题是推测什么节目将做，如果它在一个无保护的机器允许失去控制。
run out of 用完	Mary has already cleaned out all her savings. We have run out of head notepaper. He had exhausted his supply of water. They have run out of their supplies. A mouse ran out from the dark orifice of the cave. He eats coming to an end and run out in the room.	玛丽已用完了她所有的积蓄。 我们已用完了有抬头的信纸。 他已耗尽了全部供水。 他们的供应品已耗尽了。 一只老鼠从黑暗的洞口跑出。 他吃完了饭跑出了屋子。
scores of 许多，大量	Scores of livestock and other animals died from the oily mist, their lungs blackened by the liquid. Outside the hockey stadium scores of Scott Brown supporters, muffled against the snow and stamping in the cold, wait for their own would-be senator to arrive.	大量的牲畜和其它动物因石油烟雾而死，它们的肺部充满了黑色的液体。 在曲棍球露天体育场外，许多斯科特•布朗的支持者冒着严寒，在冷风中瑟瑟发抖地等待着他们心中的议员到临。
sell out 卖完；卖光	The books you ask for are all sold out. Sorry, we've sold out of shirts in your size. He sold out to ambition and the desire for wealth. He was sold out by a traitor and arrested. We would rather die than sell out our comrades.	你要的书都卖完了。 对不起，你这样尺寸的衬衣都卖完了。 他为财富而背叛了自己的抱负和志愿。 他被叛徒出卖，被捕了。 我们宁死也不出卖自己的同志。
send for 召唤，派人去叫；派人去拿	I went in search of a doctor for my sick wife. Let's invite them over for a drink. Half an hour later Kutuzov sent for Prince Andrey. I can still hear your perpetual calling for me.	我去请医生为妻子看病。 咱们去请他们过来喝一杯。 半小时后，安德烈公爵又被召唤到库图佐夫那儿。 我仍旧听得见她那永恒的召唤。
send out 发送；派遣；放出	Many churches used to send missionaries to China. We'll send more mobile medical teams to work in the countryside. Send these orders down to our branch office. How much is it to send this parcel by air mail? Two cotyledons have come out from the seedling. The trees send forth many branches.	之前有许多教会曾派遣传教士去中国。 我们将派遣更多巡回医疗队到农村去。 把这些订货单发送到我们的分店。 欲通过航寄发送这小包需要多少钱？ 小苗长出了两片子叶。 树长出很多枝。
send up 射出；使上升；长出；检举；提出；判决入狱	They planned to send a rocket to the moon. Space rockets are being sent up all the time. He was sent up the river for a bank robbery. You'll land up in jail if you aren't careful.	他们计划向月球发射火箭。 现在随时都有火箭发射。 他因抢劫银行而被捕入狱。 如果你不小心的话，你就得落得个入狱的下场。
set down 放下；记下；看做；确定	He jotted down the conceits of his idle hours. Make sure that you put down every word she says. Write down your address at the check back please. He jotted down a note for her and then left. The teacher asked the pupil to put his hand down. Susan laid the infant down for a nap. We have been booked down for the next ship. Let's go down to the reception desk Register. We have set the date for the wedding. You must pin down every quotation to its author. The bus driver set her down at the cornet. Can you put him down at the next corner? I set a high value on his advice. I don't think you should go down there. You may set his silence down to his shyness. I put it all down to her hard work and initiative. Uncle Wang put the plough down in a field. At sunset, the sun looks as if it is going down.	他记下了闲暇时想到的一些看法。 切实要记下她说的每一个字。 请在支票背面写下你的地址。 他匆匆为她写下了一个条子然后离开了。 老师叫这个小学生把手放下。 苏珊把婴儿放下让她睡觉。 我们已被登记乘下一班轮船。 我们下楼到前台登记。 我们已经确定了婚期。 你一定要确定每一个引文的作者是谁。 公共汽车司机在转弯处停下来让她下车。 你能在下一个拐角处让他下车吗？ 我认为他的忠告很有价值。 我认为你不应该去那儿。 你可以把他的沉默归因于羞怯。 我把这一切归因于她工作又勤奋又主动。 王伯伯把犁降落在田地里了。 日落时，太阳看起来好像在降落。
set free v. 释放；使获得自由	The prisoner had hopes that he might be set free. This metal acts on water to set hydrogen free.	这个囚犯希望能获得释放。 这种金属作用于水，就释放了氢气。
set off v. 出发；引起；动身；使爆炸；抵销；分开	If you want to catch that train we'd better set off for the station immediately. What time are you planning to set off tomorrow? They've set off on a journey round the world. He'll have to circle the mark for 360°more before he can set himself free. That jumper sets off the blue of her eyes. He set these heavy expenses off against his increase in salary. Do be careful with those fireworks; the slightest spark could set them off. The first atom bomb was set off over Hiroshima. The burning gas was easy to set off an explosion.	你要是想赶上那班火车，咱们就最好马上动身去火车站。 你打算明天几点钟启程? 他们已经开始环游世界。 他就得多绕航标360°才能解脱。 在这件毛衣衬托下，她眼睛的蓝色显得更漂亮了。 他的这些沉重的开销抵消了增加的工资。 这些烟火要格外小心，稍有火星就能引起爆炸。 第一颗原子弹是在广岛上空爆炸的。 燃烧的煤气容易引起爆炸。
set out 出发；开始；陈述；陈列	Her work is always very well set out. She set out the reasons for her resignation in a long letter. She set out the pieces on the chess-board. We set out with enough provisions. He joyfully consented and we set out. They set out on the last stage of their journey.	她的工作总是很有条理。 她在一封长信里阐明了辞职原因。 她把国际象棋的棋子摆在棋盘上了。 我们带上足够的食品出发了。 他欣然同意，我们就出发了。 他们开始了旅行的最后一程。
show off 炫耀；卖弄	He likes to show off his masculine physique. The exercise was intended as a show of force. His show-off only serves to show up his ignorance. Stop showing off in front of everybody.	他喜欢炫耀他的阳刚之气。 这次演习为的是炫耀武力。 他的卖弄只不过暴露了他自己的无知。 别再在大伙跟前卖弄了。
side by side 并肩；一起；并排	The couple walked side by side on the pavement. We must stand side by side in our days of trouble. They were thrown together by a common interest. This challenge is compounded by the population time bomb.	这一对儿肩并肩地走在人行道上。 在困难的日子里我们一定要肩并肩地站在一起。 共同的兴趣使他们走到了一起。 这种挑战和人口这颗定时炸弹结合到一起了。
so as to 以便；以致	I gave him money to be quit of him. We went to school so as to have a meeting. She held onto a strap to steady herself. He ran quickly so as to catch the last bus.	我给了他钱为的是要摆脱他。 我们到学校为的是开会。 她抓住拉手吊带以便站稳。 他跑得很快以便赶上那末班车。
so far 到目前为止，迄今为止	The bus route goes so far as that, so you'll need to take a taxi. So far I haven't heard of anybody who wants stop living on account of the cost. I am resolved to try story-writing but so far have not made a start. The scientist is doing experiments no one has so far attempted. It's the hottest day I've had so far. I agree up to a point, but things are not so easy. I don't know how far to rely on him. You can trust him only so far and no further.	汽车路线到此为止了，你得叫辆的士。 迄今为止，我从未听说过有人因生活费过昂而不要生存下去的。 我下决心试试小说写作，不过迄今为止还没开始。 科学家们正在作一项迄今为止没人做过的实验。 这是迄今为止我经历的最热的一天。 在一定程度上我同意，但事情并不那么容易。 我不知道应该依靠他到什么程度。 你只能相信他到这个程度为止，不能再进一步了。
so far as 只要；就…而言；在…范围内	It is no exertion to him to do so. What he says is true as far as it goes. I don't know how far to rely on him. You can trust him only so far and no further.	这样做对他而言并不费力。 他的话就其本身而言是对的。 我不知道应该依靠他到什么程度。 你只能相信他到这个程度为止，不能再进一步了。
so long as adv. 只要	There is hope so long as he is with us. I do not mind as long as it does not rain.	只要他在就有希望。 只要不下雨就行了。
sooner or later 迟早，早晚	He will marry the girl first or last. You will leave your parents sooner or later.	他迟早会娶那姑娘的。 你迟早会离开父母的。
speed up 加速；使加速	Harden up a little, we need more speed. As we came onto the open road we gathered speed.	把帆索拉紧一点，我们需要加快速度。 到达大路后，我们逐渐加快速度。
stand for 代表；支持；象征；担任…的候选人	My assistant will stand in for me while I'm away. I condemn fascism and all it stands for. What did Kenai's totem stand for? I won't stand for his insults any longer.	我不在的时候我的助手将代表我处理事务。 我谴责法西斯主义及其代表的一切。 可奈的图腾象征着什么? 我再不能容忍他的污辱了。
stop doing 停止做；停下正在做的事情；停止正在或经常做的事	Let's stop doing it for the present. It simply means to stop doing any worldly work!	我们暂时停一下工作。 停下做世俗的工作的意思。
struggle against 与…作斗争，和…斗争	The soldiers moving through the area had to struggle against the bad weather, which could render the primitive roads impassable. As the parents had five children, life was a perpetual struggle against poverty. "Reading this book, we can identify with the main character's struggle against evil."	士兵们在穿越那一地带时，必须与恶劣气候抗争，因为恶劣气候可能使得那些原始的道路让人无法通行。 由于父母已经有了五个孩子，生活就是同贫困作无止境的搏斗。 ＂读了这本书，我们会对主人翁反对邪恶的斗争寄予同情。＂
such as 比如；诸如	I know many of them, such as John, Peter, and Tom. We have different pies, such as apple, cherry, and strawberry pies. In this paragraph there are many nouns, such as boy, girl, and book. The Roman languages such as French, Italian, are all derived from Latin. Such things as money and fame are not long lasting. It's more useful to learn modern languages, such as English and German, than Latin.	我认识他们当中的很多人，例如约翰、彼得和汤姆。 我们有不同的派，例如苹果、樱桃和草莓派。 这一段里面有很多名词，例如男孩、女孩和书本。 拉丁语系，例如法语，意大利语，都起源于拉丁语。 诸如钱财和荣誉之类的东西，是不会持久的。 学习英语和德语等现代语言比学习拉丁语更为有用。
take away 带走，拿走，取走	He wants to know who have take away his dictionary. I want to take away the book which you showed me yesterday. If you take four away from ten, that leaves six.
