Nothing can take away the anguish of losing a child. Nothing can take away the anguish of losing a child from his parents.	他想知道谁拿走了他的词典。 我想带走你昨天给我看的那本书。 十减去四得六。 什么都不能解除失去孩子的巨大悲痛。 什么也无法解除父母失去孩子的这种极度痛苦。
take it easy 从容；不急；松懈	Don't worry, I'll fix it with Sarah. Take easy, and sleep tight with me. On holidays, we like to go to the forest cabin and let it all hang out.	别着急，我会和萨拉商量安排好的。 放轻松点，让我陪你一夜好眠吧！ 在假日，我们喜欢去森林小木屋完全放轻松。
take off 起飞；脱下；离开	The plane took off despite the fog. He came in and took off his coat. The mixed grill has been taken off (the menu). Doctors recommended that the drug should be taken off the market. The train will take off at 7 this evening. His leg had to be taken off above the knee. She takes off the Prime Minister to perfection.	尽管有雾，飞机仍照常起飞。 他走了进来,脱掉大衣。 烤杂拌这道菜已(从菜单上)取消了。 医生建议市面上应停止出售该类药物。 火车今晚7点钟离开。 他的一条腿从膝盖以上截去了。 她模仿首相的样子维妙维肖。
take out v. 取出；去掉；出发；发泄；把…带出去；邀请（某人）外出；开始	If you lay up a car for the winter, you should take out the battery. An incision was made into his hand to take out the splinter. I saw him enter the room, unlock a drawer, take out a document, photograph it and put it back. How many teeth did the dentist take out? He took out the pencil marks from his drawing. Did they tell you when to start out? He joyfully consented and we set out. They took out their resentments on each other. He will take out for home next month.	如果冬天把车闲搁在汽车房里，就该取出电瓶。 他手上切开了一个口子以便取出那根刺。 我看见他进了房间，打开抽屉的锁，取出文件，照了相，然后又把它放回去。 牙科医生给患者拔了几颗牙？ 他把面上的铅笔印擦掉。 他们告没告诉你什么时候出发？ 他欣然同意，我们就出发了。 他们互相发泄怨气。 他下月启程回家。
take place 发生；举行	The meeting will take place soon. An fatal accident took place at this cross three years ago. The fete will take place on Sunday, rain or shine. Lengthy negotiations must take place before any agreement can be reached.	会议即将举行。 这个十字路口三年前发生了一起死亡事故。 游园义卖会定于星期日举行,风雨无阻。 要进行多次长时间谈判才能达成协议。
take the place of 代替	I will take the place of your teacher. We had no one to take the place of John. The new always take the place of the old. We have arranged for another man to take his place.	我将代替你们老师工作。 我们没有谁能代替约翰的工作。 新生事物总是会取代旧的事物。 我们已安排好由另一个人取代他。
take up 拿起；开始从事；占据(时间,地方)	She took up the receiver and began to dial the number. When did you take up Japanese as a second foreign language? It is necessary for us to take up productive labour. Use a blotter to take up the spilt ink. You should take up my suggestion and start saving money. They take up too much space. She took up the narrative where John had left off.	她拿起听筒开始拨电话号码。 你什么时间开始选修日语作为第二语言? 我们需要从事生产劳动。 用一张吸墨纸把溅出来的墨水吸掉。 你应该接受我的建议,开始存钱。 它们占了太多空间。 她接着讲约翰未讲完的故事。
talk about 谈论某事	We had a general talk about drama. They buzzed about Halley's romantic affair. His face hardened when talked about the battle. She clammed up when we began to talk about Jimmy.	我们泛泛谈论戏剧。 他们嘁嘁喳喳地谈论哈利的风流韵事。 在谈到那次战斗时，他的表情严峻起来。 每当我们谈到吉米时，她就不说话了。
talk of 谈论，议论；谈到，说到	She spoke of the emancipation of women. They kept the talk up until midnight. She blushed at the mention of her love's name. Speaking of hamburgers, I am as hungry as a hawk.	她谈到了妇女的解放。 他们一直谈到午夜。 她因说到她情人的名字而脸红。 说到汉堡包，我感到饿极了。
the day after tomorrow 后天	Your film will be processed the day after tomorrow. On a showery day, the sun beamed down.	你的胶卷后天就可以冲洗出来。 下午雨后天晴，云开日出。
the day before yesterday 前天	I went shopping the day before yesterday. The foreign boy moved to China the other day.	我前天去购物了。 这个外国男孩前天搬到了中国。
the other day 不久前某一天；几天以前	I bought a pair of tan leather shoes the other day. The days that preceded were filled with activity. The other day I heard a twig snap in it.	前几天我买了双棕褐色的皮鞋。 前几天排满了活动。 不久前的一天，我听见园内一根小树枝啦地响了一声。
think about 考虑	I'll think over your suggestion again. He needs some time to think the matter out.	我将再次仔细考虑你的建议。 他需要时间来仔细考虑一下那件事。
think of 记起，想起；考虑；想像；关心	I couldn't think of the name of that man anyhow. He would never think of letting his daughter marry a fellow like you. She thought of several possibilities. I wouldn't think of disturbing them at this hour of the night. Let's think of some questions about life. I'm thinking of investing in a new car. What do you think of his new job?	我怎么也想不出那人的名字来了。 他决不会想到让女儿嫁给像你这样的家伙。 她考虑了几种可能的情况。 我不能想象这样深更半夜去打扰他们。 让我们对生活设想一些问题吧。 我打算花一笔钱买辆新汽车。 你对他的新工作看法如何？
thousands of 许多，无数；数以千计的……，成千上万的……	There are thousands of awnings on the sea beach. The liberal candidate romped through with thousands of votes to spare. The novel captured the imagination of thousands of readers. The press has reported the massacre of thousands of people for their religious beliefs. Men have been making music for thousands of years. The cyclone brought misery to thousands of people. On the night of December1,1930, a cloud of smog moved over a valley in Belgium, which caused thousands of people to become ill. The fair is a big gathering. Thousands of businessmen from more than150 countries and regions are here to trade with China.	沙滩上有许多遮阳篷。 自由党候选人轻易获胜，超出选票数以千计。 这部小说引起了千万读者的想象。 新闻界报道了那场因宗教信仰原因而对千万人的大屠杀。 人类创作音乐已有数千年历史。 暴风给成千上万的人带来灾难。 1930年12月1日晚上，一片烟雾飘过比利时的一个山谷，这使数千人病倒了。 本次交易会是一次盛会。来自150多个国家和地区的成千上万的商人在这里与中国进行贸易。
throw away 扔掉，丢弃	It is a waste to throw away good food. He had to toss those rotten apples away. Abandoned by her lover, Mary pined away. When he grew rich, Dirk cast away his old friends.	把好的食物扔掉是浪费。 他不得不把腐烂的苹果扔掉。 玛丽因被情人抛弃而憔悴不堪。 德克发财时，抛弃了旧友。
try on 试穿；试验	The method seems good but it needs to be tried out. They are trying out the new method. Shirley will try out for the lead in the play. He was selected out of many graduates.	店员拿出一件衣服给玛莎试穿。 玛丽试穿那件衣服，觉得太紧了。
try out 试验；提炼；考验	This method seems good, but it needs to be tested. They are experimenting with that new method. Shirley will participate in the selection performance of the main character of the play. He was selected from many graduates.	这个方法似乎不错，但需要试验一下。 他们正在试验那种新方法。 雪莉将参加该剧主角的选拔演出。 他是从许多毕业生中选拔出来的。
turn down 减小，关小，调低；拒绝	Turn the heat down or your cake will burn. Please turn the radio down a bit. She petitioned her neighbor to turn down the radio. I turn down the offer. The board turn down all approach on the subject of merger. She turned down every offer of help.	把热度调低吧,要不蛋糕就要糊了。 请把收音机关小点。 她请求邻居把收音机关小点声。 我拒绝那个提议。 董事长拒绝了有关合并事宜的任何协商。 别人提出的帮助他都拒绝了。
turn off 关掉，关闭；拐弯，使转变方向；使失去兴趣	Please turn off the electric power. Do you mind if I turn off the light? Turn off the switch when anything goes wrong with the machine. You should have had enough sense to turn off the electricity supply before disconnecting the wires.	请把电源关掉。 我把灯关掉你不反对吗? 如果机器出故障，就把开关关掉。 你本来应该有足够的常识，在拆开电线之前先把电源切断。
turn on v. 打开；发动；取决于；使兴奋；攻击	He asked me to turn on the radio for him. The North waged war on the South. Hitler's attack on Poland led up to World War Two. The success of a picnic usually turns on the weather. She's often turned on by men with beards. His normally placid dog turned on him and bit him in the leg. Why are you all turning on me ?	他让我替他打开收音机。 北方发动对南方的战争。 他们发动了这场战争。 参加野餐是否尽兴，通常要看天气好坏。 有胡子的男子每每引起她的性欲。 他那条狗平日很温顺，这次突然发作咬了他的腿。 你们为什么都冲我来了?
turn over 移交给；翻阅；把…翻过来；发动；营业额达到；反复考虑	If you turn over you might find it easier to get to sleep. This shop turns over no less than 100 pounds a day. This supermarket turns over its stock very rapidly. He turned the business over to his daughter. He was turning over pages of an encyclopedia.	你翻翻身,就容易睡着了。 这家商店营业额一天不少于100英镑。 这家超级商场商品周转很快。 他把生意移交给女儿管理。 他在翻阅一本百科全书。
turn up 出现；发生；开大；发现；卷起；使仰卧	Their misfit coats were heavy with melted snow and turned up at the collars. For some reason she didn't turn up. It was time to turn to building their own lives. He rolled up his sleeves and got down to work. The machine cast up a big heap of earth. He hunted up a restaurant to appease his hunger. Turn left, and you will find the building. How do you explain this strange turn of events? He keeps bobbing up in the most unlikely places. Something unexpected has turned up. Things took a more decisive turn. He turned up the volume on the television. The kids cranked up the volume on the stereo and started to practice their moves.	不合身的上衣，被融雪湿透，变得沉甸甸的，衣领都朝上翻起。 由于某种原因，她没有来。 那么着手开创个人生活天地的时代便来到了。 他卷起袖子开始工作。 机器卷起了一大堆泥土。 他好容易找到一家餐馆去填饱肚子。 向左转，你就会找到那一栋建筑物。 事情出现这种异常变化，你作何解释？ 他总是在极不可能出现的地方突然出现。 发生了没有意料到的事情。 事情发生了更有决定性意义的转折。 他把电视机的音量调大了。 这些孩子把音响的声音调大，开始练习他们的舞步。
up and down 上上下下；到处；前前后后；来来往往	They are getting up and down all the time. I've looked high and low for my wallet. The lion paced restlessly up and down in its cage. It takes me an hour to walk there and back.	它们总是不停地上上下下跑。 我上上下下地找我的钱包。 狮子在笼子里不安地来回走动。 我步行一个来回用一小时。
used to 惯于；过去经常	I weigh less than I used to. Jack used to assist Mary in her lessons. I used to get up early and take an hour's walk before breakfast. Women used to think they were on the shelf at 30.	我的体重比以前轻了。 杰克过去常常帮助玛丽学习功课。 我过去常常起床很早并且在早餐前散步一小时。 过去女人一到30岁就认为是过了结婚年龄。
used to do 过去常常，过去曾经；过去常常做某事	He used to do a lot of drinking but has signed off now. He used to do such work as he could pick up.	他过去常常喝酒，但现在戒掉了。 他惯常能够找到什么活就干什么活。
wait for 等候	They waited for the ferry to return. It irks us to wait for people who are late. We are waiting for the first crops to ripen. He was then sitting on thorns and waiting for you.	他们等候渡船返回。 等候迟到的人使我们厌烦。 我们正等待着第一次农作物的成熟。 他当时如坐针毡，焦急地等待着你。
wake up 醒来；开始警觉；开始了解真相	I didn't wake up until I heard the alarm clock. She woke up in the middle of an exciting dream. I want to change my wake up time. If I fall asleep at the wheel wake me up.	直到听到闹钟的铃声我才醒来。 她从一场兴奋的梦境中醒来。 我想改变叫醒时间。 如果我开车时睡着了，就叫醒我。
work out 解决；算出；实现；制定出；消耗完；弄懂；锻炼	I believe that you can work out this problem by yourself. We can find a way to work out this problem. The police worked out a plan to catch the thief. The general worked out a new plan of attack. I've worked out your share of the expenses at 10. I work out regularly to keep fit. The basketball players are working out at the gym. The mine has been worked out.	我相信你自己能做出这道题的。 我们可以找到解决这个问题的方法。 警察制定出了策略捉贼。 将军制定了新的进攻方案。 我已经计算出你应分摊的费用是10英镑。 我经常做运动以保持健康。 篮球运动员们正在体育馆进行训练。 这个矿已经被开采完了。
worry about 焦虑…；担心…	I don't think you need to worry about this. Mother's illness was always a great worry to me. Don't bother about that trifling matter. The good news took away all his worry and anxiety.	我认为你不必为这事担心。 母亲的病一直是我非常担心的事。 别为那件小事烦恼。 好消息使他不再烦恼和焦虑。
wrap up 包裹；圆满完成；（使）穿得暖和（wrap somebody/yourself up）；注意力完全集中于……	She tried to wrap up a censure in a polite formula. Mr.Green dressed up as a policeman in dark glasses. You can't keep up the pretense any longer. He is wrapped up in his scientific studies. Be sure to wrap up your son in wool. If you wrap up in several garments, you will keep warm. Do you want me to wrap up the books for you? I can't wrap up the peace talk in less than fifty pages.	她试图用客套的话掩饰指责之意。 格林先生伪装成一名戴墨镜的警察。 你无法继续伪装下去了。 他全神贯注地进行他的研究工作。 一定要给你儿子穿上毛衣。 如果你穿上几件衣服，你就能保暖。 要我为您把书包起来吗？ 我无法以不到50页纸的篇幅写出和平会谈总结。
write down 写下；减低账面价值；把…描写成	Write down your address at the check back please. He wrote down the outline of his lecture.	请在支票背面写下你的地址。 他写下演讲的提纲。
write to 写信给……	It is out of question that I will write to you. She never fails to write to her parents every month. If I knew his address, I could write to him. I will write to you of course, but not every week. We write to each other regularly. If you should write to her, send her my love. Please remind me to write to my mother tomorrow. Chiefly, I asked you to remember to write to your dear mother.	我一定会给你写信的。 她每个月一定写信给她的父母亲。 如果我知道他的住址，我会写信给他。 我当然会写信给你，但不是每星期都写。 我们彼此经常通信。 如果你给她写信，请代我向她问候。 请提醒我明天给我母亲写信。 我主要是想提醒你写信给你母亲。
